name: crusade
trans: 十字军东征， 宗教战争

sentences.english: Dante: I took up the crusade. The bishop assured us that our sins would be absolved.
sentences.chinese: 但丁： 我参与了十字军东征。主教向我们保证我们的罪会被赦免。

sentences.english: Hard to believe that a life of glamour and wealth would be able to rob Xuande of his noble ambitions and crusade to give peace and prosperity to the common people.
sentences.chinese: 很难相信一个生命充满魅力和财富的玄德会用抢和类似十字军东征的方式实现他高尚的抱负并给普通百姓带来安定与和平。

detailed_translations.chinese: 十字军东征， 宗教战争
detailed_translations.english: one of a series of wars fought in the 11th, 12th, and 13th centuries by Christian armies trying to take Palestine from the Muslims

name: unavailable
trans: 难以获得的； 不能利用的

sentences.english: Funding for the new school is unavailable.
sentences.chinese: 这座新学校没有经费。

detailed_translations.chinese: 难以获得的；不能利用的；不近便的
detailed_translations.english: not able to be obtained

sentences.english: ...a heart surgeon.
sentences.chinese: …一位心脏外科医生。

detailed_translations.english: a doctor who does operations in a hospital

name: seismic
trans: 地震的， 有关地震的

sentences.english: increased seismic activity
sentences.chinese: 越来越频繁的地震活动

detailed_translations.chinese: 地震的；因地震而引起的
detailed_translations.english: relating to or caused by  earthquakes

sentences.english: It’s amazing how closely Brian and Steve resemble each other.
sentences.chinese: 布赖恩和史蒂夫真是惊人地相像。

sentences.english: He grew up to resemble his father.
sentences.chinese: 他长大了，很像他父亲。

detailed_translations.english: to look like or be similar to someone or something

sentences.english: Wearing a bee halo, Mark hopped over one fence, then another.
sentences.chinese: 戴着蜜蜂的光环，马克跳过一个又一个篱笆。

sentences.english: There is a strict halo of seriousness around science in Egypt.
sentences.chinese: 在埃及，科学被一个严肃性的严格光环包围着。

sentences.english: But what this experiment demonstrates is that although we can understand the halo effect intellectually, we often have no idea when it is actually happening.
sentences.chinese: 但是上面这个实验所证明的是，虽然我们在智力上可以理解光环效应，但是我们通常不知道它到底什么时候在起作用。

detailed_translations.english: a bright circle that is often shown above or around the heads of holy people in religious art

sentences.english: The pipe will rupture at its weakest point.
sentences.chinese: 管道最薄弱的地方会破裂的。

sentences.english: His liver was ruptured when a brick wall collapsed on him.
sentences.chinese: 一堵砖墙坍塌压住了他，导致他的肝脏破裂。

detailed_translations.english: to break or burst, or to make something break or burst
an occasion when something suddenly breaks apart or bursts

sentences.english: If a tranquilizer is prescribed, be sure your physician informs you of its possible side effects, such as addiction.
sentences.chinese: 如果开了镇静剂，一定要让医生告诉你它可能带来的副作用，例如上瘾。

detailed_translations.chinese: 镇定剂；使镇定的人或物
detailed_translations.english: A tranquilizer is a drug that makes people feel calmer or less anxious. Tranquilizers are sometimes used to make people or animals become sleepy or unconscious.

sentences.english: ...clouds which lift warm, moist air by convection high into the atmosphere.
sentences.chinese: ...云层通过对流把温暖湿润的空气送到高的大气层中。

detailed_translations.english: the movement in a gas or liquid caused by warm gas or liquid rising, and cold gas or liquid sinking

sentences.english: Divers discovered the wreck of an old German warship.
sentences.chinese: 潜水员发现了一艘沉没的德国旧军舰。

sentences.english: Injury threatened to wreck his sporting career.
sentences.chinese: 伤病可能会毁了他的运动生涯。

detailed_translations.english: a ship that has sunk
to completely spoil something so that it cannot continue in a successful way

name: carcass
trans: 尸体； 畜体； 身躯

sentences.english: A cluster of vultures crouched on the carcass of a dead buffalo.
sentences.chinese: 一群秃鹫伏在一头水牛的尸体上啄食。

detailed_translations.chinese: （人或动物的）尸体；残骸；（除脏去头备食用的）畜体
detailed_translations.english: the body of a dead animal

sentences.english: I was a virgin until I was thirty years old.
sentences.chinese: 我到30岁时还是个处女。

sentences.english: a virgin bride
sentences.chinese: 贞洁的新娘

detailed_translations.english: someone who has never had sex
without sexual experience
to affect someone or something in an unpleasant way, and make them suffer

sentences.english: Caffeine constricts the blood vessels in your body.
sentences.chinese: 咖啡因会使体内的血管收缩。

sentences.english: Linda’s throat constricted and she started to cry.
sentences.chinese: 琳达喉咙发紧，哭了起来。

detailed_translations.english: to make something narrower or tighter, or to become narrower or tighter

sentences.english: The report paints a gloomy picture of the economy.
sentences.chinese: 这篇报告描绘了一幅惨淡的经济现状。

detailed_translations.chinese: 忧郁的， 沮丧的； 令人沮丧的； 昏暗的， 阴沉的
detailed_translations.english: making you feel that things will not improve

sentences.english: Insect populations fluctuate wildly from year to year.
sentences.chinese: 昆虫的数量每年变化很大。

sentences.english: Prices were volatile, fluctuating between 20 and 40.
sentences.chinese: 价格不稳定，在20至40美元之间波动。

detailed_translations.english: to change frequently in size, amount, quality, etc., especially from one extreme to another

sentences.english: What right does Customs have to search my car?
sentences.chinese: 海关有什么权力搜查我的车？

detailed_translations.chinese: 海关；风俗（custom的复数）；习惯；关税
detailed_translations.english: Customs is the official organization responsible for collecting taxes on goods coming into a country and preventing illegal goods from being brought in

name: calculate
trans: 计算； 估计； 推测

sentences.english: These instruments calculate distances precisely.
sentences.chinese: 这些仪器计算距离非常精确。

detailed_translations.chinese: 计算， 推算； 计划， 打算
detailed_translations.english: to find out how much something will cost, how long something will take etc, by using numbers

name: authorize
trans: 授权； 批准， 认可

sentences.english: an authorized biography
sentences.chinese: 授权传记

detailed_translations.english: to give official permission for something

sentences.english: A minivan drove by, five faces peering at the window.
sentences.chinese: 一辆小型货车驶过，五个人盯着车窗看。

detailed_translations.english: a large car with seats for six to eight people

sentences.english: The shadows concealed her as she crept up to the house.
sentences.chinese: 她借着阴影蹑手蹑脚地走向房子。

sentences.english: The path was concealed by long grass.
sentences.chinese: 小路隐藏在长长的草里。

sentences.english: a concealed weapon
sentences.chinese: 藏匿的武器

detailed_translations.english: to hide something carefully

sentences.english: ...an army barracks in the north of the city.
sentences.chinese: …一所在那个城市北面的军营。

detailed_translations.chinese: 兵营，营房；简陋的房子；警察所（barrack的复数）
detailed_translations.english: a building or group of buildings in which soldiers live

detailed_translations.chinese: 使驻扎军营里；住在工房、棚屋里；（澳）大声鼓噪（barrack的三单形式）
[数] 共线的；同线的；在同一直线上的
detailed_translations.english: lying on the same straight line

name: narrative
trans: 叙述的， 讲故事的； 导航

sentences.english: The novel contains more narrative than dialogue.
sentences.chinese: 这部小说里的叙述比对话多。

sentences.english: If this story must be written, we must have the courage to eliminate all adjectives that tend to excite wonder: they would achieve the opposite effect, of impoverishing the narrative.
sentences.chinese: 如果必须要写这篇故事，我们必须要有勇气剔除易于激发我们想入非非的所有形容词：这些词会使叙述贫瘠无力，起到相反的效果。

detailed_translations.english: a description of events in a story, especially in a novel

sentences.english: Different workers possess different skills.
sentences.chinese: 不同的工人拥有不同技能。

sentences.english: He no longer possessed the power to frighten her.
sentences.chinese: 他再也吓不倒她了。

detailed_translations.english: to have a particular quality or ability

name: coincide
trans: 巧合； 一致， 符合

sentences.english: When our vacations coincided, we often holidayed together.
sentences.chinese: 我们的假期要是凑巧赶在一起，我们常常会一同去度假。

sentences.english: The interests of the US and those of the islanders may not coincide.
sentences.chinese: 美国的利益和这些岛民的利益可能并不一致。

detailed_translations.english: to happen at the same time as something else, especially by chance

sentences.english: I always tried to remain neutral when they started arguing.
sentences.chinese: 他们争论起来的时候我总是努力保持中立。

sentences.english: Clive decided to adopt a neutral position.
sentences.chinese: 克莱夫决定采取中立立场。

sentences.english: The British government acted as a neutral observer during the talks.
sentences.chinese: 英国政府在会谈中扮演了中立观察员的角色。

sentences.english: the neutral language of an official news report
sentences.chinese: 官方新闻报道采用的中性语言

detailed_translations.english: not supporting any of the people or groups involved in an argument or disagreement

sentences.english: a circular table
sentences.chinese: 圆桌

sentences.english: a circular bus route
sentences.chinese: 环行公共汽车路线

detailed_translations.english: shaped like a circle

name: devise
trans: 想出； 设计， 发明

sentences.english: She devised a method for quicker communications between offices.
sentences.chinese: 她想出一种加快办公室之间通信联络的方法。

detailed_translations.english: to plan or invent a new way of doing something

name: apparent
trans: 显然的， 明显的； 表面上的

sentences.english: The difference in quality was immediately apparent .
sentences.chinese: 质量的差异显而易见。

sentences.english: He left suddenly, for no apparent reason .
sentences.chinese: 不知什么原因，他突然离开了。

detailed_translations.english: easy to notice

sentences.english: a bone marrow transplant
sentences.chinese: 骨髓移植

detailed_translations.english: the soft fatty substance in the hollow centre of bones

sentences.english: a triple murder investigation
sentences.chinese: 对一宗三重谋杀案的调查

sentences.english: a triple bill of horror movies
sentences.chinese: 三部恐怖电影的连续放映

sentences.english: the triple world champion
sentences.chinese: 三连冠世界冠军

sentences.english: a triple bypass heart operation
sentences.chinese: 三重心脏搭桥手术

detailed_translations.chinese: 三部分的，三方的；三倍的，三重的
detailed_translations.english: having three parts or involving three groups, people, events etc
to increase by three times as much, or to make something do this

name: startlingly
trans: 令人吃惊地， 惊人地

sentences.english: a cellular network
sentences.chinese: 蜂窝式网络系统

detailed_translations.chinese: 细胞的；多孔的；由细胞组成的
detailed_translations.english: consisting of or relating to the cells of plants or animals

sentences.english: ‘Empowerment’ is the new buzz-word in enlightened management circles.
sentences.chinese: “授权”是开明的管理层所使用的时髦新语。

detailed_translations.chinese: 开明的；文明的；进步的；被启发的
detailed_translations.english: someone with enlightened attitudes has sensible modern views and treats people fairly and kindly

name: inefficient
trans: 效率低的； 无能的， 不称职的

sentences.english: an inefficient use of resources
sentences.chinese: 资源的浪费

sentences.english: Local government was inefficient.
sentences.chinese: 地方政府效率低下。

detailed_translations.chinese: 无效率的，效率低的；无能的
detailed_translations.english: not using time, money, energy etc in the best way

sentences.english: Protection for the consumer is laid down by statute (= established by law ) .
sentences.chinese: 保障消费者权益已有法律明文规定。

detailed_translations.english: a law passed by a parliament, council etc and formally written down

sentences.english: These changes did little to placate the unions.
sentences.chinese: 这些变革对于工会没有起到多少安抚作用。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone stop feeling angry

sentences.english: cardiac surgery
sentences.chinese: 心脏手术

detailed_translations.chinese: 心脏的；心脏病的；贲门的
detailed_translations.english: relating to the heart

name: humble
trans: 谦逊的； 地位 低下的

sentences.english: a modest and humble man
sentences.chinese: 一个谦卑的男人

sentences.english: Honda won fame in the 1980s as the little car company that humbled the industry giants.
sentences.chinese: 20世纪80年代，本田作为一家小型汽车公司因一举击垮行业巨头而声名鹊起。

detailed_translations.chinese: 谦逊的；简陋的；（级别或地位）低下的；不大的
detailed_translations.english: not considering yourself or your ideas to be as important as other people’s

detailed_translations.chinese: 使谦恭；轻松打败（尤指强大的对手）；低声下气
detailed_translations.english: If you humble someone who is more important or powerful than you, you defeat them easily

name: accessible
trans: 易达到的； 易受影响的

sentences.english: The island is only accessible by boat.
sentences.chinese: 这个岛只有坐船才能到。

sentences.english: There is a church which is easily accessible from my home.
sentences.chinese: 有座教堂离我家很近。

detailed_translations.chinese: 易接近的；可进入的；可理解的
detailed_translations.english: a place, building, or object that is accessible is easy to reach or get into

sentences.english: agricultural commodities
sentences.chinese: 农业商品

sentences.english: Commodity prices fell sharply.
sentences.chinese: 商品价格急剧下跌。

detailed_translations.english: a product that is bought and sold

sentences.english: The report contains a great deal of statistical information.
sentences.chinese: 该报告包含大量统计资料。

detailed_translations.english: relating to the use of statistics

sentences.english: This may be partly for fear of making a near-reality of private landownership, which would undermine one of the last vestiges of the party’s communist heritage.
sentences.chinese: 这要部分归结于中共害怕在实际上造成土地私有制之嫌，因为这样会摧毁其共产主义的最后一道防线。

sentences.english: In tiptoeing gingerly around one of the last Maoist shibboleths-collective landownership-the party may yet be sowing the seeds of the rural transformation it promises.
sentences.chinese: 土地集体所有制毛派最后的几个堡垒之一，中共小心翼翼地触到了它，中共兴许能在其承诺的农村转型中有所建树。

sentences.english: The painting has been authenticated by experts.
sentences.chinese: 这幅画专家鉴定为真迹。

sentences.english: passwords which can authenticate electronic documents
sentences.chinese: 能够验证电子文档的密码

detailed_translations.english: to prove that something is true or real

name: independent
trans: 独立自主者； 无党派者

sentences.english: There are plans to split the corporation into a number of smaller independent companies.
sentences.chinese: 有计划要把这家大企业分割成一些独立的小公司。

sentences.english: an independent charity
sentences.chinese: 独立的慈善机构

sentences.english: small independent bookshops
sentences.chinese: 私营小书店

sentences.english: schools in the independent sector
sentences.chinese: 私立学校

detailed_translations.english: an independent organization is not owned or controlled by, or does not receive money from, another organization or the government

sentences.english: The car rolled over the edge of a cliff.
sentences.chinese: 汽车翻下了悬崖边。

detailed_translations.english: a large area of rock or a mountain with a very steep side, often at the edge of the sea or a river

sentences.english: ‘That’s the only possible solution.’ ‘Yes, I suppose so,’ Charles conceded.
sentences.chinese: “那是唯一可行的解决办法。”“对，我想是。”查尔斯承认道。

detailed_translations.chinese: 承认， 承认…为真； 承认失败； 允许， 让予； 让步， 认输
detailed_translations.english: to admit that something is true or correct, although you wish it were not true

sentences.english: an achievement unparalleled in sporting history
sentences.chinese: 体育史上空前的成就

detailed_translations.chinese: 无比的；无双的；空前未有的
detailed_translations.english: bigger, better, or worse than anything else

name: plausible
trans: 似是而非的， 貌似有理的

sentences.english: His story certainly sounds plausible.
sentences.chinese: 他的叙述听上去当然很合理。

sentences.english: a plausible explanation
sentences.chinese: 说得过去的解释

detailed_translations.chinese: 似有道理的， 似乎正确的， 貌似可信的
detailed_translations.english: reasonable and likely to be true or successful

sentences.english: Violent storms wreaked havoc on the French Riviera, leaving three people dead and dozens injured.
sentences.chinese: 强风暴对法国里维埃拉造成严重破坏，致使3人死亡、数十人受伤。

detailed_translations.chinese: 发泄；报仇；造成（巨大的破坏或伤害）
detailed_translations.english: Something or someone that wreaks havoc or destruction causes a great amount of disorder or damage

sentences.english: Most of the water had evaporated.
sentences.chinese: 大部分的水都蒸发了。

sentences.english: The sun evaporates moisture on the leaves.
sentences.chinese: 太阳会蒸发叶子上的水分。

detailed_translations.english: if a liquid evaporates, or if heat evaporates it, it changes into a gas
if a liquid evaporates, or if heat evaporates it, it changes into a gas

sentences.english: For a few years its luminosity flared up to about 10,000 times the present-day luminosity of the Sun.
sentences.chinese: 有几年它的亮度一度达到了现在的太阳亮度的一万倍左右。

detailed_translations.english: The luminosity of a star or sun is how bright it is

sentences.english: Milrinone combined with vasopressin improves cardiac index after cardiopulmonary resuscitation in a pig model of myocardial infarction.
sentences.chinese: 米力龙复合抗利尿激素增加心肌梗塞模型猪的心肺复苏后心脏指数。

sentences.english: a fervent appeal for peace
sentences.chinese: 对和平的强烈呼吁

detailed_translations.chinese: 热心的；强烈的；炽热的；热烈的
detailed_translations.english: believing or feeling something very strongly and sincerely

sentences.english: The Government set up a commission to investigate allegations of police violence.
sentences.chinese: 政府成立了一个委员会调查对警察施暴行为的指控。

detailed_translations.chinese: 委任状；委员会；佣金，回扣；授权，委托
detailed_translations.english: a group of people who have been given the official job of finding out about something or controlling something
to formally ask someone to write an official report, produce a work of art for you etc

name: flip
trans: 无礼的； 冒失的； 轻率的

sentences.english: I was fed up with his flip comments.
sentences.chinese: 我听够了他那些轻率的评论。

detailed_translations.chinese: 〈口〉无理的， 轻率的， 轻浮的
detailed_translations.english: not said or meant seriously
to move something with a quick sudden movement so that it is in a different position
an action in which you make a flat object such as a coin go upwards and turn over in the air

sentences.english: Parents need to be fully informed so they can make a rational decision.
sentences.chinese: 父母需要充分了解情况，这样才可以作出合理的决定。

sentences.english: I’m sure there’s a rational explanation for all this.
sentences.chinese: 我相信这一切都有合理的解释。

sentences.english: It’s impossible to have a rational conversation with him.
sentences.chinese: 不可能和他进行理性的谈话。

detailed_translations.english: based on reason rather than emotions

sentences.english: The governor does not have the authority to rescind the ruling.
sentences.chinese: 该州长无权撤销这项裁决。

detailed_translations.english: to officially end a law, or change a decision or agreement

sentences.english: She hopes to resume work after the baby is born.
sentences.chinese: 她想生完孩子后继续工作。

sentences.english: The rebels have resumed hostilities against government troops.
sentences.chinese: 叛乱分子继续与政府军发生冲突。

detailed_translations.chinese: 重新开始， 继续， 恢复
detailed_translations.english: to start doing something again after stopping or being interrupted

detailed_translations.chinese: 摘要， 概要； 简历
detailed_translations.english: a short account of something such as an article or speech which gives the main points but no details

sentences.english: an editorial assistant
sentences.chinese: 编辑助理

detailed_translations.english: relating to the preparation of a newspaper, book, television programme etc for printing or broadcasting
a piece of writing in a newspaper that gives the editor’s opinion about something, rather than reporting facts

sentences.english: sedimentary rock
sentences.chinese: 沉积岩

sentences.english: sedimentary deposits
sentences.chinese: 沉积矿床

detailed_translations.english: made of the solid substances that settle at the bottom of the sea, rivers, lakes etc

sentences.english: Now, if the insulin "key" cannot open up the cell to glucose, there is something interfering with it.
sentences.chinese: 现在，如果胰岛素这把“钥匙”无法打开细胞让葡萄糖进入，一定是有东西干扰。

sentences.english: Identifying the presence of brown fat is one thing, but activating it to burn more glucose is another.
sentences.chinese: 确定棕色脂肪的存在是一回事，但激活它让它燃烧更多葡萄糖是另一回事。

sentences.english: But refined carbohydrates, such as white bread and white rice, can be very quickly broken down to glucose, the primary fuel for the body.
sentences.chinese: 但是精制的碳水化合物，例如白面包或白米，可以十分迅速地分解为葡萄糖，提供身体最根本的燃料；

detailed_translations.english: a natural form of sugar that exists in fruit

sentences.english: The kernel of that message was that peace must not be a source of advantage or disadvantage for anyone.
sentences.chinese: 那一信息的核心是和平绝不应该成为对任何人有利或不利的根源。

detailed_translations.chinese: 核心，要点；[计] 内核；仁；麦粒，谷粒；精髓
detailed_translations.english: the part of a nut or seed inside the shell, or the part inside the stone of some fruits

sentences.english: ...a spiral staircase.
sentences.chinese: …一段旋梯。

sentences.english: The maze is actually two interlocking spirals.
sentences.chinese: 这个迷宫实际上是两个连锁的螺旋体。

a line in the form of a curve that winds around a central point, moving further away from the centre all the time
to move in a continuous curve that gets nearer to or further from its central point as it goes round

sentences.english: Diabetics cannot metabolize glucose properly.
sentences.chinese: 糖尿病患者不能使葡萄糖进行恰当的新陈代谢。

sentences.english: But it is far more than a bland ball of hydrogen and helium.
sentences.chinese: 但它绝不仅仅是一个由氢和氦组成的平淡星球。

sentences.english: Some cables will deliver helium to the balloons, others will carry the solar energy back to earth.
sentences.chinese: 其中的一些电缆将传送氦到气球里面，其余的将运载太阳能返回到地球。

sentences.english: Just as in the sun, the chain reaction in the second stage fuses the hydrogen atoms into heavier helium atoms and releases vast amounts of energy in the process.
sentences.chinese: 正如在太阳上所进行的反应一样，第二阶段连锁反应将氢原子聚合成较重的氦原子并在这一过程中释放出巨大的能量。

detailed_translations.english: a gas that is lighter than air and is used to make  balloons  float. It is a chemical  element  ：symbol He

sentences.english: Schliemann excavated the ancient city of Troy.
sentences.chinese: 谢里曼发掘出特洛伊古城。

detailed_translations.english: if a scientist or archaeologist excavates an area of land, they dig carefully to find ancient objects, bones etc

sentences.english: Heavy snowfalls brought traffic to a halt (= made it stop moving ).
sentences.chinese: 大雪使得交通陷于停顿。

sentences.english: The World Championship was brought to a temporary halt (= was stopped from continuing ).
sentences.chinese: 世界锦标赛暂停举行。

sentences.english: The President has called for a halt to the wave of emigration.
sentences.chinese: 总统呼吁遏制移民国外的热潮。

detailed_translations.english: a stop or pause

sentences.chinese: 他们因吸入浓烟被送进医院。

sentences.english: Take several deep inhalations.
sentences.chinese: 做几次深的吸气。

detailed_translations.english: Inhalation is the process or act of breathing in, taking air and sometimes other substances into your lungs

sentences.english: The pictures are similar, but there are subtle differences between them.
sentences.chinese: 这些图片很相似，但它们之间有细微的差别。

sentences.english: The warning signs of the disease are so subtle that they are often ignored.
sentences.chinese: 这种疾病的警示征兆不易察觉，因而往往被忽视。

sentences.english: a subtle form of racism

sentences.english: The dish had a subtle hint of ginger.
sentences.chinese: 这道菜微微带点姜的味道。

detailed_translations.english: not easy to notice or understand unless you pay careful attention

sentences.english: ...the viscosity of the paint.
sentences.chinese: ...油漆的黏稠度。

detailed_translations.english: Viscosity is the quality that some liquids have of being thick and sticky

sentences.english: Gorbachev failed to keep the component parts of the Soviet Union together.

name: overwhelm
trans: 淹没； 压倒； 不知所措

sentences.chinese: 但是，众多的利弊得失不应盲目的一个压倒另一个。

sentences.chinese: 我们尽量不去想它，因为在某种我们能够想像到的程度上他会压倒我们。

sentences.english: For example, in a situation in which several bystanders need to band together to overwhelm a perpetrator, they will be more likely to act collectively than to act alone.
sentences.chinese: 例如, 就有这样一种情况， 在只有几个旁观者需要联合起来才能压倒一个罪犯的情况下, 他们就可能会更多地采取集体行动。

detailed_translations.english: if water overwhelms an area of land, it covers it completely and suddenly

name: impartial
trans: 不偏不倚的， 公正的

sentences.chinese: 我们就税收和保险问题提供公充的建议。

sentences.english: an impartial inquiry into the deaths
sentences.chinese: 对死亡事件的公正调查

sentences.english: an impartial observer
sentences.chinese: 公正的观察员

detailed_translations.chinese: 公平的，公正的；不偏不倚的
detailed_translations.english: not involved in a particular situation, and therefore able to give a fair opinion or piece of advice

sentences.chinese: 管理顾问

detailed_translations.english: someone whose job is to give advice on a particular subject

sentences.english: Encephalitis still attacks one child in 1,000 who catches measles.
sentences.chinese: 每1000位患麻疹的儿童中仍会有一位患上脑炎。

trans: 前所未有的， 史无前例的

sentences.english: Such a move is rare, but not unprecedented.
sentences.chinese: 这样的举动少见，但并非从来没有过。

detailed_translations.english: If something is unprecedented, it has never happened before

sentences.english: Bernard was short in stature, with a large head.
sentences.chinese: 伯纳德个子矮，头很大。

detailed_translations.chinese: 身高，身材；（精神、道德等的）高度

sentences.chinese: 多年来这里一直有人偷偷地猎鹿。

detailed_translations.chinese: 水煮；偷猎；窃取；把…踏成泥浆
detailed_translations.english: to illegally catch or shoot animals, birds, or fish, especially on private land without permission

sentences.chinese: 她被送回家实施隔离。

detailed_translations.english: to keep a person or animal apart from others for a period of time in case they are carrying a disease
a period of time when a person or animal is kept apart from others in case they are carrying a disease

name: illustration
trans: 说明； 例证； 图解

sentences.english: The book contains 62 pages of illustrations.
sentences.chinese: 这本书有62页插图。

detailed_translations.english: a picture in a book, article etc, especially one that helps you to understand it

sentences.chinese: 从通向公园外的拱门下走过时，米拉高兴地喊叫起来。

detailed_translations.english: a structure with a curved top and straight sides that supports the weight of a bridge or building

sentences.english: I’ve still got a few Christmas presents to wrap up.

sentences.chinese: 简·奥斯丁的小说

sentences.english: What a novel idea!.
sentences.chinese: 多么新奇的想法呀！

sentences.english: He came to prominence during the World Cup.
sentences.chinese: 他在该世界杯期间一举成名。

detailed_translations.english: the fact of being important and well known

sentences.chinese: 我很乐意报销你的所有花费。

detailed_translations.english: to pay money back to someone when their money has been spent or lost

name: inaccessible
trans: 难达到的， 难接近的， 难见到的

sentences.chinese: 冬天时，进入这些村子的路很难走。

detailed_translations.chinese: 难达到的；难接近的；难见到的

sentences.chinese: 亲切的微笑

detailed_translations.english: friendly and happy

trans: 解决； 分解； 决心

sentences.chinese: 巴尼特急需钱来解决他的经济问题。

sentences.chinese: ...西非内陆国家马里。

sentences.chinese: 新政府面临的难题是巨大的。

sentences.chinese: 她是个出色的模仿者，喜欢模仿温斯顿·丘吉尔。

trans: 计算； 估算； 推断

sentences.chinese: 诸如世界银行之类的强大机构

sentences.english: the Institution of Electrical Engineers

sentences.chinese: 用百洁布擦洗顽固污渍。

sentences.chinese: 这封信文笔拙劣，错误连篇。

detailed_translations.chinese: 文盲的；不识字的；没受教育的
detailed_translations.english: someone who is illiterate has not learned to read or write
someone who has not learned to read or write

sentences.chinese: 海子从自身苦难体验出发目睹了家园和人类苦难。

sentences.english: ...a legal shortcut to take homes from delinquent borrowers.
sentences.chinese: …一个取得拖欠贷款者房产的法律捷径。

sentences.english: We crossed at a busy intersection.
sentences.chinese: 我们穿过了一个繁忙的道路交叉口。

detailed_translations.chinese: 交叉；十字路口；交集；交叉点
detailed_translations.english: a place where roads, lines etc cross each other, especially where two roads meet

sentences.english: Police used tear gas to disperse the crowd.
sentences.chinese: 警察用催泪瓦斯驱散人群。

detailed_translations.chinese: 分散， 赶散； 消散， 驱散
detailed_translations.english: if a group of people disperse or are dispersed, they go away in different directions

detailed_translations.chinese: 使分散，散开；使消散，消失
detailed_translations.english: if a group of people disperse or are dispersed, they go away in different directions

sentences.english: ...writing implements.
sentences.chinese: …书写用具。

sentences.english: We have decided to implement the committee’s recommendations in full.
sentences.chinese: 我们已决定全面实施委员会提出的建议。

detailed_translations.english: a tool, especially one used for outdoor physical work
to take action or make changes that you have officially decided should happen

sentences.english: the cosmetic industry
sentences.chinese: 化妆品行业

sentences.english: cosmetic products
sentences.chinese: 美容产品

sentences.english: Are you on the diet for health or cosmetic reasons?
sentences.chinese: 你节食是为了健康还是为了美丽？

sentences.english: ...the cosmetics counter of a department store.
sentences.chinese: …一个百货商店的化妆品专柜。

detailed_translations.english: intended to make your hair, skin, body etc look more attractive
Cosmetics are substances such as lipstick or powder, which people put on their face to make themselves look more attractive

sentences.english: Italian food has been exported all over the world.
sentences.chinese: 意大利食品已传遍世界。

detailed_translations.english: to sell goods to another country
to sell goods to another country
the business of selling and sending goods to other countries

sentences.english: I’d have asked more questions, but I didn’t want to seem inquisitive.
sentences.chinese: 我本想问更多的问题，但我不想看上去那么爱打听。

detailed_translations.chinese: 好奇的；好问的，爱打听的
detailed_translations.english: asking too many questions and trying to find out too many details about something or someone

name: erratic
trans: 反复无常的； 古怪的

sentences.english: His breathing was becoming erratic.
sentences.chinese: 他的呼吸越来越不均匀。

sentences.english: his erratic behaviour
sentences.chinese: 他难以捉摸的行为

detailed_translations.english: something that is erratic does not follow any pattern or plan but happens in a way that is not regular

detailed_translations.chinese: 漂泊无定的人；古怪的人

sentences.english: The last hole is a par five.
sentences.chinese: 最后一洞的标准杆数为五杆。

detailed_translations.chinese: 标准；票面价值；平均数量
detailed_translations.english: the number of  stroke s  a good player should take to hit the ball into a hole in the game of  golf

sentences.english: All the infected clothing was incinerated.
sentences.chinese: 所有沾染了细菌的衣服都被焚化了。

detailed_translations.english: to burn something completely in order to destroy it

name: well-being
trans: 健康， 幸福； 福利

sentences.english: Singing can create a sense of well-being.
sentences.chinese: 唱歌能产生一种幸福感。

detailed_translations.chinese: 健康， 幸福； 福利
detailed_translations.english: a feeling of being comfortable, healthy, and happy

sentences.english: Sarah can be quite vicious at times.
sentences.chinese: 萨拉有时相当狠毒。

sentences.english: a vicious personal attack on the Duchess
sentences.chinese: 对公爵夫人恶毒的人身攻击

sentences.english: She was shocked by the vicious tone in his voice.
sentences.chinese: 她对他恶毒的语气感到震惊。

detailed_translations.english: very unkind in a way that is intended to hurt someone’s feelings or make their character seem bad

sentences.english: Wearing badly-fitting shoes can deform your feet.
sentences.chinese: 穿不合脚的鞋会使脚变形。

detailed_translations.english: if you deform something, or if it deforms, its usual shape changes so that its usefulness or appearance is spoiled

name: erode
trans: 侵蚀；  削弱， 损害

sentences.english: The cliffs are being constantly eroded by heavy seas.
sentences.chinese: 悬崖正不断受到汹涌海浪的侵蚀。

sentences.english: The rocks have gradually eroded away.
sentences.chinese: 岩石逐渐风化。

detailed_translations.english: if the weather erodes rock or soil, or if rock or soil erodes, its surface is gradually destroyed

sentences.english: In fact, the history of aviator jackets can be traced back to the First World War.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，飞行员夹克的历史可以追溯到第一次世界大战时期。

sentences.english: Other hats are inspired by history and fashion, such as the iconic aviator helmet or the cabbie cap which resembles old fashioned "newsboy" hats.
sentences.chinese: 其他一些帽子则是受了历史或时尚的启发，比如标志性的飞行员头盔，或是与旧风尚‘报童帽’相似的司机帽。

detailed_translations.english: a pilot

sentences.english: an enormous bunch of flowers
sentences.chinese: 巨大的花束

sentences.english: an enormous amount of money
sentences.chinese: 巨款

sentences.english: The team made an enormous effort.
sentences.chinese: 该队付出了巨大的努力。

detailed_translations.english: very big in size or in amount

sentences.english: Plants use their roots to absorb moisture from the soil.
sentences.chinese: 植物利用根从土壤中吸收水分。

sentences.english: Your skin’s moisture content varies according to weather conditions.
sentences.chinese: 皮肤的水分含量随着天气状况而变化。

detailed_translations.english: small amounts of water that are present in the air, in a substance, or on a surface

name: sulfuric
trans: 硫磺的； 含多量硫磺的

sentences.english: Sulfur dioxide turns into tiny droplets of sulfuric acid. These light-colored droplets cool the Earth by reflecting sunlight back to space.
sentences.chinese: 二氧化硫能转变为微小的硫酸雨滴，这些浅色的雨滴能通过反射太阳光返回太空来使地球降温。

sentences.english: This variety is said to have a dog or panther-like nose and face, a forked tongue protruding from it, large fangs, and to hiss and screech when alarmed, as well as leave a sulfuric stench behind.
sentences.chinese: 据说，它还拥有狗或是豹子一样的鼻子和脸，像叉子一样的舌头，很大的獠牙，被惊吓到时会嘶嘶作声并尖叫并放出含有大量硫磺的臭气。

sentences.english: He admitted a lack of motivation and a feeling of sloth.
sentences.chinese: 他承认自己缺乏动力，感觉懒散。

detailed_translations.english: an animal in Central and South America that moves very slowly, has grey fur, and lives in trees

sentences.english: He seems perfectly sane (= completely sane ) to me.
sentences.chinese: 在我看来他神志完全正常。

sentences.english: No sane person would want to kill a baby.
sentences.chinese: 神志正常的人不会去杀一个婴儿。

detailed_translations.chinese: 健全的；理智的；[临床] 神志正常的
detailed_translations.english: able to think in a normal and reasonable way

sentences.chinese: 通过打磨并在弱硝酸酒精溶液中蚀刻制备的样本显示出由缓慢冷却形成的交互层状的薄片结构。

sentences.english: Whether you stay or leave is a matter of total indifference to me (= I do not care ).
sentences.chinese: 你是留是走我根本无所谓。

detailed_translations.english: lack of interest or concern

sentences.english: a porcelain vase
sentences.chinese: 瓷花瓶

detailed_translations.english: a hard shiny white substance that is used for making expensive plates, cups etc

sentences.english: Can you catalog all these books?
sentences.chinese: 你能给所有这些书编目录吗？

sentences.english: Well. this is our latest catalog.
sentences.chinese: 嗯，这是我们最新的产品目录。 。

sentences.english: Can you send me a catalog?
sentences.chinese: 你能给我寄一份商品目录吗？

sentences.english: She tried to focus her mind on her work.
sentences.chinese: 她试图集中精神干活。

sentences.english: He focused his blue eyes on her.
sentences.chinese: 他那蓝色的眼睛注视着她。

sentences.english: Eggs became the focus for the food poisoning scare.
sentences.chinese: 鸡蛋成了食物中毒恐慌的焦点。

detailed_translations.english: to give attention, effort, etc. to one particular subject, situation or person rather than another
the thing, person, situation etc that people pay special attention to

sentences.english: She tried to run, but was hampered by her heavy suitcase.
sentences.chinese: 她想跑，但沉重的旅行箱拖累了她。

sentences.english: An attempt to rescue the men has been hampered by bad weather.
sentences.chinese: 对那几名男子的营救行动受到恶劣天气的阻碍。

detailed_translations.english: to make it difficult for someone to do something
a basket with a lid, which is used for carrying food or sending it to someone as a present

sentences.english: Staff use the poison to exterminate moles and rabbits.
sentences.chinese: 员工用毒药来消灭鼹鼠和野兔。

detailed_translations.english: to kill large numbers of people or animals of a particular type so that they no longer exist

sentences.english: a drug smuggler
sentences.chinese: 毒品走私者

detailed_translations.chinese: 走私者；走私犯；[法] 走私船
detailed_translations.english: someone who takes something illegally from one country to another

sentences.english: Harvard university was named after John Harvard, a Puritan minister who left his books and half of his estate to the college.
sentences.chinese: 哈佛大学就得名于约翰•哈佛，一个将他的所有书籍和半数财产都留给学校的清教徒牧师。

sentences.english: Here I am in a pulpit, dressed like a Puritan minister —an apparition that would have horrified many of my distinguished forebears and perhaps rededicated some of them to the extirpation of witches.
sentences.chinese: 站在这个讲坛上，我穿得像个清教徒教长——一个可能会吓到我的杰出前辈们的怪物，或许使他们中的一些人重新致力于铲除巫婆的事业上。

detailed_translations.english: The Puritans were a group of English Protestants in the sixteenth and seventeenth centuries who lived in a very strict and religious way

sentences.english: flowers pollinated by bees
sentences.chinese: 由蜜蜂授粉的花

detailed_translations.english: to give a flower or plant pollen so that it can produce seeds

sentences.english: In this island is also found the rhinoceros, an animal less than the elephant, but larger than the buffalo.
sentences.chinese: 在这个岛上还能找到犀牛，一种比大象小一点的动物，可是比水牛大。

sentences.english: Contrary to its name, the black rhinoceros is actually grey in color.
sentences.chinese: 有别于它的名字，黑犀牛事实上是灰色的。

detailed_translations.english: a large heavy African or Asian animal with thick skin and either one or two horns on its nose

sentences.english: They are called ‘Supertrams’, the implication being that (= which is meant to suggest that ) they are more advanced than earlier models.
sentences.chinese: 它们被称作“超级电车”，这是暗指它们比先前的型号更先进。

detailed_translations.english: a suggestion that is not made directly but that people are expected to understand or accept

sentences.english: fierce guard dogs
sentences.chinese: 凶猛的看门狗

sentences.english: fierce fighting in the city
sentences.chinese: 城里的激烈战斗

detailed_translations.english: a fierce person or animal is angry or ready to attack, and looks very frightening

name: precursor
trans: 先驱； 先兆； 前身

sentences.english: Error is often the precursor of what is correct.
sentences.chinese: 错误常常是正确的先导。

sentences.english: Viewed as a precursor to a wider open data movement, it could be as important as any we have seen in the web era.
sentences.chinese: 它被视为更宽泛的数据开放运动的先导，它将像我们在互联网时代看到的所有重要的事物一样重要。

detailed_translations.english: something that happened or existed before something else and influenced its development

name: reservation
trans: 预订； 保存； 自然保护区

sentences.english: a dinner reservation
sentences.chinese: 预订晚餐

sentences.english: Customers are advised to make seat reservations well in advance.
sentences.chinese: 建议顾客提前订座。

detailed_translations.english: an arrangement which you make so that a place in a hotel, restaurant, plane etc is kept for you at a particular time in the future

sentences.english: a wall made of concrete blocks
sentences.chinese: 由混凝土块砌成的墙

detailed_translations.english: a piece of hard material such as wood or stone with straight sides
to prevent anything moving through a space by being or placing something across it or in it

detailed_translations.chinese: 成批的，大块的；交通堵塞的

sentences.english: Local people have decided to revive this centuries-old tradition.
sentences.chinese: 当地人决定复兴这一延续了数个世纪的传统。

sentences.english: an attempt to revive the steel industry
sentences.chinese: 复苏钢铁工业的努力

sentences.english: The doctors revived her with injections of glucose.
sentences.chinese: 医生给她注射葡萄糖，使她苏醒过来。

detailed_translations.english: to bring something back after it has not been used or has not existed for a period of time

sentences.english: The merchant sold electrical appliances, such as microcomputer, microphone, microprocessor and microwave ovens.
sentences.chinese: 商人卖一些电器，比如微型计算机，话筒，微处理器和微波炉。

sentences.english: Or, as in my case, turning on the old antique microcomputer to read my single-sided, single-density floppies might lead to a fire and the quick end of your weekend data retrieval project.
sentences.chinese: 或者，像我所作的那样，打开一个旧的古董微型计算机来读取我的单面单密度磁盘，而这有可能引起一场火灾，以及你的周末数据检索计划的快速完结。

detailed_translations.chinese: 微电脑；[计] 微型计算机
detailed_translations.english: a small computer

sentences.english: "Jeans," according to one company's promotional material, "are designed and made to be worn hard."
sentences.chinese: 根据一家公司促销材料上所说的，“牛仔裤为耐穿而设计和制作。”

detailed_translations.english: Promotional material, events, or ideas are designed to increase the sales of a product or service

sentences.english: The police are waging war on drug pushers in the city.
sentences.chinese: 警方正在市内开展一场打击毒贩的斗争。

detailed_translations.english: to be involved in a war against someone, or a fight against something

sentences.english: Water from the Great Lakes is pumped to arid regions .
sentences.chinese: 五大湖中的水被输往干旱地区。

detailed_translations.chinese: 干旱的；不毛的，[农] 荒芜的
detailed_translations.english: arid land or an arid  climate  is very dry because it has very little rain

sentences.english: a scurrilous attack on his integrity
sentences.chinese: 对他正直人格的恶意诋毁

detailed_translations.chinese: 下流的；说话粗鄙恶劣的；无礼的

sentences.english: And remember nuts like almonds with their skins on have more fiber than those without.
sentences.chinese: 记住，向杏仁那样有皮的坚果比那些没有皮的更富含纤维素。

sentences.english: While they bite into the fruit, they could savor the various blends of fiber and juices.
sentences.chinese: 当他们咬一口水果，他们可以尝到各种水果纤维和汁液的混合。

sentences.english: Not only do they offer antioxidants, they contain higher content of vitamins, minerals, and fiber.
sentences.chinese: 它们不仅提供抗氧化剂，还含有较高含量的维生素、矿物质和纤维。

sentences.english: Before proceeding further, we must define our terms.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须先定义术语，然后再往下展开。

detailed_translations.english: to continue to do something that has already been planned or started

sentences.english: She was abducted by a dangerous psychopath.
sentences.chinese: 她被一名危险的精神变态者劫持了。

detailed_translations.english: someone who has a serious and permanent mental illness that makes them behave in a violent or criminal way

sentences.english: He works for a large American corporation.
sentences.chinese: 他在一家美国大公司工作。

sentences.english: multinational corporations
sentences.chinese: 跨国公司

sentences.english: the Siemens Corporation
sentences.chinese: 西门子公司

detailed_translations.english: a big company, or a group of companies acting together as a single organization

sentences.english: He just laughed and dismissed my proposal as unrealistic.
sentences.chinese: 他只是笑了笑，认为我的建议不切实际，拒绝考虑。

sentences.english: Bryant was unfairly dismissed from his post.
sentences.chinese: 布赖恩特被无理免职了。

detailed_translations.english: to refuse to consider someone’s idea, opinion etc, because you think it is not serious, true, or important

name: underlying
trans: 在下面的； 根本的， 基础的

sentences.english: To stop a problem you have to understand its underlying causes.
sentences.chinese: 要解决问题，你得了解其潜在原因。

detailed_translations.english: The underlying features of an object, event, or situation are not obvious, and it may be difficult to discover or reveal them

sentences.english: a tradition that has little resonance in the 21st century
sentences.chinese: 在21世纪难以引起共鸣的传统

sentences.english: His words will have resonance for many musicians.
sentences.chinese: 他的话将在很多音乐家心里产生共鸣。

detailed_translations.english: the special meaning or importance that something has for you because it relates to your own experiences
irregular and violent movements of air or water that are caused by the wind

sentences.english: To be good at the game, you need a reasonable level of intelligence.
sentences.chinese: 要想把这种游戏玩好，需要一定的智力水平。

sentences.english: According to our intelligence, further attacks were planned.
sentences.chinese: 根据我们的情报，还会有更进一步的攻击。

detailed_translations.english: the ability to learn, understand, and think about things

sentences.english: The more people who have the virus, the more virus particles there are for that one, fatal mutation to appear in.
sentences.chinese: 因为如果有越多人感染到病毒，就有越多病毒颗粒可以酝酿出一种致命的突变病毒品种。

sentences.english: Analyzes the factors that influence the stretching changing in the hoisting process and put forward a method that adopting S-curve could reduce the stretching mutation.
sentences.chinese: 分析了提升过程中钢丝绳张力变化的影响因素，提出了采用S曲线速度图是可以减小张力突变的一种方法。

sentences.english: For example, it is hard to say whether an ART baby has died because of the ART technology or because one of its parents had a mutation that mutually contributed to subpar fertility and infant death.
sentences.chinese: 例如，很难说是否一个ART的宝宝会因为ART技术而死亡，或者他父母中的其中一个出现突变，这对于在平均水平以下的受精和婴儿的死亡是互相贡献的。

detailed_translations.english: a change in the  genetic  structure of an animal or plant that makes it different from others of the same kind

sentences.english: They let the land lie fallow for a year.
sentences.chinese: 他们让土地休耕一年。

detailed_translations.english: fallow land is dug or  ploughed  but is not used for growing crops
land treated in this way
to leave (land) unseeded after ploughing and harrowing it

sentences.english: They’ve installed the new computer network at last.
sentences.chinese: 他们终于安装了新电脑网络。

sentences.english: Security cameras have been installed in the city centre.
sentences.chinese: 在市中心已安装了一些监控摄像机。

detailed_translations.english: to put a piece of equipment somewhere and connect it so that it is ready to be used

sentences.english: problems of racial integration
sentences.chinese: 种族融合的问题

detailed_translations.english: the combining of two or more things so that they work together effectively

sentences.english: Could you give me some indication as to when I am likely to receive a reply?
sentences.chinese: 你能给我透露一下什么时候我能收到回复吗？

sentences.english: Indications are that the situation hasn’t improved much.
sentences.chinese: 迹象表明局势并没有多大好转。

sentences.english: There is every indication (= there are very clear signs ) that it is true.
sentences.chinese: 很明显这是真的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 指示， 表示， 表明； 象征， 迹象
detailed_translations.english: a sign, remark, event etc that shows what is happening, what someone is thinking or feeling, or what is true

name: foreseeable
trans: 可预知的； 能预测的

sentences.english: The judge found that it was not foreseeable that the fuel would catch fire.
sentences.chinese: 法官裁定，燃料着火是无法预料的。

sentences.english: foreseeable risk
sentences.chinese: 可预料的风险

detailed_translations.english: foreseeable difficulties, events etc should be planned for because they are very likely to happen in the future

sentences.english: a microscopic speck of dust
sentences.chinese: 微小的尘粒

sentences.english: Inspectors discovered microscopic cracks in the hull of the submarine.
sentences.chinese: 检测人员发现潜艇的船身有细微的裂缝。

detailed_translations.english: extremely small and therefore very difficult to see

sentences.english: The bulk of consumers are based in towns.
sentences.chinese: 大多数消费者都是城镇居民。

sentences.english: The dough will rise until it is double in bulk.
sentences.chinese: 面团会发酵到原来的两倍大。

detailed_translations.english: the main or largest part of something

sentences.english: But now there is no mumps at all in some countries because of vaccination.
sentences.chinese: 但现在因为接种疫苗在某些国家腮腺炎已经不见。

sentences.english: People should therefore continue to seek seasonal influenza vaccination like any other year.
sentences.chinese: 因此，人们应当像以往一样继续接种季节性流感疫苗。

sentences.english: There are some reasons why some people believe they have gotten influenza after vaccination.
sentences.chinese: 有若干原因可说明为什么有些人认为他们在接种疫苗之后患上流感。

sentences.english: This takes a little while to switch all of your plastic storage containers over to ceramic, glass or stainless steel but its definitely worthwhile.
sentences.chinese: 把你所有的塑料存储容器换成陶瓷的，玻璃的，或者不锈钢的你会浪费你一点时间。 但这绝对是值得的。

sentences.english: ...ceramic tiles.
sentences.chinese: …瓷砖。

detailed_translations.chinese: 陶瓷的；陶器的；制陶艺术的

detailed_translations.english: Ceramic is clay that has been heated to a very high temperature so that it becomes hard

sentences.english: It often results in lower renovation, cleaning and maintenance costs, too.
sentences.chinese: 它通常还导致较低的翻新、清洁和保养维修费用。

sentences.english: For novice friends, we do not know how much the specific renovation costs?
sentences.chinese: 对于新手朋友来说，大家都不了解具体装修费用是多少？

sentences.english: We did a circuit of the old city.
sentences.chinese: 我们绕着老城走了一圈。

detailed_translations.english: a path that forms a circle around an area, or a journey along this path

sentences.english: Flight is the form of locomotion that puts the greatest demands on muscles.
sentences.chinese: 飞行是对肌肉要求最高的运动形式。

detailed_translations.english: movement or the ability to move

name: gut
trans: 毁坏〔建筑物〕的内部〔尤指烧毁〕

sentences.english: He had a gut feeling that Sarah was lying.
sentences.chinese: 他凭直觉感到萨拉在撒谎。

sentences.english: Let's have your gut reaction to the facts as we know them.
sentences.chinese: 请告诉我们你对这些我们了解的事实的直觉反应。

detailed_translations.chinese: 内脏；肠子；剧情；胆量；海峡；勇气；直觉；肠
detailed_translations.english: a reaction or feeling that you are sure is right, although you cannot give a reason for it

detailed_translations.chinese: 取出内脏；摧毁（建筑物等）的内部
detailed_translations.english: to remove the organs from inside a fish or animal in order to prepare it for cooking

detailed_translations.chinese: 简单的；本质的，根本的；本能的，直觉的
detailed_translations.english: A gut feeling is based on instinct or emotion rather than reason

sentences.english: Some bees go out foraging, but one stands by the entrance to the nest.
sentences.chinese: 有的蜜蜂外出觅食，此时，就会有一只蜜蜂像守卫一样把守在蜂窝的入口处。

sentences.english: Be an Early Bird: The morning chorus just after sunrise is the best time of day to spot spring birds, as that is the time when most birds are singing and foraging.
sentences.chinese: 做个“早起鸟”：太阳刚刚升起的早晨鸟儿的合唱是春季的一天中观察鸟儿的最佳时间，因为这事是大多是鸟儿歌唱和觅食的时候。

sentences.english: My friend recently led his team out in a wild-mushroom foraging expedition, which was a unique way for them to learn something new as well as get to know each other, in a beautiful outdoor setting.
sentences.chinese: 最近我朋友带领他的团队进行野生蘑菇觅食远征，对他们来说这是一种独特的学习新东西的方式，在这种美丽的户外背景下他们也可以了解彼此。

sentences.english: The new law restricts the sale of hand guns.
sentences.chinese: 新法规限制手枪的销售。

sentences.english: You may need to restrict access to certain files (= limit the number of people who can read them ) .
sentences.chinese: 某些档案可能需要限制查阅。

sentences.english: The agreement will restrict competition.
sentences.chinese: 这个协议将限制竞争。

sentences.english: The cramped living conditions severely restricted the children’s freedom to play.
sentences.chinese: 拥挤的居住条件严重限制了孩子们玩耍的自由。

detailed_translations.english: to limit or control the size, amount, or range of something

sentences.english: Murder carries a mandatory life sentence .
sentences.chinese: 谋杀罪依照法律要判无期徒刑。

sentences.english: The Council has made it mandatory for all nurses to attend a refresher course every three years.
sentences.chinese: 理事会规定所有护士必须每三年参加一次进修课程。

detailed_translations.english: if something is mandatory, the law says it must be done

sentences.english: A caterpillar transforms into a butterfly.
sentences.chinese: 毛虫变成了蝴蝶。

sentences.english: The caterpillar might well give you nightmares though!
sentences.chinese: 但是，它的毛虫却可能引起你噩梦！

sentences.english: The caterpillars grow.This caterpillar is big and fat.
sentences.chinese: 这毛虫渐渐成长.这个毛虫是大的和肥的。

detailed_translations.english: a small creature like a  worm  with many legs that eats leaves and that develops into a  butterfly  or other flying insect

sentences.english: The report says climate change could also increase the prevalence of dengue fever.
sentences.chinese: 报告表示，气候变化还有可能增加登革热的流行强度。

sentences.english: Generating epidemiological data on the prevalence and risk factors of obesity in dogs.
sentences.chinese: 针对狗肥胖症的流行程度和风险因素获得流行病学数据。

sentences.english: The prevalence of these widgets means they can report on almost all your browsing activity, which can then be linked to databases full of the social data you intentionally share.
sentences.chinese: 这些小工具的流行意味着它们能上报几乎所有的你的浏览行为，通过这些行为就能链接到你主动共享出来，满是你社交信息的数据库。

sentences.english: He’s always getting into scraps with other dogs.
sentences.chinese: 它老是和别的狗打起来。

sentences.english: There's always tons of scrap paper in Dad's office.
sentences.chinese: 爸爸的办公室里总有大量的废纸。

detailed_translations.english: a short fight or argument
Scrap metal or paper is no longer wanted for its original purpose, but may have some other use

name: conjunction
trans: 结合， 联合； 连接词

sentences.english: The conjunction of low inflation and low unemployment came as a very pleasant surprise.
sentences.chinese: 低通货膨胀与低失业的同时出现是一大惊喜。

sentences.english: The two clauses are joined by a conjunction.
sentences.chinese: 这两个分句由一个连词连在一起.

detailed_translations.english: a combination of events, etc., that causes a particular result

sentences.english: people who suffer from irritable bowel syndrome
sentences.chinese: 患有肠道过敏综合征的人

detailed_translations.chinese: [临床] 综合症状；并发症状；校验子；并发位
detailed_translations.english: an illness which consists of a set of physical or mental problems – often used in the name of illnesses

sentences.english: American children did less well in math than their peers in Japan.
sentences.chinese: 美国儿童的数学成绩不如日本的同龄儿童。

sentences.english: Staff members are trained by their peers.
sentences.chinese: 员工由同事培训。

detailed_translations.english: your peers are the people who are the same age as you, or who have the same type of job, social class etc

sentences.english: The Puritans left England to escape being persecuted.
sentences.chinese: 清教徒离开了英国以躲避迫害。

detailed_translations.english: to treat someone cruelly or unfairly over a period of time, especially because of their religious or political beliefs

name: imperative
trans: 必要的； 紧急的； 命令的

sentences.english: It is imperative that politicians should be good communicators.
sentences.chinese: 政治家应该是很好的沟通者，这很重要。

detailed_translations.chinese: 必要的；紧急的，极重要的；命令的
detailed_translations.english: extremely important and needing to be done or dealt with immediately

detailed_translations.chinese: 必要的事， 必须完成的事； 【语】祈使语气
detailed_translations.english: something that must be done urgently

sentences.english: a species of fish hitherto unknown in the West
sentences.chinese: 迄今在西方还不为人知的一种鱼

detailed_translations.english: up to this time

name: succession
trans: 连续； 继位； 【生】 自然演替

sentences.english: If the prince dies, the succession passes to his son.

detailed_translations.english: a sudden quick movement of a liquid, electricity, chemical etc through something
if a feeling surges or surges up, you begin to feel it very strongly

sentences.english: a machine for dispensing cash
sentences.chinese: 取款机

detailed_translations.english: to give something to people, especially in fixed amounts

sentences.english: The problems do not end if crocodiles successfully hatch from the eggs.
sentences.chinese: 即使鳄鱼成功地从卵中孵化出来，这些问题也不会终止。

detailed_translations.english: a hole in a ship or aircraft, usually used for loading goods, or the door that covers it
if an egg hatches, or if it is hatched, it breaks, letting the young bird, insect etc come out

sentences.english: the pernicious effects of poverty
sentences.chinese: 贫穷的危害性

sentences.english: the media’s pernicious influence
sentences.chinese: 媒体的有害影响

detailed_translations.chinese: 有害的；恶性的；致命的；险恶的
detailed_translations.english: very harmful or evil, often in a way that you do not notice easily

sentences.english: I’ve got a splinter in my finger.
sentences.chinese: 我的手指扎了一根刺。

detailed_translations.chinese: 碎片；微小的东西；极瘦的人
detailed_translations.english: a small sharp piece of wood, glass, or metal, that has broken off a larger piece
if something such as wood splinters, or if you splinter it, it breaks into thin sharp pieces

sentences.english: Jackson said her boss became increasingly depressed and reverted to smoking heavily.
sentences.chinese: 杰克逊说她的老板变得越来越抑郁，又重新大量吸烟了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 回复；重提；返祖遗传；归还
detailed_translations.english: When people or things revert to a previous state, system, or type of behaviour, they go back to it

name: indiscriminate
trans: 不加区别的； 不受限制的

sentences.english: the indiscriminate use of chemical fertilizers
sentences.chinese: 化肥的滥用

detailed_translations.chinese: 任意的；无差别的；不分皂白的
detailed_translations.english: an indiscriminate action is done without thinking about what harm it might cause

sentences.english: The meat of the herbivore is, in comparison, far more edible , smellwise.
sentences.chinese: 相对地，食草动物的肉闻起来要好些，更易食用。

sentences.english: I only eat vegetables (scientists call me a herbivore) -- almost always leaves from the tops of trees.
sentences.chinese: 我只吃蔬菜(科学家称我为草食动物)—几乎常常是树梢的叶子。

sentences.english: You probably would call me a vegetarian. But scientists call me a herbivore because I only eat leaves, grass and other plants.
sentences.chinese: 可能你会说我是素食者，但科学家称我为草食动物，因为我只吃叶子、草和其它植物。

detailed_translations.english: an animal that only eats plants

name: reconcile
trans: 调停， 调解； 调和， 使一致； 使协调， 使和解

sentences.english: The possibility remains that the two theories may be reconciled.
sentences.chinese: 这两种理论仍是有可能协调的。

sentences.english: The pair were reconciled after Jackson made a public apology.
sentences.chinese: 杰克逊公开道歉之后，这两个人又言归于好了。

detailed_translations.english: if you reconcile two ideas, situations, or facts, you find a way in which they can both be true or acceptable

name: condition
trans: 条件； 情况； 环境

sentences.english: Profits increased by £1.5m, despite the difficult economic conditions.
sentences.chinese: 尽管经济形势不佳，利润还是增长了150万英镑。

detailed_translations.english: the state that something is in, especially how good or bad its physical state is

sentences.english: If you leave valuables in your car it will tempt thieves.
sentences.chinese: 如果把贵重物品留在车上，会招来小偷的。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone want to have or do something, even though they know they really should not

sentences.english: They were accused of peddling drugs .
sentences.chinese: 他们被控贩卖毒品。

sentences.english: people who peddle cigarettes to young children
sentences.chinese: 卖香烟给小孩子的人

detailed_translations.english: to sell goods to people, especially goods that people disapprove of because they are illegal, harmful, or of not very high quality

name: ethic
trans: 道德标准， 行为准则

sentences.english: The old ethic of hard work has given way to a new ethic of instant gratification.
sentences.chinese: 旧有的崇尚勤勉的道德观已被及时行乐的新观念所取代。

detailed_translations.english: a general idea or belief that influences people’s behaviour and attitudes

name: indistinguishable
trans: 难区分的， 不能分辨的

sentences.english: Replica weapons are indistinguishable from the real thing.
sentences.chinese: 仿真武器与真武器难以辨别。

detailed_translations.chinese: 不能区别的，不能辨别的；不易察觉的
detailed_translations.english: If one thing is indistinguishable from another, the two things are so similar that it is difficult to know which is which

name: catalytic
trans: 催化的， 起催化作用的

sentences.english: ...carbon molecules with unusual chemical and catalytic properties.
sentences.chinese: ...具有不寻常的化学催化属性的碳分子。

detailed_translations.chinese: 接触反应的；起催化作用的
detailed_translations.english: In chemistry, a catalytic substance or a substance with catalytic properties is a substance which increases the speed of a chemical reaction

sentences.english: King Alfonso XIII abdicated in favour of his eldest son.
sentences.chinese: 国王阿方索十三世把王位让给了长子。

sentences.english: The king was forced to abdicate the throne .
sentences.chinese: 国王被迫退位。

detailed_translations.english: to give up the position of being king or queen

sentences.english: This drug speeds up your metabolism.
sentences.chinese: 这种药物会加快你的新陈代谢。

detailed_translations.english: the chemical processes by which food is changed into energy in your body

name: evil
trans: 邪恶； 坏事， 恶行

sentences.english: She wanted to protect her children from the evils of the outside world.
sentences.chinese: 她想保护她的孩子不受外界的不良影响。

sentences.english: Poverty is one of the greatest social evils of our time.
sentences.chinese: 贫困是当代最大的社会弊端之一。

sentences.english: the evils of capitalism
sentences.chinese: 资本主义的种种祸害

sentences.english: There is too much evil in the world.
sentences.chinese: 世上的罪恶太多。

sentences.english: an evil dictator responsible for the deaths of millions
sentences.chinese: 对数百万人之死负责的邪恶独裁者

detailed_translations.english: something that is very bad or harmful
someone who is evil deliberately does very cruel things to harm other people

sentences.english: an illegal drug cartel
sentences.chinese: 非法贩毒集团

detailed_translations.chinese: 卡特尔；企业联合；垄断联盟；俘虏交换条约
detailed_translations.english: a group of people or companies who agree to sell something at a particular price in order to prevent competition and increase profits

name: cardiopulmonary
trans: 心肺的； 与心肺有关的

sentences.english: And the Mid-Autumn Festival for me, both enjoyable and warm, also have swept cardiopulmonary cold.
sentences.chinese: 而中秋留给我的，既有其乐融融的温暖，也有掠人心肺的寒凉。

detailed_translations.chinese: 心肺的； 与心肺有关的
detailed_translations.english: of, relating to, or affecting the heart and lungs

name: forthcoming
trans: 将来的； 现成的， 随要随到的

sentences.english: the forthcoming elections
sentences.chinese: 即将到来的选举

sentences.english: Keep an eye on the noticeboards for forthcoming events .
sentences.chinese: 请注意布告牌上的活动预告。

detailed_translations.english: a forthcoming event, meeting etc is one that has been planned to happen soon

name: patriotic
trans: 爱国的， 有爱国心的

sentences.english: patriotic songs
sentences.chinese: 爱国歌曲

sentences.english: a patriotic man who served his country well
sentences.chinese: 为国尽忠的爱国者

detailed_translations.english: having or expressing a great love of your country

sentences.english: Millions of refugees have suffered a total dislocation of their lives.
sentences.chinese: 几百万难民饱受生活颠沛流离之苦。

detailed_translations.english: Dislocation is a situation in which something such as a system, process, or way of life is greatly disturbed or prevented from continuing as normal

sentences.english: Shea’s symptoms perplexed the doctors.
sentences.chinese: 谢伊的症状令医生们困惑。

detailed_translations.english: if something perplexes you, it makes you feel confused and worried because it is difficult to understand

name: complication
trans: 并发症； 复杂， 复杂化

sentences.english: The fact that the plane was late added a further complication to our journey.
sentences.chinese: 飞机误点给我们的旅行带来了更大的麻烦。

sentences.english: Pneumonia is one of the common complications faced by bed-ridden patients.
sentences.chinese: 肺炎是卧床病人所面临的常见并发症之一。

detailed_translations.english: a problem or situation that makes something more difficult to understand or deal with

name: irradiate
trans: 照射； 使明亮， 生辉

sentences.english: ...the Chernobyl disaster, which irradiated large parts of Europe.
sentences.chinese: ...辐射了欧洲大部的切尔诺贝利灾难。

detailed_translations.chinese: 照耀；使灿烂；启发；放射；使某物生辉
detailed_translations.english: if someone or something is irradiated,  x-rays  or  radioactive  beams are passed through them

sentences.english: He teaches Esperanto at that university.
sentences.chinese: 他在那所大学教世界语。

sentences.english: She buddied up with a student from another university.
sentences.chinese: 她与来自另一大学的一名学生交朋友。

sentences.english: The student left the university to go out into the world and find himself.
sentences.chinese: 这个学生离开了大学进入社会去发现自己的才能所在。

detailed_translations.english: an educational institution at the highest level, where you study for a degree

sentences.english: The ethics committee may take a decision to admonish him or to censure him.
sentences.chinese: 道德规范委员会可能决定对他进行警告或批评。

detailed_translations.english: If you censure someone for something that they have done, you tell them that you strongly disapprove of it
the act of expressing strong disapproval and criticism

name: chatter
trans: 喋喋不休地说； 颤动

sentences.english: She chattered away happily until she noticed I wasn’t listening.
sentences.chinese: 她开心地说个不停，直到发觉我没在听才停下来。

sentences.english: She chattered excitedly like a child.
sentences.chinese: 她像个孩子似的兴奋地讲个不停。

detailed_translations.chinese: 唠叨；喋喋不休；（动物等）吱吱叫
detailed_translations.english: to talk quickly in a friendly way without stopping, especially about things that are not serious or important

detailed_translations.chinese: 唠叨；饶舌；（动物的）啁啾声；潺潺流水声
detailed_translations.english: talk, especially about things that are not serious or important

sentences.english: In the case of this battle, the combat did only last a singleday.
sentences.chinese: 在译成战役的情况下，这场战斗仅仅持续了短短的一天。

sentences.english: We will remove our combat brigades from Iraq by the end of next summer, and all of our troops by the end of 2011.
sentences.chinese: 我们会在明年夏末从伊拉克撤回我们的战斗旅，在2011年末，我们所有军队都将从伊拉克撤出。

sentences.english: These people would then be given training in vigilance and combat not just to defend themselves but also the borders.
sentences.chinese: 这些人会被提供警戒和战斗训练，不仅是为了保护自己，而且要保护边界安全。

detailed_translations.english: fighting, especially during a war

sentences.english: She despised her neighbours.
sentences.chinese: 她看不起她的邻居。

detailed_translations.english: to dislike and have a low opinion of someone or something

sentences.english: ...a sheet of plywood.
sentences.chinese: …一张胶合板。

detailed_translations.english: a material made of several thin layers of wood that are stuck together to form a strong board

name: dioxide
trans: 二氧化物 containing two atoms of oxygen in the molecule)

sentences.english: carbon/sulphur dioxide
sentences.chinese: 二氧化碳／硫

detailed_translations.english: a chemical compound that contains two atoms of oxygen and one atom of another chemical element

sentences.english: ...an annual levy on all drivers.
sentences.chinese: …向所有司机征收的年税。

sentences.english: a new tax levied on all electrical goods
sentences.chinese: 对所有电器商品征收的一种新税

detailed_translations.english: an additional sum of money, usually paid as a tax
to officially say that people must pay a tax or charge

name: indulge
trans: 享受； 沉湎于； 放纵

sentences.english: Only rarely will she indulge in a glass of wine.
sentences.chinese: 她只是偶尔才会喝上杯葡萄酒。

sentences.english: He returned to Ohio so that he could indulge his passion for football.
sentences.chinese: 他重返俄亥俄以释放自己对足球的激情。

detailed_translations.chinese: 沉溺， 纵容自己， 肆意从事
detailed_translations.english: If you indulge in something or if you indulge yourself, you allow yourself to have or do something that you know you will enjoy

detailed_translations.chinese: 使沉溺于，满足；纵容，迁就
detailed_translations.english: to let someone have or do whatever they want, even if it is bad for them

name: pursue
trans: 追求； 追击； 继续

sentences.english: She plans to pursue a career in politics.
sentences.chinese: 她计划从政。

sentences.english: Students should pursue their own interests , as well as do their school work.
sentences.chinese: 除了完成课业之外，学生也应该追求自己的兴趣。

sentences.english: a campaign promise to pursue policies that will help the poor
sentences.chinese: 贯彻扶贫政策的竞选承诺

detailed_translations.english: to continue doing an activity or trying to achieve something over a long period of time

sentences.english: The sun was surrounded by a golden haze.
sentences.chinese: 太阳被一片金色烟霞笼罩。

detailed_translations.english: smoke, dust, or mist in the air which is difficult to see through
to make or become hazy

sentences.english: From all points of view, war would be a catastrophe.
sentences.chinese: 从各个方面来看，战争都会是一场灾难。

detailed_translations.english: a terrible event in which there is a lot of destruction, suffering, or death

name: convey
trans: 运载， 运送； 表达

sentences.english: All this information can be conveyed in a simple diagram.
sentences.chinese: 所有这些信息可以通过一张简单的图表来表示。

sentences.english: Ads convey the message that thin is beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 广告传递的信息是: 瘦就是美。

sentences.english: He was sent to convey a message to the UN Secretary General.
sentences.chinese: 他被派去向联合国秘书长传达一条信息。

detailed_translations.english: to communicate or express something, with or without using words

name: detrimental
trans: 损害的， 造成伤害的

sentences.english: the detrimental effect of pollution on the environment
sentences.chinese: 污染对环境的不利影响

detailed_translations.english: causing harm or damage

detailed_translations.chinese: 有害的人（或物）；不受欢迎的求婚者

sentences.english: Her husband was later treated for a fractured skull.
sentences.chinese: 她丈夫后来因颅骨碎裂而接受治疗。

detailed_translations.english: the bones of a person’s or animal’s head

sentences.english: There were several possibilities open to each manufacturer.
sentences.chinese: 每个制造商都可以有几种不同的选择。

detailed_translations.english: A possibility is one of several different things that could be done.

sentences.english: a quiet country lane
sentences.chinese: 一条宁静的乡间小路

sentences.english: ...after being disqualified for running out of his lane in the 200 metres.
sentences.chinese: …在200米比赛中由于冲出跑道而被取消比赛资格以后。

detailed_translations.english: a narrow road in the countryside

sentences.english: Drinking water supplies are believed to have been contaminated.
sentences.chinese: 据信饮用水已受到污染。

detailed_translations.english: to make a place or substance dirty or harmful by putting something such as chemicals or poison in it

sentences.english: With friends, she sometimes alluded to a feeling that she herself was to blame for her son's predicament.
sentences.chinese: 和朋友们一起时，她有时暗示她感到儿子的困境要怪她自己。

detailed_translations.chinese: 暗指，转弯抹角地说到；略为提及，顺便提到
detailed_translations.english: If you allude to something, you mention it in an indirect way

sentences.english: ...malarial parasites.
sentences.chinese: …疟疾寄生虫。

detailed_translations.english: You can use malarial to refer to things connected with malaria or areas which are affected by malaria

name: elevation
trans: 高地； 海拔； 正面图

sentences.english: The city is at an elevation of 2 000 metres.
sentences.chinese: 这座城市海拔2000米。

detailed_translations.english: the height of a place, especially its height above sea level

sentences.english: My Bostonian bug turned out to be one of many on the forefront of an unprecedented resurgence.
sentences.chinese: 我的这只来自波士顿的臭虫被证明是前所未有的复苏的众多臭虫中的一只。

sentences.english: Then the crash, happened here and there. Only Israel got a double whammy of the Second Intifada and a resurgence of violence starting around the same time.
sentences.chinese: 然后是到处发生破产，只有以色列遭受了第二次巴勒斯坦人起义和到处开始的复苏的暴力行动的双重打击。

sentences.english: A major significant failure of the resurgence of market-oriented policies was a failure to reform the monetary system.
sentences.chinese: 以市场为导向的经济政策复苏的一个重要的大失败就是货币体系改革的失败。

sentences.english: With no natural predators on the island, the herd increased rapidly.
sentences.chinese: 由于岛上没有天然食肉动物，牧群的数量迅速增加。

detailed_translations.english: an animal that kills and eats other animals

sentences.english: The punishments accorded with the current code of discipline.
sentences.chinese: 处罚与现行的纪律规则一致。

detailed_translations.english: a situation in which two people, ideas, or statements agree with each other

detailed_translations.chinese: 使符合；使一致；调节；授予，赠与，给予
detailed_translations.english: to give someone or something special attention or a particular type of treatment

sentences.english: The company’s property may even be forfeit.
sentences.chinese: 公司财产甚至可能被没收。

detailed_translations.chinese: 罚金；没收物；丧失的东西
detailed_translations.english: something that is taken away from you or something that you have to pay, because you have broken a rule or made a mistake

detailed_translations.chinese: 因受罚而丧失的；被没收的
detailed_translations.english: to be legally or officially taken away from you as a punishment

detailed_translations.chinese: （因犯罪、失职、违约等）丧失（权利、名誉、生命等）

sentences.english: Peak updraft strength is slightly enhanced with hodograph curvature, 29.0 m/s in B versus 26.1 in C.
sentences.chinese: 山顶上升气流强度随速矢端迹曲率加大而稍有加强，在（图上）B点是每秒29米，C点是每秒26.1米。

sentences.english: As the hot air rises, a powerful updraft is also created by the tower that allows air to be continually sucked through 32 turbines, which spin to generate power 24 hours a day.
sentences.chinese: 当热空气上升时，一股有力的上升气流被可以让32个涡轮持续吸引的塔所生成，那些涡轮可以产生24小时的动力来纺纱。

sentences.english: Finally, a two-megawatt solar updraft tower produces additional energy in clear weather.
sentences.chinese: 最后是一座2兆瓦的太阳能热气流发电塔。 它能在天气晴朗时产生超过大厦自身需要的能源。

sentences.english: an automatic weapon
sentences.chinese: 自动武器

sentences.english: an automatic gearbox
sentences.chinese: 自动变速箱

sentences.english: My camera is fully automatic .
sentences.chinese: 我的照相机是全自动的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 自动的； 必然发生的； 无意识的
detailed_translations.english: an automatic machine is designed to work without needing someone to operate it for each part of a process
a weapon that can fire bullets continuously

sentences.english: a citywide campaign to fight racism
sentences.chinese: 全市反种族歧视运动

detailed_translations.english: involving all the areas of a city

sentences.english: ticket inspectors
sentences.chinese: 查票员

sentences.english: a Health and Safety inspector
sentences.chinese: 健康安全督察员

sentences.english: Standards of discipline at the school were strongly criticized in the inspector’s report.
sentences.chinese: 督察员在报告里狠狠地批评了这所学校的纪律水准。

detailed_translations.english: an official whose job is to check that something is satisfactory and that rules are being obeyed

sentences.english: It had rained for four consecutive days.
sentences.chinese: 雨接连下了四天。

sentences.english: Can they win the title for the third consecutive season?
sentences.chinese: 他们能连续第三个赛季赢得冠军称号吗？

detailed_translations.english: consecutive numbers or periods of time follow one after the other without any interruptions

sentences.english: a fibre-optic probe
sentences.chinese: 一根光纤探针

sentences.english: The surgeon would pick up his instruments, probe, repair, and stitch up again.
sentences.chinese: 外科医生会拿起器械进行探查、修复，然后再缝合。

detailed_translations.english: a long thin metal instrument that doctors and scientists use to examine parts of the body
to look for something or examine something, using a long thin object

sentences.english: Which number is the quotient in the equation?
sentences.chinese: 在这个等式中，哪个数是商？

sentences.english: The paper discusses the relation of entropy change and quotient of heat-temperature based on the second law of thermodynamics.
sentences.chinese: 通过热力学第二定律，从理论上分析熵变与热温商之间的关系，再进一步由实践验证。

sentences.english: This paper discusses the calculus of residues of quotient function at ist pole, then obtains some computational formulas by the use of determinant.
sentences.chinese: 本文讨论了商函数在其极点处的残数计算，得到几个用行列式表示的计算公式，并介绍了它们的应用。

detailed_translations.english: the number which is obtained when one number is divided by another

sentences.english: Computer games can improve children’s manual dexterity .
sentences.chinese: 电脑游戏可以提高儿童手的灵活性。

sentences.chinese: 在那次政变的余波之中，军队向示威者开了枪。

trans: 引诱； 促使， 引起

sentences.chinese: 没有什么能诱使我再投他的票了。

sentences.chinese: 医生们说手术可能导致心脏病。

trans: 不定期的， 非周期性的

sentences.english: One does this by redistributing the aerodynamic load along the wingspan or by incorporating the vortices coming off the horizontal stabilizer.

sentences.english: The frequency sense element is a hardcore in the eddy street flowmeter. The lift force of vortices influences the sensitivity of the frequency sense element.

sentences.english: Dustdevils are a well-known atmospheric phenomena on Mars, and as these new observations show, the devilish vortices can carve beautiful patterns in the Martian dust.

sentences.chinese: 他大部分时间都在拉瑟格伦度过，他的家人就在那里居住。

sentences.chinese: 该展览反映了国外的同期发展情况。

sentences.chinese: 豪华酒店

sentences.chinese: 这家公司巩固了作为该国主要煤气供应商的地位。

sentences.chinese: 生物医学研究将使许多感染艾滋病病毒的人们能够活得时间更长、更舒适。

name: disparate

sentences.chinese: 涉及许多不同议题的会议

sentences.chinese: 控方律师林恩·史密斯夫人称案件发生于1月27日。

sentences.chinese: 参加这以项目是自愿的，参与者可以在任何时间将贷款预付给政府。

sentences.chinese: 我们代表了曾经使这个国家伟大的仅存的品质–勤奋。

sentences.chinese: 在这里，富人和穷人比邻而居。

name: luminous

sentences.chinese: 发光涂料

sentences.chinese: 她那双黑色的大眼睛几乎是亮闪闪的。

sentences.chinese: ...类猴树栖有袋动物。

sentences.chinese: 展览会的全部费用是40万英镑。

sentences.chinese: 总的结果是人口增加。

sentences.chinese: 总冠军和第二名被选了出来。

sentences.chinese: 旧金山几乎失去了所有海运业。

sentences.chinese: 保留收据以备退货之需。

sentences.chinese: 不管他们任命的是谁，他都要负责财务方面的所有事务。

sentences.chinese: 在危急时刻，这些关系显得尤为重要。

sentences.chinese: 这些斑驳不清的照片中，一个被认为是偷猎者的人走近他的猎物，明显看出先割断它的喉咙然后给帮凶打了电话。

sentences.english: But there is no evidence in "Deadly Game" that the alleged poacher was heavily armed, or armed at all, when he was shot, and it is by no means clear that Zambia tolerated the killing of poachers.
sentences.chinese: 但是在《死亡游戏》中根本没有证据表明这名非法偷猎者在被枪杀时是全副武装的或者是携带武器的，而且赞比亚容忍杀死偷猎者的态度也是一点都不明确的。

sentences.english: people who have inhabited this land for millennia

sentences.english: For a moment she felt a pang of guilt about the way she was treating him.
sentences.chinese: 有那么一会儿她为自己对待他的方式感到一阵突然的愧疚。

detailed_translations.english: A pang is a sudden strong feeling or emotion, for example, of sadness or pain

sentences.english: predatory pricing
sentences.chinese: 掠夺性定价

detailed_translations.chinese: 掠夺的，掠夺成性的；食肉的；捕食生物的

sentences.chinese: 在音乐系里女学生占大多数。

sentences.english: The wine is aged in oak barrels.
sentences.chinese: 这种葡萄酒是用橡木酒桶放陈的。

detailed_translations.english: a large curved container with a flat top and bottom, made of wood or metal, and used for storing beer, wine etc

sentences.english: She said it is important to remember that in villages, there will always be an increasing number of sentinel birds between vaccination campaigns as chicks are constantly hatching.
sentences.chinese: 她说，在农村，在接种疫苗的战役之间总是存在数量不断增长的"哨兵"禽类，因为小鸡会不断地孵化出来。 意识到这一点是很重要的。

sentences.english: Moreover, at the gateway of every reading lesson stood sentinel an array of words, with separated syllables, and forbidding accent marks like fixed bayonets, barring the way to the infant mind.
sentences.chinese: 在每一课文的入口，都排列着一队音节分开的生字的哨兵，禁止通行的重音符号就像一把把瞄准的刺刀，阻挡了小孩的心的进入通道。

detailed_translations.english: a sentry

sentences.english: the disclosure of private medical information
sentences.chinese: 私人医疗信息的泄露

detailed_translations.chinese: [审计] 披露；揭发；被揭发出来的事情

sentences.english: The hotel has everything you could possibly desire .
sentences.chinese: 这家酒店里你想要的东西应有尽有。

sentences.english: Add lemon juice if desired .

detailed_translations.english: to want something very much

sentences.chinese: 5,000英镑的初始投资

sentences.english: The initial response has been encouraging.
sentences.chinese: 最初的反应情况很乐观。

detailed_translations.english: happening at the beginning
the first letter of someone’s first name

name: efficient
trans: 有效率的； 有能力的

sentences.english: a very efficient secretary
sentences.chinese: 效率高的秘书

sentences.chinese: 土地的有效使用

sentences.english: Lighting is now more energy efficient.
sentences.chinese: 如今的照明设备更加节能。

detailed_translations.english: if someone or something is efficient, they work well without wasting time, money, or energy

sentences.english: The breakthrough permits direct detection of each nucleotide, allowing an entire gene to be sequenced in about an hour.
sentences.chinese: 这个重大的突破允许直接检测每个核苷酸，可以在大约一小时之内测序整个基因。

sentences.english: A SNP is a variation in just one nucleotide of a genetic sequence; think of it as a spelling change affecting just one letter in an uncommonly long word.
sentences.chinese: 一个SNP就是只在一个基因序列的一个核苷酸中发生的变异；就像一个拼写变化只影响一个罕见的长单词中的一个字母。

sentences.english: In the genetic code that life has used up to now, there are 64 possible triplet combinations of the four nucleotide letters; these genetic "words" are called codons.
sentences.chinese: 从生命开始使用遗传密码到现在，核苷酸的四个字母的三重组合有64个可能，这些遗传“字词”被称为密码子。

detailed_translations.english: a compound consisting of a nucleoside linked to phosphoric acid

name: rudimentary
trans: 基础的， 初步的； 发育不全的

sentences.chinese: 我逐渐掌握了基本的音乐知识。

sentences.english: ...fungi that have a symbiotic relationship with the trees of these northwestern forests.

trans: 始终如一的， 一致的； 坚持的

sentences.chinese: 我们在方法上要前后一致。

detailed_translations.english: always behaving in the same way or having the same attitudes, standards etc – usually used to show approval

sentences.english: Reverse the paper in the printer.
sentences.chinese: 把打印机中的纸翻过来。

sentences.english: The wrong attitude will have exactly the reverse effect.
sentences.chinese: 这种错误的态度会得到恰好相反的结果。

detailed_translations.chinese: 相反情况，对立面；反面，背面，后面；损失，倒退
detailed_translations.english: the exact opposite of what has just been mentioned

sentences.english: ...pests like aphids which infest cereal crops.
sentences.chinese: …像蚜虫那样大肆侵害谷类作物的害虫。

detailed_translations.english: if insects, rats etc infest a place, there are a lot of them and they usually cause damage

name: barren
trans: 贫瘠的； 没有的， 缺乏的

sentences.chinese: 很久很久以前，地面还是一片荒漠。

sentences.english: He prayed that his barren wife would one day have a child.
sentences.chinese: 他祈祷自己不孕的妻子有朝一日能怀上宝宝。

detailed_translations.english: (of land or soil) not good enough for plants to grow on it
