sentences.chinese: 基督教承诺的永生

sentences.english: She’s an eternal optimist (= she always expects that good things will happen ).
sentences.chinese: 她永远是个乐观主义者。

detailed_translations.english: continuing for ever and having no end

sentences.english: Little could be done to redress the situation .
sentences.chinese: 局势难以挽回。

sentences.english: Affirmative action was meant to redress the balance (= make the situation fair ) for minorities.

sentences.chinese: 如果没有真菌，这里将成为另一个沙洲。

sentences.chinese: 但是，如果没有真菌，我们就不会有花园、住宅，甚至脚。

sentences.chinese: 这些含碳化合物有部分从根部被共生真菌和土壤中的微生物摄取，最后变成腐殖质储存在土壤里。

sentences.english: a building of great antiquity
sentences.chinese: 非常古老的建筑物

detailed_translations.english: ancient times

sentences.chinese: 他放弃了固定工作，为的是当一名自由职业者。

sentences.chinese: 西尔维娅从浴室拿来一条毛巾。

sentences.chinese: 什么娱乐设施现在是可用的？

sentences.english: She is such a gregarious and outgoing person.
sentences.chinese: 她就是这样一个爱社交而且外向的人。

detailed_translations.english: friendly and preferring to be with other people

sentences.chinese: …高能激光束。

detailed_translations.chinese: 发送；以梁支撑；用…照射；流露

sentences.chinese: 植物从土壤中吸取养分。

sentences.chinese: 现代美国文明

sentences.english: the ancient civilizations of Greece and Rome
sentences.chinese: 希腊和罗马的古代文明

sentences.english: The compact design of the machine allows it to be stored easily.
sentences.chinese: 这台机器的设计小巧灵便，易于存放。

sentences.chinese: 学生的房间很小巧，配有一张书桌、一张床和一个壁橱。

an official contract or agreement

sentences.chinese: 独立组织和联盟

detailed_translations.english: an arrangement in which two or more countries, groups etc agree to work together to try to change or achieve something

sentences.english: Jesse was an outlaw, a bandit, a criminal.
sentences.chinese: 杰西曾是个逃犯、土匪、罪犯。

sentences.chinese: 在一些州赌博被宣布为非法。

sentences.chinese: 德国政府已宣布一些法西斯团体为非法。

detailed_translations.english: When something is outlawed, it is made illegal

sentences.english: Apart from the capital outlay of buying the machine, dishwashers can actually save you money.
sentences.chinese: 抛开购买的费用不讲，洗碗机实际上能给你省钱。

sentences.chinese: 她脖子上戴着一串绿色的玻璃珠子。

detailed_translations.english: one of a set of small, usually round, pieces of glass, wood, plastic etc, that you can put on a string and wear as jewellery

sentences.english: ...the aviation industry.
sentences.chinese: …航空工业。

detailed_translations.english: the science or practice of flying in aircraft

sentences.english: Some insects, such as ants and bees, live in "eusocial" groups, in which different members carry out specialized jobs to help maintain the colony.
sentences.chinese: 有些昆虫，比如蚂蚁和蜜蜂，住在‘群居社会’，这里不同的成员各自完成特定的工作以确保殖民地的运转。

sentences.english: That challenges Wilson's theory by suggesting that blood ties are indeed what get eusocial groups started, the team concludes in tomorrow's issue of Science.
sentences.chinese: 这就挑战了威尔森的理论，因为血缘关系确实是群居社会开始的原因。

name: emulate
trans: 效仿； 努力赶上或超越

sentences.english: He hoped to emulate the success of Wilder.
sentences.chinese: 他希望效仿怀尔德的成功。

detailed_translations.chinese: 仿真；模仿；尽力赶上；同…竞争

sentences.english: The advice in the booklet reflects the practical experience we have gained (= experience gained by actually doing something, rather than knowledge from books etc ).
sentences.chinese: 小册子中的建议反映了我们所获得的实践经验。

sentences.english: I had some experience in fashion design.
sentences.chinese: 我有一些时装设计方面的经验。

sentences.english: She was turned down on the grounds of lack of experience.
sentences.chinese: 她因缺乏经验而被拒绝。

sentences.english: The book is based on personal experience .
sentences.chinese: 本书是根据个人经历写成的。

sentences.english: DDT is a pesticide that was first synthesized in 1874.
sentences.chinese: 滴滴涕是最初合成于1874年的杀虫剂。

detailed_translations.english: to make something by combining different things or substances

sentences.english: A new upsurge in construction is in the making.
sentences.chinese: 一个建设的新高潮正在兴起。

sentences.english: The last big locust upsurge ended early in 2005 and the current alert level is green or calm.
sentences.chinese: 上次大规模蝗虫高潮在2005年年初结束，目前的警报级别为绿色或平静。

detailed_translations.english: a sudden strong feeling

sentences.chinese: 用擀面杖把面团擀平。

sentences.english: But is it more than just the infusion of the catecholamine neurotransmitter, dopamine, or the mammalian hormone oxytocin?
sentences.chinese: 而它也许不止是儿茶酚胺类神经递质注入剂、多巴胺、或哺乳类动物的荷尔蒙催产素？

sentences.chinese: 实际上，罗闻全对待这种进化过程的态度是认真的：他喜欢向听众指出，他们都拥有可以在不同时刻使用的“哺乳动物”和“爬虫类”大脑。

sentences.english: Sometimes this is for good reason, because we understand the greater social cost of profligacy, but often it's just because our mammalian brains are programmed that way.
sentences.chinese: 有时候理由是很正当的，因为我们想到了更大范围的社会上的浪费，但更多的时候，仅仅是因为我们脑中那根哺乳动物的弦。

sentences.english: The disease can spread from one mammalian species to another.
sentences.chinese: 该疾病能够在不同的哺乳类物种之间传播。

detailed_translations.english: In zoology, mammalian means relating to mammals

sentences.english: Her suggestions were always squashed.
sentences.chinese: 她的建 议总是受到压制。

detailed_translations.english: to use your power or authority to stop something

detailed_translations.chinese: 壁球；挤压；咯吱声；南瓜属植物；（英）果汁饮料
detailed_translations.english: a game played by two people who use  rackets  to hit a small rubber ball against the walls of a square court

name: thermostat
trans: 为…配备恒温器； 用恒温器控制

sentences.english: They"ll quickly adjust her thermostat to high heat.
sentences.chinese: 他们会很快调整自己恒温器到高热量。

sentences.english: Thankfully these days I’m the one that controls the thermostat, so I keep it as warm as I like.
sentences.chinese: 谢天谢地的是这些天由我来调节恒温器，因此我将它设定在我最喜欢的充满暖意的室温。

detailed_translations.english: an instrument used for keeping a room or a machine at a particular temperature

detailed_translations.chinese: 为…配备恒温器；用恒温器控制

sentences.english: What does the word ‘curriculum’ denote that ‘course’ does not?
sentences.chinese: curriculum一词的哪些含义是course没有的？

detailed_translations.english: to mean something

name: renegade
trans: 背弃的， 离经叛道的

sentences.english: a renegade army unit
sentences.chinese: 一支变节的陆军分队

detailed_translations.english: someone who leaves one side in a war, politics etc in order to join the opposing side – used to show disapproval

sentences.english: a change of emphasis in government policy
sentences.chinese: 政府政策重心的变化

detailed_translations.chinese: 强调； 重视； 重要性
detailed_translations.english: special attention or importance

sentences.english: a Latin inscription on the memorial stone
sentences.chinese: 纪念碑上的拉丁语碑文

detailed_translations.english: a piece of writing inscribed on a stone, in the front of a book etc

name: propagate
trans: 繁殖； 宣传， 使普及

sentences.english: The group launched a website to propagate its ideas.
sentences.chinese: 这个团体建了一个网站来宣扬他们的主张。

sentences.english: The plant can be propagated from seed.
sentences.chinese: 这种植物可由种子繁殖。

detailed_translations.english: to spread an idea, belief etc to many people

sentences.english: Increasing unionization led to demands for higher wages and shorter hours.
sentences.chinese: 更多工人加入工会带来了对更高工资和更短工作时间的要求。

detailed_translations.english: The unionization of workers or industries is the process of workers becoming members of unions

sentences.english: a feasible solution
sentences.chinese: 可行的解决方法

detailed_translations.english: a plan, idea, or method that is feasible is possible and is likely to work

sentences.english: The physician examines the patient then diagnoses the disease and prescribes medication.
sentences.chinese: 内科医生检查了病人，然后对疾病作出诊断，并开出药方。

sentences.chinese: 法律规定这种罪行应受何处罚？

detailed_translations.english: to say what medicine or treatment a sick person should have

name: potential

sentences.chinese: 该公司已确定了60位潜在的客户。

the possibility that something will develop in a particular way, or have a particular effect

sentences.chinese: 传统疗法

sentences.english: He challenged the orthodox views on education.
sentences.chinese: 他对传统的教育观念提出了质疑。

detailed_translations.chinese: 正统的；传统的；惯常的；东正教的
detailed_translations.english: orthodox ideas, methods, or behaviour are accepted by most people to be correct and right

sentences.chinese: 由于缺乏资金，只能改变计划。

detailed_translations.english: to make it necessary for you to do something

sentences.chinese: 那些锅在老地方。

sentences.chinese: 弗洛伊德对人类心理的描述

sentences.english: A characteristic of the feminine psyche is to seek approval from others.
sentences.chinese: 女性心态的一个特征就是寻求他人的认同。

detailed_translations.english: someone’s mind, or their deepest feelings, which control their attitudes and behaviour

sentences.english: a cargo of contraband
sentences.chinese: 一批走私货

detailed_translations.chinese: 走私；走私货；战时禁运品（等于contraband of war）
detailed_translations.english: goods that are brought into a country illegally, especially to avoid tax

sentences.english: I’m afraid she’s also an adept liar.
sentences.chinese: 恐怕她还是一个撒谎专家。

detailed_translations.english: good at something that needs care and skill

sentences.english: The subjects were given quadruple the normal dosage of the drug.
sentences.chinese: 让实验对象服用了四倍于正常剂量的药物。

to increase and become four times as big or as high, or to make something increase in this way

sentences.english: the television lounge
sentences.chinese: 电视放映室

detailed_translations.english: a public room in a hotel or other building, that is used by many people as a place to relax

name: curiosity
trans: 好奇， 好奇心； 珍品， 古董

sentences.english: I opened the packet just to satisfy my curiosity .
sentences.chinese: 我打开包裹只是为了满足我的好奇心。

sentences.english: The news aroused a lot of curiosity among local people.
sentences.chinese: 这条消息在当地人中间引起了很大的好奇心。

sentences.english: She decided to follow him out of curiosity .
sentences.chinese: 她出于好奇决定跟踪他。

sentences.english: Margaret looked at him with curiosity .
sentences.chinese: 玛格丽特好奇地看着他。

sentences.english: a man of immense intellectual curiosity
sentences.chinese: 求知欲极强的一个男人

sentences.english: It was idle curiosity that made me ask.
sentences.chinese: 我只是好奇地随便问了一下。

detailed_translations.english: the desire to know about something

sentences.english: Weber took up the game at Iowa State University, in 1967, after becoming involved in the antiwar movement—in those days, rugby was a countercultural statement.
sentences.chinese: 1967年，韦伯在参加反战运动后，在衣阿华州立大学开始投身于这一运动——在那个年代，玩橄榄球曾经是反主流社会的宣言。

sentences.english: He said they should have the same rights to display their sexuality as straight men who 'play rugby, drink beer and talk about girls with their mates'.
sentences.chinese: 他说，这些人应该与那些玩橄榄球、喝啤酒并与伙伴们一起谈论女孩儿的非同性恋者一样，有同样的权利去表达他们的性取向。

detailed_translations.english: an outdoor game played by two teams with an  oval (= egg-shaped )  ball that you kick or carry

name: resist
trans: 抵制， 抵抗； 抗， 耐

sentences.english: to resist change
sentences.chinese: 抵制变革

sentences.english: He tried to pin me down, but I resisted.
sentences.chinese: 他试图制伏我，但我奋力反抗。

detailed_translations.english: to refuse to accept sth and try to stop it from happening

sentences.english: The courses were run to a consistent format.
sentences.chinese: 这些课程的编排是有连续性的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 设计，安排；格式，样式，版式
detailed_translations.english: the way in which something such as a television show or meeting is organized or arranged
to organize the space on a computer  disk  so that information can be stored on it

name: allotment
trans: 分配； 分配物； 养家费

sentences.english: The budget allotment for each county is below what is needed.
sentences.chinese: 分配给每个县的预算低于所需。

detailed_translations.chinese: 分配；分配物；养家费；命运
detailed_translations.english: an amount or share of something such as money or time that is given to someone or something, or the process of doing this

sentences.english: The minister stressed the need for economic sacrifice.
sentences.chinese: 部长强调了在经济上作出牺牲的必要性。

sentences.english: The workforce were willing to make sacrifices in order to preserve jobs.
sentences.chinese: 雇员为了保住饭碗情愿作出牺牲。

sentences.english: She brought three children up single-handedly, often at great personal sacrifice.
sentences.chinese: 她独自一人把三个孩子带大，常常需要作出巨大的个人牺牲。

sentences.english: They made sacrifices to ensure a good harvest.
sentences.chinese: 他们举行献祭以保丰收。

sentences.english: He sacrificed a promising career to look after his kids.
sentences.chinese: 他为了照看孩子牺牲了很有前途的事业。

detailed_translations.english: when you decide not to have something valuable, in order to get something that is more important
to willingly stop having something you want or doing something you like in order to get something more important

sentences.english: In this particular case, no one else was involved.
sentences.chinese: 这件事没有其他人牵涉其中。

sentences.english: Most students choose one particular area for research.
sentences.chinese: 大多数学生选择一个特定领域进行研究。

sentences.english: Marty’s very particular about his food.
sentences.chinese: 马蒂对食物很挑剔。

detailed_translations.chinese: 特别的，特指的；讲究的；挑剔的，吹毛求疵的
detailed_translations.english: a particular thing or person is the one that you are talking about, and not any other

sentences.english: illegal drugs
sentences.chinese: 违禁药品

sentences.english: They were involved in illegal activities.
sentences.chinese: 他们参与了非法活动。

detailed_translations.english: not allowed by the law

sentences.english: My corps ! your corps ! our corps ! maring corps !
sentences.chinese: 我的、你的、大家的海军陆战队！

sentences.english: The corps' corn in the corner is scorned by the stubborn corporation.
sentences.chinese: 军团在角落里的谷物受到了顽固的公司司（社团）的嘲笑。

detailed_translations.english: a trained army unit made of two or more  divisions (= groups of soldiers )

sentences.english: the President’s plan to stimulate economic growth
sentences.chinese: 总统刺激经济增长的计划

sentences.english: Her interest in art was stimulated by her father.
sentences.chinese: 她对艺术的兴趣是她父亲激发的。

detailed_translations.english: to encourage or help an activity to begin or develop further

sentences.english: The economy had eclipsed the environment as an election issue.
sentences.chinese: 经济作为竞选话题已经盖过环境问题。

detailed_translations.english: to become more important, powerful, famous etc than someone or something else, so that they are no longer noticed
an occasion when the sun or the moon cannot be seen, because the Earth is passing directly between the moon and the sun, or because the moon is passing directly between the Earth and the sun

sentences.english: Obesity correlates with increased risk for hypertension and stroke.
sentences.chinese: 过度肥胖与高血压和中风的发病风险增加密切相关。

detailed_translations.english: if two or more facts, ideas etc correlate or if you correlate them, they are closely connected to each other or one causes the other
if two or more facts, ideas etc correlate or if you correlate them, they are closely connected to each other or one causes the other

sentences.english: Few had expected that change to be as cataclysmic as it turned out to be.
sentences.chinese: 没有人预测到那些变化会变成一种大灾难。

detailed_translations.english: A cataclysmic event is one that changes a situation or society very greatly, especially in an unpleasant way

sentences.english: When I came to have feelings just like those foreigners, I realized that on the inside, it felt more like animosity.
sentences.chinese: 当我也有了其他外国人那样的感受时，我意识到在自己内心，我的感受更像是憎恶。

detailed_translations.english: strong dislike or hatred

sentences.english: They gave him drugs to counteract his withdrawal symptoms.
sentences.chinese: 他们给他服药以消除他的脱瘾症状。

detailed_translations.english: to reduce or prevent the bad effect of something, by doing something that has the opposite effect

sentences.english: an ample bosom
sentences.chinese: 丰满的胸部

detailed_translations.english: more than enough

name: soar
trans: 高飞； 猛增， 剧增

sentences.english: Her temperature soared.
sentences.chinese: 她的体温骤然升高。

sentences.english: The price of petrol has soared in recent weeks.
sentences.chinese: 最近几个星期汽油价格猛涨。

sentences.english: soaring unemployment
sentences.chinese: 急剧上升的失业率

detailed_translations.english: to increase quickly to a high level

sentences.english: He was debilitated by his illness.
sentences.chinese: 他由于生病身体虚弱。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone ill and weak

name: commute
trans: 坐公交车往返于两地； 变换； 交换

sentences.english: Baldry’s 20-year prison sentence was commuted to three years.
sentences.chinese: 鲍德里二十年的刑期被减至三年。

detailed_translations.chinese: 乘公交车上下班，经常乘车往返于两地
减； 折合， 折偿； 上下班交通
detailed_translations.english: to regularly travel a long distance to get to work

sentences.english: They announced a fall in pretax profits.
sentences.chinese: 他们宣布了税前利润的下降。

detailed_translations.english: Pretax profits or losses are the total profits or losses made by a company before tax has been taken away

name: sustain
trans: 支持， 维持； 遭受

sentences.english: He leant against her so heavily that she could barely sustain his weight.
sentences.chinese: 他重重地靠在她身上，让她几乎撑不住了。

sentences.english: Which planets can sustain life?
sentences.chinese: 哪些行星可以维持生命的存在？

detailed_translations.english: to hold up the weight of something

sentences.english: We’d classify Drabble’s novels under ‘Romance’.
sentences.chinese: 我们把德拉布尔的小说归类为“言情小说”。

sentences.english: Families are classified according to the father’s occupation.
sentences.chinese: 各个家庭按父亲的职业分类。

detailed_translations.english: to decide what group something belongs to

sentences.english: The aircraft had reached its cruising altitude of about 39,000 feet.
sentences.chinese: 那架飞机已经达到了大约三万九千英尺的巡航高度。

detailed_translations.english: the height of an object or place above the sea

sentences.english: She lived a life of ease.
sentences.chinese: 她过着悠闲自在的生活。

sentences.english: The plan should ease traffic congestion in the town.
sentences.chinese: 这项计划对城里的交通拥挤状况应该有所缓解。

detailed_translations.english: lack of difficulty
to become or to make sth less unpleasant, painful, severe, etc.

name: ethnographic
trans: 人种学的， 人种论的

sentences.english: Near Amsterdam there is an ethnographic museum where one can trace the history of klomps development, to see the fully automated production process of this unique wooden shoes.
sentences.chinese: 在阿姆斯特丹附近，有一个人种学博物馆，里面介绍了木屐鞋的发展历史，还能了解这种独特木鞋的整个自动化制作过程。

detailed_translations.english: Ethnographic refers to things that are connected with or relate to ethnography

sentences.english: Coach Ross made two substitutions in the second half.
sentences.chinese: 罗斯教练在下半场两次换人。

detailed_translations.chinese: 代替；[数] 置换；代替物
detailed_translations.english: when someone or something is replaced by someone or something else, or the person or thing being replaced

sentences.chinese: 怀疑与确信都是对于证据的主观反映。

detailed_translations.english: the state of being or feeling certain about something

sentences.english: cost overruns of £2 billion
sentences.chinese: 20亿英镑的超额费用

detailed_translations.english: Overrun is also a noun
if unwanted things or people overrun a place, they spread over it in great numbers

name: critical
trans: 挑毛病的； 关键的； 危急的

sentences.english: He made some highly critical remarks.
sentences.chinese: 他发表了一些严厉的批判性言论。

detailed_translations.english: if you are critical, you criticize someone or something

sentences.chinese: 你们都住在哪，你们接近一个反应堆吗？

sentences.english: Then you have, in terms of the barrier integrity, reactor cooling systems activity, cladding failure.
sentences.chinese: 然后你们会有，在屏障完整性，反应堆冷却系统行为，覆盖层失效。

sentences.chinese: 在将近三年中，AECL仔细检查了枫叶的计算过程，但结果仍然如此：如果它的反应堆运行模式无误，那么PCR就应该是负值。

sentences.english: We offer a monthly stipend plus a travel allowance.
sentences.chinese: 我们提供每月的薪水，外加旅游津贴。

detailed_translations.english: an amount of money paid regularly to someone, especially a priest, as a salary or as money to live on

sentences.english: I envisioned a future of educational excellence.
sentences.chinese: 我展望了一个有着优质教育的未来。

detailed_translations.english: to imagine something that you think might happen in the future, especially something that you think will be good

name: radiant
trans: 辐射的； 发光的； 容光焕发的

sentences.english: She looked radiant in a white silk dress.
sentences.chinese: 她身穿白色真丝礼服，看上去光彩照人。

sentences.english: a radiant smile
sentences.chinese: 灿烂的笑容

detailed_translations.chinese: 辐射的；容光焕发的；光芒四射的

sentences.chinese: 甲型肝炎属偶发疾病，在世界各地流行，有循环复发的趋势。

sentences.chinese: 穿过厚装甲的子弹

sentences.chinese: 阳光几乎照不进那些肮脏的窗户。

detailed_translations.english: to enter something and pass or spread through it, especially when this is difficult

sentences.english: The theory is based on the assumption of labor homogeneity.
sentences.chinese: 劳动价值论是建立在劳动同质性假设基础上的。

sentences.english: Differentiation to general meaning is referring things transmit from homogeneity to heterogeneity.
sentences.chinese: 分化在一般意义上是指事物从同质性向异质性的转变。

sentences.english: But it responded to a hostility to Islam and a craving for security and cultural homogeneity that is finding adherents across the western world — and not just on the far right.
sentences.chinese: 不过，它回应了对伊斯兰的敌意和对安全及文化同质的渴望，而这两者在整个西方世界——而不仅仅是在极右翼人群中——的支持者越来越多。

sentences.english: His principal reason for making the journey was to visit his family.
sentences.chinese: 他那次旅程的首要目的是探访家人。

sentences.english: Teaching is her principal source of income.
sentences.chinese: 教书是她主要的收入来源。

sentences.english: the principal character in the book
sentences.chinese: 书里的主人公

detailed_translations.english: most important

detailed_translations.chinese: 负责人， 校长； 资本， 本金； 主要演员， 主角
detailed_translations.english: someone who is in charge of a school

sentences.english: He started as a stand-up comedian (= someone who tells jokes to an audience ) .
sentences.chinese: 他最初是一名单口喜剧演员。

detailed_translations.english: someone whose job is to tell jokes and make people laugh

sentences.english: Thank you. You’ve been exceedingly kind.
sentences.chinese: 谢谢，你真是太好了。

detailed_translations.english: extremely

sentences.english: a blood specimen
sentences.chinese: 血样

detailed_translations.english: a small amount or piece that is taken from something, so that it can be tested or examined

sentences.english: You have been working at a brutal pace since mid-October and there's been no letup .
sentences.chinese: 你自从十月中以后就一直在一个残忍的速度工作，而且已经没有停止。

name: exotic
trans: 外来的； 异乎寻常的

sentences.english: exotic birds
sentences.chinese: 外国的奇异鸟类

sentences.english: exotic places
sentences.chinese: 有异国风情的地方

detailed_translations.chinese: 异国的；外来的；异国情调的
detailed_translations.english: something that is exotic seems unusual and interesting because it is related to a foreign country – use this to show approval

sentences.english: My newlywed wife and I are deeply in love.
sentences.chinese: 我和我的新婚妻子彼此深爱着对方。

sentences.english: Lavalais raised his glass to propose a toast to the newlyweds.
sentences.chinese: 拉瓦莱斯举起了他的酒杯，向这对新婚夫妇敬酒。

detailed_translations.english: Newlyweds are a man and woman who have very recently got married to each other

sentences.english: a carcinogenic substance
sentences.chinese: 致癌物质

detailed_translations.english: likely to cause  cancer

sentences.english: We boycott all products tested on animals.
sentences.chinese: 我们抵制所有拿动物做试验的产品。

sentences.english: They are now trying to organize a boycott.
sentences.chinese: 他们正试图组织一场抵制行动。

detailed_translations.english: to refuse to buy something, use something, or take part in something as a way of protesting
an act of boycotting something, or the period of time when it is boycotted

sentences.english: You can have a spiritual dimension to your life without being religious.
sentences.chinese: 即使你不信宗教，也可以在生命中拥有精神层面的内容。

detailed_translations.chinese: 方面;[数] 维；尺寸；次元；容积 vt标出尺寸
detailed_translations.english: a part of a situation or a quality involved in it

sentences.english: She was spiteful and unkind, both to Isabel and to her son.
sentences.chinese: 她又恶毒又刻薄，对伊莎贝尔这样，对她的儿子也这样。

sentences.english: a spiteful remark
sentences.chinese: 刻薄话

detailed_translations.english: deliberately nasty to someone in order to hurt or upset them

sentences.english: What have I done to deserve this?
sentences.chinese: 我做了什么事，要得到这样的报应？

sentences.english: I’m sorry for the kids. They deserve better (= deserve to be treated in a better way ) .
sentences.chinese: 我为这些孩子感到难过，他们应该过得更好。

sentences.english: Ledley deserves a place in the team.
sentences.chinese: 莱德利应该在队里占有一席之地。

sentences.english: Paula deserves a special mention for all the help she has given us.
sentences.chinese: 应该特别提一下葆拉，她给了我们许多帮助。

sentences.english: I would never hit anyone, even if they deserved it.
sentences.chinese: 我决不会打人，哪怕他欠揍。

sentences.english: What has he done to deserve this punishment ?
sentences.chinese: 他做了什么，竟会受到这样的惩罚？

sentences.english: People who are sent to prison for drunk-driving get what they deserve .
sentences.chinese: 那些醉酒驾车被送进监狱的人是罪有应得的。

detailed_translations.english: to have earned something by good or bad actions or behaviour

name: process
trans: 处理， 加工； 列队前进
过程， 进行； 步骤

sentences.english: the Israeli-Egyptian peace process
sentences.chinese: 以－埃和平进程

sentences.english: Recycling is an industrial process.
sentences.chinese: 回收利用是一个工业流程。

sentences.english: All university applications are processed through this system.
sentences.chinese: 所有大学入学申请都是由这个系统处理的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 过程，进程；；工序；工艺流程
detailed_translations.english: a series of actions that are done in order to achieve a particular result
to deal with an official document, request etc in the usual way

name: artisan
trans: 手工业工人， 手艺人

sentences.english: That allowed England to harness the creative potential of its artisan classes in a way that no other country had managed before.
sentences.chinese: 如此，使得英国得以在某种程度上利用本国工匠阶层创造性潜能产生巨大的能量，此为他国以前没有做到之事。

sentences.english: All of it appeared to be handmade, probably by a 17th century artisan.
sentences.chinese: 这里的一切似乎都是手工制作的，很可能出自一位17世纪工匠之手。

sentences.english: That would certainly not be true of the members of the artisan class or the military class for that reason.
sentences.chinese: 那对工匠阶级,与军人阶级,绝对不可能为真。

detailed_translations.english: someone who does skilled work, making things with their hands

sentences.english: She was hoping that the Mediterranean climate would restore her to full health.
sentences.chinese: 她希望地中海的气候能使她的身体完全复原。

sentences.english: The National Guard was called in to restore order (= make people stop fighting and breaking the law ) when riots broke out.
sentences.chinese: 暴乱爆发后，国民警卫队被调来恢复秩序。

sentences.english: initiatives to restore peace in the Middle East
sentences.chinese: 恢复中东和平的倡议

sentences.english: a Victorian fireplace restored to its former glory
sentences.chinese: 恢复了昔日华美的维多利亚时代的壁炉

sentences.english: The treaty restored Okinawa to Japan.
sentences.chinese: 该条约将冲绳归还给了日本。

detailed_translations.english: to make something return to its former state or condition

sentences.english: My main reason for subscribing to New Scientist is to keep abreast of advances in science.
sentences.chinese: 我订阅《新科学家》的主要原因是要跟上科学的进步。

sentences.english: Each employee may subscribe for up to £2,000 worth of shares.
sentences.chinese: 每位员工最高可以认购价值 2,000 英镑的股份。

sentences.english: The tour of Edinburgh is fully subscribed.
sentences.chinese: 去爱丁堡旅游的名额已经满了。

detailed_translations.english: to pay money, usually once a year, to have copies of a newspaper or magazine sent to you, or to have some other service

sentences.english: distilled water
sentences.chinese: 蒸馏水

detailed_translations.english: to make a liquid such as water or alcohol more pure by heating it so that it becomes a gas and then letting it cool. Drinks such as  whisky  are made this way.

sentences.english: new drug therapies
sentences.chinese: 新的药物疗法

sentences.english: radiation therapy for cancer treatment
sentences.chinese: 治疗癌症的放射疗法

detailed_translations.english: the treatment of an illness or injury over a fairly long period of time

name: alternative
trans: 轮流的，交替的；两者择一的；
二中择一； 供替代的选择

sentences.english: An alternative route is along the Via Unione.
sentences.chinese: 另一条路线是沿着联合路走。

detailed_translations.chinese: 两者选一的， 供选择的； 另类的
detailed_translations.english: an alternative idea, plan etc is different from the one you have and can be used instead

detailed_translations.chinese: 替换物，选择；选择的自由
detailed_translations.english: something you can choose to do or use instead of something else

name: paltry
trans: 无价值的， 微不足道的

sentences.english: paltry sum of money
sentences.chinese: 微不足道的一点钱

sentences.english: He received only a paltry £25 a day.
sentences.chinese: 他每天只能拿到可怜的25英镑。

detailed_translations.chinese: 不足取的；无价值的；琐碎的；卑鄙的
detailed_translations.english: a paltry amount of something is too small to be useful or important

name: concentration
trans: 专心， 专注； 集中； 浓度

sentences.english: She needed all her powers of concentration to stop herself from slipping on the icy road.
sentences.chinese: 她需要集中全部注意力才能不让自己在结冰的路上滑倒。

sentences.english: Lack of concentration was a real problem.
sentences.chinese: 注意力不集中是个大问题。

sentences.english: I lost my concentration and fell asleep.
sentences.chinese: 我精神一放松就睡着了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 集中； 专注， 专心； 浓缩； 浓度
detailed_translations.english: the ability to think about something carefully or for a long time

sentences.english: the velocity of light
sentences.chinese: 光速

sentences.english: The speedboat reached a velocity of 120 mph.
sentences.chinese: 快艇的时速达到了120英里。

sentences.english: a high velocity bullet
sentences.chinese: 高速子弹

detailed_translations.english: the speed of something that is moving in a particular direction

sentences.english: The doctor had encountered several similar cases in the past.
sentences.chinese: 那位医生过去曾碰到过好几个类似病例。

detailed_translations.english: to experience something, especially problems or opposition
an occasion when you meet someone, or do something with someone you do not know

sentences.english: About 160 species of rare birds live in the swamps and prairie there.
sentences.chinese: 大约有160种珍稀鸟类栖息在这里的沼泽地和大草原上。

sentences.english: How many an afternoon antinia and i have trailed along the prairie under the magnificence .
sentences.chinese: 有多少个下午，我同安东妮亚在大草原上这种壮丽的景色中慢慢地走着啊！

sentences.english: From your English garden variety to your prairie wildflower, floral prints tell a sweet story.
sentences.chinese: 从英式花园的百花齐放到大草原的野花儿，印花叙述着甜美的故事。

detailed_translations.english: a wide open area of fairly flat land in North America which is covered in grass or wheat

sentences.english: investigation of the liver by ultrasound
sentences.chinese: 对肝脏作的超声波检查

detailed_translations.english: sound that is too high for humans to hear

sentences.english: The crew ran through the preflight procedures.
sentences.chinese: 机组人员又复习了一遍飞行前的程序。

sentences.english: Truck fractures most often occur at maximum ground loads such as after fueling or during preflight taxi.
sentences.chinese: 支柱的断裂大多出现在最大载荷的时候诸如飞机后部加油时或在起飞前的滑跑过程中。

sentences.english: The crew ran through the preflight procedures. We ran through the witness's testimony before presenting it in court.
sentences.chinese: 机组人员又复习了一遍飞行前的程序。在法庭上出示之前，我们先过目一下见证人的证词。

detailed_translations.english: of or relating to the period just prior to a plane taking off

sentences.english: Is this a duplicate or the original?
sentences.chinese: 这是副本还是正本？

detailed_translations.english: one of two or more things that are the same in every detail

sentences.english: He was disinclined to talk about himself, especially to his students.
sentences.chinese: 他不愿谈论自己，尤其是对他的学生们。

detailed_translations.english: If you are disinclined to do something, you do not want to do it

sentences.english: This was a feature of agrarian development in Britain.
sentences.chinese: 这是大不列颠土地发展的一个特征。

sentences.english: The patriarchal clan becomes the resistance revolution in the agrarian revolution the strength, therefore encounters suppresses and attacks.
sentences.chinese: 在土地革命中宗族成为对抗革命的力量，所以遭到抑制和打击。

detailed_translations.english: Agrarian means relating to the ownership and use of land, especially farmland, or relating to the part of a society or economy that is concerned with agriculture

sentences.english: blocked sinuses
sentences.chinese: 阻滞的窦道

sentences.english: a sinus infection
sentences.chinese: 窦感染

detailed_translations.chinese: [生物] 窦；静脉窦；下陷或凹下去的地方
detailed_translations.english: your sinuses are the spaces in the bones of your head that are connected to the inside of your nose

name: approve
trans: 赞成； 批准， 认可

sentences.english: You've never approved of Henry, have you?
sentences.chinese: 你从未赞赏过亨利，是吧？

detailed_translations.english: to think that someone or something is good, right, or suitable

sentences.english: But you only get the maximum benefit if you implement all of them, because their power comes from their interaction.
sentences.chinese: 但您只能在实现所有方法的情况下获得最大收益，因为它们的力量来自它们之间的交互。

sentences.english: But you only get the maximum benefit if you implement all of them, because their power comes from their interaction.
sentences.chinese: 但您只有在实现所有方法的情况下才能获得最多的收益，因为它们的力量来自于它们之间的相互作用。

sentences.english: The real power of the concept comes not from any one of these devices; it emerges from the interaction of all of them.
sentences.chinese: 这个概念的很正力量并不来自于这些设备的任何一个；它来自于这些设备之间的交互。

detailed_translations.english: a process by which two or more things affect each other

sentences.english: More than a third of all pedestrian injuries are to children.
sentences.chinese: 所有受伤的行人中有1/3以上是儿童。

detailed_translations.english: someone who is walking, especially along a street or other place used by cars

sentences.english: My daughter-in-law said that I was interfering, but I was only trying to help.
sentences.chinese: 我的儿媳说我多管闲事，但我只是想帮忙。

detailed_translations.english: to deliberately get involved in a situation where you are not wanted or needed

name: attendance
trans: 出席， 到场； 出席人数

sentences.english: We have an average attendance of 4,000 fans per game.
sentences.chinese: 每场比赛平均有4,000名球迷来观战。

sentences.english: Last year’s fair saw attendance figures of 32,000.
sentences.chinese: 去年的交易会有3.2万人参加。

detailed_translations.chinese: 出席；到场；出席人数；考勤
detailed_translations.english: the number of people who attend a game, concert, meeting etc

name: regionalization
trans: 分成地区； 按地区安排

detailed_translations.chinese: 区域化；分成地区；按地区安排
加热；热污染（等于thermal pollution）；温暖（的状态）

name: intangible
trans: 无形的， 难以确定的

sentences.english: The island has an intangible quality of holiness.
sentences.chinese: 该岛屿有一种难以形容的神圣感。

detailed_translations.chinese: 无形的，触摸不到的；难以理解的
detailed_translations.english: an intangible quality or feeling is difficult to describe exactly

name: radioactive
trans: 放射性的， 有辐射能力的

sentences.english: the problem of how to dispose of radioactive waste
sentences.chinese: 如何处理放射性废物的问题

sentences.english: a consignment of highly radioactive plutonium
sentences.chinese: 发送的一批高放射性钚

detailed_translations.chinese: 放射性的， 有辐射能的
detailed_translations.english: a radioactive substance is dangerous because it contains  radiation (= a form of energy that can harm living things )

sentences.english: Smoking is a causative factor in several major diseases.
sentences.chinese: 吸烟是若干种重大疾病的致病因素。

detailed_translations.english: acting as the cause of something

sentences.english: This tragic incident underlines the need for immediate action.
sentences.chinese: 这一悲剧事件突显了立即采取行动的必要性。

detailed_translations.english: to draw a line under a word to show that it is important

sentences.english: Paul resented the fact that Carol didn’t trust him.
sentences.chinese: 保罗非常气愤，因为卡萝尔不信任他。

detailed_translations.english: to feel angry or upset about a situation or about something that someone has done, especially because you think that it is not fair

sentences.english: I was shocked by the doctor’s lack of compassion .
sentences.chinese: 我对这个医生如此缺乏同情心感到震惊。

detailed_translations.english: a strong feeling of sympathy for someone who is suffering, and a desire to help them

sentences.english: She was 55 and still a stunning woman.
sentences.chinese: 她55岁，仍是个极美的女人。

detailed_translations.chinese: 极好的；使人晕倒的；震耳欲聋的
detailed_translations.english: A stunning person or thing is extremely beautiful or impressive

detailed_translations.chinese: 把…打昏；使震耳欲聋；使大吃一惊（stun的ing形式）

sentences.english: They demanded a free parliament and press.
sentences.chinese: 他们要求议会自由和新闻自由。

detailed_translations.english: the group of people who are elected to make a country’s laws and discuss important national affairs

name: ambiguous
trans: 意义不明的， 模棱两可的

sentences.english: The language in the Minister’s statement is highly ambiguous.
sentences.chinese: 部长的声明措辞很含糊。

sentences.english: His role in the affair is ambiguous.
sentences.chinese: 他在这起事件中的角色并不明确。

detailed_translations.english: that can be understood in more than one way; having different meanings

sentences.english: The president made a statement to allay public anxiety.
sentences.chinese: 总统发表了一项声明以缓解公众的忧虑。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone feel less afraid, worried etc

sentences.english: Don’t put boiling water in the glass or it will crack.
sentences.chinese: 不要把沸水倒进这个玻璃杯里，否则它会破裂的。

sentences.english: Concrete is liable to crack in very cold weather.
sentences.chinese: 在严寒的天气条件下混凝土可能会开裂。

sentences.english: He picked up a piece of rock and cracked it in half.
sentences.chinese: 他捡起一块石头，把它击碎成两半。

sentences.english: She fell and cracked a bone in her leg.
sentences.chinese: 她摔了一跤，结果一根腿骨骨折。

sentences.english: He cracked a couple of eggs into a pan.
sentences.chinese: 他往平底锅里打了几个鸡蛋。

detailed_translations.english: to break or to make something break, either so that it gets lines on its surface, or so that it breaks into pieces
a very narrow space between two things or two parts of something

name: bind
trans: 捆绑； 结合； 约束

sentences.english: The monks are bound by vows of silence.
sentences.chinese: 僧侣们必须遵守保持缄默的誓言。

detailed_translations.chinese: 结合；装订；有约束力；过紧
detailed_translations.english: if you are bound by an agreement, promise etc, you must do what you have agreed to do or promised to do

detailed_translations.chinese: 捆绑；困境；讨厌的事情；植物的藤蔓
detailed_translations.english: an annoying or difficult situation

sentences.english: economic stimulants
sentences.chinese: 经济刺激因素

detailed_translations.chinese: [药] 兴奋剂；刺激物；酒精饮料
detailed_translations.english: something that encourages more of a particular activity

name: stimuli
trans: 刺激； 刺激物， 促进因素

sentences.english: Interest rates could fall soon and be a stimulus to the U.S. economy.
sentences.chinese: 利率可能很快会下降，从而刺激美国经济。

detailed_translations.chinese: 刺激；刺激物；促进因素（stimulus的复数）
detailed_translations.english: A stimulus is something that encourages activity in people or things

sentences.english: ...the interdependence of nations.
sentences.chinese: …国家间的相互依赖。

detailed_translations.english: a situation in which people or things depend on each other

name: qualitative
trans: 质的， 质量的； 定性的

sentences.english: There are qualitative differences in the way children of different ages and adults think.
sentences.chinese: 不同年龄的儿童和成人在思维方式上有着质的差异。

detailed_translations.english: relating to the quality or standard of something rather than the quantity

name: diverse
trans: 不同的， 多种多样的

sentences.english: subjects as diverse as pop music and archaeology
sentences.chinese: 像流行音乐和考古学这样各不相同的学科

detailed_translations.english: very different from each other

sentences.english: a sugar cube
sentences.chinese: 一块方糖

sentences.english: an ice cube
sentences.chinese: 一小方块冰

sentences.english: Cut the meat into small cubes.
sentences.chinese: 把肉切成丁。

detailed_translations.english: a solid object with six equal square sides

detailed_translations.chinese: 使成立方形；使自乘二次；量…的体积
detailed_translations.english: to multiply a number by itself twice

sentences.english: After a shaky start, he rallied and won the title in style.
sentences.chinese: 虽然开局不顺，但他振作精神，最后漂亮地赢得了冠军。

sentences.english: The Tokyo stock market rallied later in the day.
sentences.chinese: 当天晚些时候东京股市止跌回升。

detailed_translations.chinese: 团结；重整；恢复；（网球等）连续对打
detailed_translations.english: to become stronger again after a period of weakness or defeat
a large public meeting, especially one that is held outdoors to support a political idea, protest etc

name: announcement
trans: 宣告； 公告， 通告

sentences.english: The minister made the announcement at a news conference.
sentences.chinese: 部长在记者招待会上发表了这项声明。

detailed_translations.english: an important or official statement

sentences.english: It was virtually impossible to synchronize our lives so as to take vacations and weekends together.
sentences.chinese: 为了一起度假和过周末而要让我们的生活同步几乎是不可能的。

sentences.english: Synchronize the score with the film action.
sentences.chinese: 让配乐和电影动作同步。

detailed_translations.english: If you synchronize two activities, processes, or movements, or if you synchronize one activity, process, or movement with another, you cause them to happen at the same time and speed as each other

sentences.english: The patient's blood refused to clot.
sentences.chinese: 病人的血液无法凝结。

detailed_translations.english: if a liquid such as blood or milk clots, or if something clots it, it becomes thicker and more solid
a thick almost solid mass formed when blood or milk dries

sentences.english: Lady Thatcher had just published her memoirs.
sentences.chinese: 撒切尔夫人刚刚出版了她的回忆录。

detailed_translations.chinese: 回忆录；研究报告；自传；实录
detailed_translations.english: a book by someone important and famous in which they write about their life and experiences

sentences.english: Such schemes mean little unless they impact people.
sentences.chinese: 除非能对人们造成影响，否则这样的计划意义不大。

detailed_translations.chinese: 影响， 作用， 冲击
detailed_translations.english: to have an important or noticeable effect on someone or something
the effect or influence that an event, situation etc has on someone or something

name: profile
trans: 剖面； 轮廓； 分布图

sentences.english: Dani has a lovely profile.
sentences.chinese: 达尼的侧面轮廓很好看。

detailed_translations.chinese: 侧面；人物简介；轮廓，形象；姿态，引人注目的状态
detailed_translations.english: a side view of someone’s head
to write or give a short description of someone or something

name: preference
trans: 偏爱， 倾向； 优先权

sentences.english: Do you have a colour preference ?
sentences.chinese: 你有什么颜色上的偏好吗？

sentences.english: Parents may be able to express a preference as to the school their child will attend.
sentences.chinese: 家长也许可以表明愿意让孩子就读哪所学校。

sentences.english: The amount of sugar you add will depend on personal preference .
sentences.chinese: 加多少糖取决于个人的喜好。

sentences.english: Many elderly people expressed a strong preference to live in their own homes.
sentences.chinese: 许多老年人强烈表示喜欢住在自己的家里。

sentences.english: In allocating housing, preference is given to families with young children.
sentences.chinese: 房屋优先分配给有年幼孩子的家庭。

detailed_translations.english: if you have a preference for something, you like it more than another thing and will choose it if you can

sentences.english: Genet started as a rebel, but soon became part of the literary mainstream.
sentences.chinese: 热内起初很叛逆，但不久就回归了文学主流。

detailed_translations.english: the most usual ideas or methods, or the people who have these ideas or methods

name: scavenge
trans: 清除； 从废物中提取有用物质

sentences.english: Pigs scavenged among the rubbish.
sentences.chinese: 猪在垃圾堆里觅食。

detailed_translations.english: if an animal scavenges, it eats anything that it can find

sentences.english: paralysis of the lower body
sentences.chinese: 下半身瘫痪

sentences.english: The snake’s poison causes paralysis.
sentences.chinese: 这种蛇的毒液会引起身体麻痹。

detailed_translations.english: the loss of the ability to move all or part of your body or feel things in it

sentences.english: Real men embrace the stiffness in our muscles as we rise from bed each morning and the gradual loss of our sexual drive.
sentences.chinese: 正像我们每天早晨从床上起来，我们的性欲冲动逐渐消失一样，真正的男人应欣然接受僵硬的肌肉。

sentences.english: Chronic mild fever, emaciation, loss of appetite, gait stiffness, some cough, have arthritis. Course of 1 month or so, the outcome of death.
sentences.chinese: 慢性型轻度发热，消瘦，食欲不振，步态僵硬，有的咳嗽，有的出现关节炎。病程1月左右，转归死亡。

sentences.english: The result is to reduce stiffness, which will prevent arthritis or improve it if you already have the condition. Maintaining many of the asanas encourages strength and endurance.
sentences.chinese: 其结果是减少僵硬，这将防止关节炎或改进，如果你已经有了这个条件。体式保持了许多鼓励的力量和耐力。

sentences.english: His account was badly distorted by the press.
sentences.chinese: 他的话被报界严重歪曲。

sentences.english: an expensive subsidy which distorts the market
sentences.chinese: 扰乱市场秩序的高价补贴

detailed_translations.english: to report something in a way that is not completely true or correct

sentences.english: a subsidiary hypothesis
sentences.chinese: 一个附带假设

detailed_translations.english: connected with, but less important than, something else
a company that is owned or controlled by another larger company

sentences.english: business/commercial venture
sentences.chinese: 商业风投

sentences.english: When darkness fell, he would venture out.
sentences.chinese: 天黑以后，他就会壮着胆子出去。

detailed_translations.english: a new business activity that involves taking risks
to go somewhere that could be dangerous

sentences.english: tourists whose cars clog the roads each summer
sentences.chinese: 每年夏天开着汽车堵塞道路的游客

detailed_translations.english: to block something or become blocked
a shoe made of wood with a leather top that covers the front of your foot but not your heel

sentences.english: Nearly 70 percent of the population still live in the countryside.
sentences.chinese: 人口中差不多有70%仍住在乡村。

sentences.english: Most of the world’s population doesn’t get enough to eat.
sentences.chinese: 世界上大多数人都吃不饱。

detailed_translations.english: the number of people living in a particular area, country etc

sentences.english: He let down a bucket into the well to draw water.
sentences.chinese: 他把吊桶放进井里打水。

detailed_translations.english: an open container with a handle, used for carrying and holding things, especially liquids

sentences.english: a highly corrosive substance
sentences.chinese: 一种腐蚀性很强的物质

detailed_translations.english: a corrosive liquid such as an acid can destroy metal, plastic etc

sentences.english: In short, we badly need another very big dose of stimulus.
sentences.chinese: 简言之，我们很需要另一个很大剂量的刺激计划。

sentences.english: There are other questions too, including what dose of green tea catechins is ideal.
sentences.chinese: 也有一些别的问题，包括多少剂量的绿茶儿茶素是理想的。

sentences.english: All have a generous dose of herbs and spices, everything from chervil and celery seed to cloves and peppercorns.
sentences.chinese: 从山萝卜到芹菜籽，从丁香到胡椒籽，每一样均含有大剂量的药草和香料成分。

detailed_translations.english: the amount of a medicine or a drug that you should take

sentences.english: You need a long series of data to be able to discern such a trend.
sentences.chinese: 你需要一大串数据才能认清这一趋势。

sentences.english: We could just discern a town in the distance.
sentences.chinese: 我们依稀看到远处有一座城镇。

detailed_translations.english: to notice or understand something by thinking about it carefully

sentences.english: We can be flexible about your starting date.
sentences.chinese: 你具体从哪天开始，我们可以灵活一点。

sentences.english: The government needs a more flexible approach to education.
sentences.chinese: 政府在处理教育问题上需要更加灵活。

detailed_translations.english: a person, plan etc that is flexible can change or be changed easily to suit any new situation

name: census
trans: 人口调查， 人口普查

sentences.english: He and Mary journeyed to Bethlehem to be counted in the Roman census, and while they were there the child was born.
sentences.chinese: 他和玛利亚一起去到伯利恒，罗马的人口普查把他们统计在内。 他们在那里时，孩子降生了。

detailed_translations.english: an official process of counting a country’s population and finding out about the people

sentences.english: Looking after the house was viewed as a woman’s domain.
sentences.chinese: 料理家务被认为是女性的份内之事。

detailed_translations.english: an area of activity, interest, or knowledge, especially one that a particular person, organization etc deals with

sentences.english: smeared windows
sentences.chinese: 脏了的窗户

detailed_translations.english: to put dirty or oily marks on something
a  smear test

sentences.english: He’s 80 years old now and lives a very secluded life.
sentences.chinese: 他现在80岁了，过着远离尘嚣的生活。

sentences.english: Seven years ago at this hour, a doomed airliner plunged from the sky, split the rock and steel of this building, and changed our world forever.
sentences.chinese: 七年前的这一时刻，一架被当作毁灭性武器的航空班机从天而降，撞裂了这座大楼的钢筋水泥，永远改变了这个世界。

sentences.english: Australian officials had indicated that if nothing was found by that stage, then the search operation for the airliner would not be extended.
sentences.chinese: 澳大利亚官员曾表示，如果届时仍一无所获，搜索这架客机的行动将不会被延长。

detailed_translations.english: a large plane for passengers

sentences.english: The study found that some alcoholics had clear personality traits showing up early in childhood.
sentences.chinese: 这项研究发现一些酗酒者早在孩童时就表现出明显的个性特征。

detailed_translations.english: a particular quality in someone’s character

sentences.english: I close the meteorite room and try the door across thecorridor.
sentences.chinese: 我关上陨石房间的门，又打开了走廊对面的门。

sentences.english: If the contamination were terrestrial, one could expect equal amounts of the molecules (or less) to be present in the meteorite samples, certainly not more.
sentences.chinese: 如果污染是来自地面的，在陨石样品中有可能会发现等量（或者较少）的分子，但肯定不会多。

sentences.english: The group, based at Imperial College London, found some of the base building blocks for life, nucleobases, in dust from the Murchison meteorite which fell to Earth in 1969.
sentences.chinese: 研究小组由伦敦帝国学院创建，他们在1969年坠入地球的默奇森陨石尘埃中发现了碱基，这是构建生命的基本成分。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of rock or metal from space that has landed on Earth

sentences.english: molten iron
sentences.chinese: 熔铁

detailed_translations.english: molten metal or rock has been made into a liquid by being heated to a very high temperature

sentences.english: The shock of the explosion was felt over a radius of forty miles.
sentences.chinese: 爆炸引起的剧烈震动在方圆40英里内都能感觉得到。

detailed_translations.english: an area that covers a particular distance in all directions from a central point

sentences.english: Is it the first signal of relationship disintegration?
sentences.chinese: 这是关系瓦解的第一个讯号吗？

sentences.english: The act or an instance of breaking up, as a division, dispersal, or disintegration.
sentences.chinese: 分散，分离分离的行为或实例，如分裂、分散或分解。

sentences.english: The total collapse of the Iron Curtain and the Berlin Wall came in 1989-1990, but the disintegration externally and internally started during my Administration.
sentences.chinese: 铁幕政策和柏林墙的全线坍塌发生在1989年到1990年，但是我执政期间就已经开始内在和外在的瓦解。

sentences.english: My keys were here a minute ago but now they’ve vanished.
sentences.chinese: 我的钥匙刚刚还在这里，现在却不翼而飞了。

sentences.english: The bird vanished from sight.
sentences.chinese: 那只鸟从视线中消失了。

sentences.english: She seemed to have just vanished into thin air (= suddenly disappeared in a very mysterious way ).
sentences.chinese: 她好像就蒸发了似的。

detailed_translations.english: to disappear suddenly, especially in a way that cannot be easily explained

sentences.english: Large Wall Clock: so all can see when the stand-up will start or when meetings will reconvene.
sentences.chinese: 大型挂钟：通过它所有的人都能知道立会何时开始，或何时召集会议。

sentences.english: We must arouse them to fight for their own emancipation.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须唤起他们为其自身的解放而斗争。

sentences.english: The essence of wisdom is emancipation, as far as possible, from the tyranny of the here and now.
sentences.chinese: 智慧的本质在于尽一切可能从“这里”和“现在”构成的暴政中解放出来。

sentences.english: In order to get rid of these agonies, and eventually to win human emancipation in the real sense, all the people should unite and strive to create a society characterized by harmony of the two sexes.
sentences.chinese: 为了摆脱这些不幸与痛苦，也为了人类最终获得真正意义上的解放，共同生活在这一片蓝天下的人们应该团结起来，努力创造一个两性和谐的社会。

sentences.english: a dedicated graphics processor
sentences.chinese: 专用图形处理器

detailed_translations.english: made for or used for only one particular purpose

detailed_translations.chinese: 以…奉献；把…用于（dedicate的过去式和过去分词）

name: stray
trans: 迷了路的； 偶然发生的

sentences.english: This will limit the number of stray dogs in the area.
sentences.chinese: 这将会减少流浪狗在这一区域的数量。

sentences.english: As for her personal safety, she said she isn't overly worried but does think about what a stray lunatic could do.
sentences.chinese: 至于她个人的安全，她说她并没有过度担心，但是她的确在考虑一个流浪疯子可以做些什么。

sentences.english: Then let's say you get into horrible, disastrous debt and have to go begging to the government, like a sad little stray.
sentences.chinese: 另外，比如说，你陷入了讨厌的、损失惨重的债务，而且必须像一个可怜的小流浪儿一样向政府祈求。

detailed_translations.english: an animal that is lost or has no home

sentences.english: The number of young people obtaining qualifications has remained static or decreased.
sentences.chinese: 获得各种资格证书的年轻人的数量一直保持不变或者已经减少。

detailed_translations.english: Something that is static does not move or change
noise caused by electricity in the air that blocks or spoils the sound from radio or TV

sentences.english: Fish instinctively fight their way upstream against the current.
sentences.chinese: 鱼本能地奋力逆流而上。

sentences.english: We'll go to the upstream side of that big rock.
sentences.chinese: 我们将去那块大岩石的上游一侧。

detailed_translations.english: along a river, in the opposite direction from the way the water is flowing
Upstream is also an adjective

name: prerequisite
trans: 先决 条件， 前提

sentences.english: A person with ambition is the prerequisite to success.
sentences.chinese: 一个人有雄心壮志是成功的先决条件。

sentences.english: Historical changes to the production of embroidered shoes with embroidery into a local evaluation of the level of ingenuity of a girl prerequisite.
sentences.chinese: 历史的变革使绣花鞋的制作与刺绣水平成为当地评价一个姑娘心灵手巧的先决条件。

sentences.english: Anyone has the possibility to succeed, but the prerequisite of success is your own, both industry knowledge learning and the cultivation of innovation ability, requires great effort.
sentences.chinese: 任何人都有成功的可能性，但成功的先决条件在于你自身，无论是行业知识的学习还是创新能力的培养，都需要付出极大的努力。

detailed_translations.chinese: 必备的， 作为先决条件的

detailed_translations.english: something that is necessary before something else can happen or be done

sentences.english: A full day’s teaching exhausts me.
sentences.chinese: 讲一整天课令我精疲力竭。

sentences.english: We are in danger of exhausting the world’s oil supply.
sentences.chinese: 我们面临世界石油储备耗尽的危险。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone feel extremely tired

sentences.english: 10,000 men had volunteered by the end of September; thereafter, approximately 1,000 men enlisted each month.
sentences.chinese: 到9月底时已有10,000人志愿参军，此后，每个月差不多有1,000人应征入伍。

sentences.english: Sophie was born in France, but shortly thereafter her family moved to the United States.
sentences.chinese: 索菲出生在法国，但不久以后她全家就移居到了美国。

detailed_translations.english: after a particular event or time

sentences.english: It was a reasonable explanation, but his voice lacked conviction .
sentences.chinese: 这解释合情合理，只是他的语气不坚定。

sentences.english: It took her so much effort to speak that what she said carried great conviction (= showed she felt sure of what she said ) .
sentences.chinese: 她费了很大的劲在说，因此说出来的话显得很确定。

sentences.english: They had no previous convictions.
sentences.chinese: 他们没有前科。

detailed_translations.english: the feeling of being sure about something and having no doubts

sentences.english: We need to diversify the economy.
sentences.chinese: 我们要使经济多元化。

detailed_translations.chinese: 使多样化，使变化；增加产品种类以扩大
detailed_translations.english: if a business, company, country etc diversifies, it increases the range of goods or services it produces

sentences.english: Dickinson, a bioengineer, has devoted his life's work to the study of insect flight.
sentences.chinese: 迪金森是一名生物工程学家，他一直从事昆虫飞行方面的研究。

sentences.english: The company is working on ways to bioengineer better, cleaner and more efficient biofuels.
sentences.chinese: 该公司致力于用生物工程技术研发出更好，更清洁，更高效的生物燃料。

sentences.english: Ning Wang, a bioengineer at the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign, found that the embryonic stem cells of mice are much softer than other, more specialised cells.
sentences.chinese: 位于伊利诺伊大学香槟分校的生物工程学家，王宁（音译）发现，老鼠的胚胎干细胞远比其他特化细胞要软。

sentences.english: Martin showed me a graph of their recent sales.
sentences.chinese: 马丁给我看了他们最近销售情况的图表。

detailed_translations.english: a drawing that uses a line or lines to show how two or more sets of measurements are related to each other

sentences.english: sensitized photographic paper
sentences.chinese: 感光相纸

detailed_translations.english: to give someone some experience or knowledge of a particular problem or situation so that they can notice it and understand it easily

name: liberalize
trans: 使自由化； 宽大； 自由化

sentences.english: ...authoritarian states that have only now begun to liberalize.
sentences.chinese: …现在刚刚开始放宽限制的独裁国家。

detailed_translations.english: to make a system, laws, or moral attitudes less strict

sentences.english: ...one level teaspoon of sodium bicarbonate powder.
sentences.chinese: 一平茶匙碳酸氢钠粉末

detailed_translations.english: a common silver-white metal that usually exists in combination with other substances, for example in salt. It is a chemical element: symbol Na

sentences.english: They teach the relativity of all ethical ideas.
sentences.chinese: 他们宣扬一切道德观念的相对性。

sentences.english: Einstein put forward his new theory of relativity.
sentences.chinese: 爱因斯坦提出了相对论的新学说。

sentences.english: Everyone was talking about relativity, not only the scientists, but the philosophers and the writers of columns in the newspapers.
sentences.chinese: 每个人都在谈论相对论，不仅仅是科学家，甚至哲学家和报纸的专栏作者也是如此。

detailed_translations.english: the relationship in  physics  between time, space, and movement according to Einstein’s  theory

name: legitimation
trans: 合法化； 承认为嫡出

sentences.english: This was the birth or, if we prefer to call it so, the legitimation of Gallicanism.
sentences.chinese: 这是出生或，如果我们喜欢将它命名为如此，合法化。

detailed_translations.english: to provide or issue capital for (a commercial enterprise) in an amount insufficient for efficient operation
to provide or issue capital for (a commercial enterprise) in an amount insufficient for efficient operation

sentences.english: ...a programme to inoculate every child in the country.
sentences.chinese: ...一个给全国每个孩子接种疫苗的计划。

sentences.english: ...an excerpt from Tchaikovsky's Nutcracker.
sentences.chinese: …柴可夫斯基的《胡桃夹子》选段。

detailed_translations.english: a short piece taken from a book, poem, piece of music etc

name: hexagonal
trans: 六角形的； 六边形的

sentences.english: Instead it is the Desert Express that pulls in, its nine coaches in smart blue, orange and white livery with large hexagonal windows.
sentences.chinese: 然而驶进车站的是沙漠快车，它的九节车厢漆成漂亮的蓝色、橙色和白色，带有六边形的车窗。

sentences.english: He has instead looked to the hexagonal matrices of snowflakes, which as structurally supported objects combine high volume with low weight.
sentences.chinese: 他期望使用雪花的六角形矩阵造型来作为支撑，因为这种结构做到了低重量与大容量的统一。

sentences.english: In fact, I have kept a souvenir of those days: a dark green hexagonal glass spittoon that is now a very original flowerpot.
sentences.chinese: 说真的，我还保存了一个那个时代的纪念品--一个深绿色六角形的玻璃痰盂，如今，它成为了我的一个很别致的花盆。

detailed_translations.english: A hexagonal object or shape has six straight sides

sentences.english: All the medical workers in the region helped to put down the influenza epidemic.
sentences.chinese: 这个地区的所有医务工作者参加了消灭流行性感冒的工作。

sentences.english: People should therefore continue to seek seasonal influenza vaccination like any other year.
sentences.chinese: 因此，人们应当像以往一样继续接种季节性流感疫苗。

detailed_translations.english: an infectious disease that is like a very bad cold

sentences.english: The strike was a divisive issue in the community.
sentences.chinese: 这场罢工导致社区内部分歧。

detailed_translations.chinese: 分裂的；区分的；造成不和的
detailed_translations.english: causing a lot of disagreement between people

sentences.english: Anderson was to sing at the Constitution Hall auditorium.
sentences.chinese: 安德森将要在宪法厅的观众席演唱。

detailed_translations.english: the part of a theatre where people sit when watching a play, concert etc

sentences.english: She’s got an analytical mind.
sentences.chinese: 她思维缜密。

detailed_translations.english: thinking about things in a detailed and intelligent way, so that you can examine and understand things

name: individualism
trans: 利己主义， 个人主义

sentences.english: Capitalism encourages competition and individualism.
sentences.chinese: 资本主义鼓励竞争，提倡个人主义。

detailed_translations.chinese: 个人主义；利己主义；个人特征
detailed_translations.english: the belief that the rights and freedom of individual people are the most important rights in a society

sentences.english: {"COLLOINEXA":["tactile sensations"]}
sentences.chinese: 触觉

detailed_translations.chinese: [生理] 触觉的，有触觉的；能触知的
detailed_translations.english: relating to your sense of touch

sentences.english: Board members met in closed session (= with nobody else present ) .
sentences.chinese: 委员会成员举行了闭门会议。

detailed_translations.english: a formal meeting or group of meetings, especially of a law court or parliament

sentences.english: Some girls may first ovulate even before they menstruate.
sentences.chinese: 有些女孩初次排卵可能甚至早于她们的月经。

detailed_translations.english: when a woman or female animal ovulates, she produces eggs inside her body

sentences.english: as the chairman said in his introductory remarks
sentences.chinese: 正如主席在开场白中所说的

detailed_translations.english: said or written at the beginning of a book, speech etc in order to explain what it is about

sentences.english: The pictures are worth about £10,000 apiece.
sentences.chinese: 这些画每幅价值约一万英镑。

sentences.english: The two top teams have ten points apiece.
sentences.chinese: 排名最高的两支球队各得十分。

detailed_translations.english: costing or having a particular amount each

detailed_translations.chinese: [法] 原告；发牢骚的人；抱怨者
detailed_translations.english: someone who makes a formal complaint in a court of law

sentences.english: Istara: It would suit a famous samurai like you.
sentences.chinese: 这绝对适合像你这么著名的武士。

sentences.english: In Japan, only a talented samurai can break through the ninjas.
sentences.chinese: 在日本，只有一个有才华的武士可以通过忍者突破。

sentences.english: But by 1638 thousands of the peasants and their samurai mercenaries had been slaughtered.
sentences.chinese: 但是在1638年之前，数千农民和他们的佣兵武士都被屠戮。

detailed_translations.english: a member of a powerful military class in Japan in the past

sentences.english: Leading companies spend time and money on honing the skills of senior managers.
sentences.chinese: 龙头公司会花费时间和金钱提高高层管理人员的技能。

detailed_translations.english: a fine whetstone, esp for sharpening razors
to make knives, swords etc sharp

sentences.english: Nutrition education can help with some problems and may prevent improper storage or spoilage.
sentences.chinese: 营养教育可以解决一些问题，并能防止不当的贮存或腐坏发生。

sentences.english: Nutrition education can help with some problems and may prevent improper storage or spoilage.
sentences.chinese: 营养教育可以解决一些问题，并能防止食物的不当贮存或腐坏发生。

sentences.english: They have real difficulty trying to tell the difference in quality changes and safety spoilage.
sentences.chinese: 他们真的很难区分真正的变质和无关紧要的损坏之间的区别。

detailed_translations.english: waste resulting from something being spoiled

sentences.english: The course is of three years’ duration.
sentences.chinese: 该课程为期三年。

detailed_translations.english: the length of time that something continues

sentences.english: The script has been gathering editorial accretions for years.
sentences.chinese: 该剧本经历了多年的修改加工。

detailed_translations.chinese: 添加；增加物；连生；冲积层
detailed_translations.english: a gradual process by which new things are added and something gradually changes or gets bigger

sentences.english: a rubber plantation
sentences.chinese: 橡胶园

detailed_translations.chinese: 适用于种植园或热带、亚热带国家的

name: egoistic
trans: 自我主义的， 利己主义的

sentences.english: It is not restricted to egoistic goals, much less to economic goals.
sentences.chinese: 它并不限于那种自私自利的目标，也不仅仅是经济上的目标。

sentences.english: The dangers of introspection exist mostly if he is to revel in egoistic thoughts.
sentences.chinese: 如果你想要通过自省揭示自私自利的想法，潜藏的危险更大。

sentences.english: This is probably the only aspect of life where egoistic adults can leave their success, money, freedom and independence behind for just another chance.
sentences.chinese: 这一点也许是唯一能让自私自利的成年人抛去成功、金钱、自由以及独立性以求新生。

detailed_translations.chinese: 自私自利的，自我中心的

name: alpha
trans: 希腊语字母表的第一个字母

detailed_translations.chinese: 希腊字母的第一个字母；开端；最初
detailed_translations.english: the first letter in the Greek alphabet (Α, α), a vowel transliterated as a

sentences.english: If, say, ideal is to successful a boat, so, I'll take good rudder.
sentences.chinese: 如果说，理想是驶向成功的一艘小船，那么，我一定会把好船舵。

sentences.english: If unfurling your sails before the storm you snap the rudder in two.
sentences.chinese: 如果你在风暴前扯起船帆，你把船舵折成两半。

sentences.english: If the ideal is to succeed in a small boat, then, I will take good rudder.
sentences.chinese: 如果说，理想是驶向成功的一艘小船，那么，我一定会把好船舵。

detailed_translations.english: a flat part at the back of a ship or aircraft that can be turned in order to control the direction in which it moves

sentences.english: We now have new evidence to corroborate the defendant’s story.
sentences.chinese: 我们现在有新的证据来证实被告人的说法。

sentences.english: Experiments elsewhere corroborate these results.
sentences.chinese: 其他地方的试验也证实了这些结果。

detailed_translations.english: to provide information that supports or helps to prove someone else’s statement, idea etc

sentences.english: But water containing the herbicide cannot be released back into the river and it is known that low water levels can harm river ecosystems accustomed to higher levels.
sentences.chinese: 但含有除草剂的水不能再排向河流，而且我们知道低水位将会对习惯于高水位的河流生态系统造成危害。

sentences.english: Genetically altered soybeans and cotton require less herbicide to control weeds. These varieties now make up more than 70 percent of all soybean and cotton acreage planted in the United States.
sentences.chinese: 转基因的大豆和棉花不需要那么多除草剂来控制杂草，这些品种现在占美国大豆和棉花种植面积的70%以上。

sentences.english: Virtually all commercial GMOs are bred to withstand direct application of herbicide and/or to produce an insecticide.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，所有的商业性的转基因生物都可以抵抗直接作用的除草剂和/或者制造一种杀虫剂。

detailed_translations.english: a substance used to kill unwanted plants

sentences.english: the contraction of metal as it cools
sentences.chinese: 金属冷却时的收缩

detailed_translations.english: a very strong and painful movement of a muscle, especially the muscles around the  womb  during birth

sentences.english: The new religion is an amalgam of superstitious beliefs and modern science.
sentences.chinese: 这种新宗教是迷信和现代科学的混合物。

detailed_translations.english: a mixture of different things

sentences.english: a few bland comments
sentences.chinese: 不痛不痒的几句评语

detailed_translations.english: without any excitement, strong opinions, or special character

detailed_translations.chinese: 使…变得淡而无味；除掉…的特性
变得平淡无奇；丧失特性

sentences.english: a loaf of bread
sentences.chinese: 一条面包

detailed_translations.english: bread that is shaped and baked in one piece and can be cut into slices

detailed_translations.chinese: 游荡；游手好闲；虚度光阴
detailed_translations.english: to spend time somewhere and not do very much

sentences.english: ...a type of bacteria that include the microbes responsible for tuberculosis and leprosy.
sentences.chinese: …包括引起结核病和麻风病的微生物在内的一类细菌。

detailed_translations.english: an extremely small living thing which you can only see if you use a  microscope  . Some microbes can cause diseases.

sentences.english: She was unsure of her reception after everything that had happened.
sentences.chinese: 发生了这些事后，她对自己是否还受欢迎没把握。

sentences.english: The plans received a mixed reception from unions (= some people liked them, others did not ) .
sentences.chinese: 各工会对这些计划反响不一。

detailed_translations.english: a particular type of welcome for someone, or a particular type of reaction to their ideas, work etc

sentences.english: calcium carbonate
sentences.chinese: 碳酸钙

detailed_translations.chinese: 使充满二氧化碳；使变成碳酸盐

detailed_translations.english: a salt (= chemical substance formed by an acid ) that contains  carbon  and oxygen

name: nuclear
trans: 核心的； 核子的， 原子能的

sentences.english: France’s reliance on nuclear energy
sentences.chinese: 法国对核能的依赖

sentences.english: a nuclear power station
sentences.chinese: 核电站

sentences.chinese: 白炽灯的发明
