detailed_translations.english: producing a bright light when heated

sentences.english: ...armed incursions into border areas by rebel forces.
sentences.chinese: ...叛军武装入侵边境地区。

detailed_translations.english: a sudden attack into an area that belongs to other people

sentences.english: His troubles predated the recession.
sentences.chinese: 他的麻烦早在经济衰退前就出现了。

detailed_translations.english: If you say that one thing predated another, you mean that the first thing happened or existed some time before the second thing

sentences.english: Increased population has transformed the landscape.
sentences.chinese: 人口的增加使景观发生了变化。

detailed_translations.english: to completely change the appearance, form, or character of something or someone, especially in a way that improves it

name: paradox
trans: 似非而是的说法； 自相矛盾的人

sentences.english: The paradox is that fishermen would catch more fish if they fished less.
sentences.chinese: 悖论就是: 如果渔夫减少捕鱼，反而会打到更多的鱼。

detailed_translations.english: a statement that seems impossible because it contains two opposing ideas that are both true

sentences.english: She seemed slightly manic.
sentences.chinese: 她好像有点激动。

detailed_translations.english: relating to a feeling of great happiness or excitement that is part of a mental illness

name: magnitude
trans: 重要性； 长度； 震级

sentences.english: an increase of this order of magnitude
sentences.chinese: 如此大幅度的增长

sentences.english: The star varies in brightness by about three magnitudes.
sentences.chinese: 星体的亮度大约分三个星等。

detailed_translations.english: the great size or importance of something

sentences.english: ‘Did he really?’ Her surprise seemed genuine.
sentences.chinese: “他真的这样？”她好像是真的惊讶。

detailed_translations.english: a genuine feeling, desire etc is one that you really feel, not one you pretend to feel

sentences.english: a singularly foolish plan
sentences.chinese: 极为愚蠢的计划

sentences.english: He has singularly failed to live up to his promises.
sentences.chinese: 他显然没有履行自己的诺言。

detailed_translations.chinese: 异常地；非常地；令人无法理解地
detailed_translations.english: in a way that is very noticeable or unusual

sentences.english: The government has just repealed the law segregating public facilities.
sentences.chinese: 政府刚刚废除了隔离公共设施的法令。

sentences.english: Next year will be the 60th anniversary of the repeal of Prohibition.
sentences.chinese: 明年将是禁酒令废止的60周年。

detailed_translations.chinese: 废除；撤销；废止；放弃；否定
detailed_translations.english: if a government repeals a law, it officially ends that law
Repeal is also a noun

sentences.english: Lose yourself in the play. Be a dinosaur, or a gorilla, or a villain.
sentences.chinese: 放下自己的架子，扮演一只恐龙，或者是大猩猩，甚至是一个坏蛋。

sentences.english: In fact, he found that there was scarcely any information on gorilla cognition at all.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，他发现任何有关大猩猩认知的信息都非常稀少。

sentences.english: The most famous albino animal of all was Snowflake the gorilla, who lived at Barcelona Zoo from 1966 until his death from skin cancer in 2003.
sentences.chinese: 最著名的白化动物是大猩猩雪花。 自1966年以来，他一直生活在巴塞罗纳动物园，直到2003年死于皮肤癌。

detailed_translations.english: a very large African monkey that is the largest of the  apes

sentences.english: a holiday brochure
sentences.chinese: 度假手册

detailed_translations.english: a thin book giving information or advertising something

sentences.english: Once we’ve had the disease, we’re immune for life.
sentences.chinese: 我们一旦得过这种病，就获得了终身免疫力。

detailed_translations.chinese: 免疫的， 有免疫力的， 不受影响的； 免除的， 豁免的
detailed_translations.english: someone who is immune to a particular disease cannot catch it

sentences.english: deviation from the normal procedure
sentences.chinese: 背离正常的程序

sentences.english: a compass deviation of 5˚ (= from true north)
sentences.chinese: 罗盘偏差5度（相对正北而言）

detailed_translations.english: a noticeable difference from what is expected or acceptable

name: gentry
trans: 贵族， 绅士， 上等人

sentences.english: a member of the landed gentry
sentences.chinese: 地主乡绅中的一员

detailed_translations.chinese: 人们（多用贬义）；贵族们；（英）上流社会人士
detailed_translations.english: people who belong to a high social class

sentences.english: ...the big compound eyes of dragonflies.
sentences.chinese: …蜻蜓的大复眼。

detailed_translations.english: Compound is used to indicate that something consists of two or more parts or things
a substance containing atoms from two or more  elements

detailed_translations.chinese: 使恶化， 加重； 使化合， 使合成
detailed_translations.english: to make a difficult situation worse by adding more problems

name: underlie
trans: 位于…之下； 成为…的基础或依据

sentences.english: the one basic principle that underlies all of the party’s policies
sentences.chinese: 贯穿该党各项政策的那一条基本原则

detailed_translations.english: to be the cause of something, or be the basic thing from which something develops

sentences.english: They have to win the contract – thousands of jobs are at stake.
sentences.chinese: 他们必须拿下这份合同，这关系到数千个工作岗位。

sentences.english: National pride is at stake in next week’s game against England.
sentences.chinese: 下星期对英格兰队的比赛关乎民族尊严。

detailed_translations.english: if something that you value very much is at stake, you will lose it if a plan or action is not successful

sentences.english: The intensity of the hurricane was frightening.
sentences.chinese: 飓风的猛烈程度令人恐惧。

detailed_translations.chinese: 强烈，剧烈；〔光、声等的〕强度
detailed_translations.english: the quality of being felt very strongly or having a strong effect

name: masculine
trans: 男性的； 男子气概的

sentences.english: They’re nice curtains, but I’d prefer something a little more masculine.
sentences.chinese: 这些窗帘很好，但我更喜欢男性化一点的。

sentences.english: She has a very masculine voice.
sentences.chinese: 她的嗓音非常男性化。

sentences.english: Hunting was a typically masculine occupation.
sentences.chinese: 打猎是典型的男性消遣活动。

detailed_translations.chinese: 男性的；阳性的；男子气概的
detailed_translations.english: having qualities considered to be typical of men or of what men do

name: extraordinary
trans: 非凡的， 特别的； 离奇的

sentences.english: It took an extraordinary amount of work.
sentences.chinese: 这费了相当多的功夫。

sentences.english: It’s extraordinary that he should make exactly the same mistake again.
sentences.chinese: 真想不到他又犯了完全相同的错误。

sentences.english: The U.S. has called for an extraordinary emergency meeting of the UN Human Rights Commission to examine the crisis.
sentences.chinese: 美国已要求召开一次联合国人权委员特别紧急会议来调查这次危机。

detailed_translations.chinese: 非同寻常的；特别的（会议）
detailed_translations.english: very unusual or surprising

sentences.english: calls from young children concerning lost pets
sentences.chinese: 小孩子打来的有关宠物走失的电话

sentences.english: the facts concerning Marr’s car crash
sentences.chinese: 有关马尔撞车事故的事实

detailed_translations.english: about or relating to

sentences.english: Sexual attraction is a large part of falling in love.
sentences.chinese: 堕入爱河很大部分是由于性吸引。

sentences.english: gravitational/magnetic attraction
sentences.chinese: 地心引力；磁力

detailed_translations.english: a feeling of liking sb, especially sexually

sentences.english: Her position was fortified by election successes and economic recovery.
sentences.chinese: 她的地位因为选举获胜及经济复苏而得到巩固。

detailed_translations.english: to encourage an attitude or feeling and make it stronger
to build towers, walls etc around an area or city in order to defend it

sentences.english: ...her passion for collecting frog spawn.
sentences.chinese: ...她对采蛙卵的热爱。

detailed_translations.english: the eggs of a fish or  frog  laid together in a soft mass

detailed_translations.chinese: 产卵；酿成，造成；大量生产
detailed_translations.english: to make a series of things happen or start to exist

name: conventional
trans: 因循守旧的； 传统的

sentences.english: Internet connections through conventional phone lines are fairly slow.
sentences.chinese: 通过传统的电话线来连接因特网速度很慢。

sentences.english: Bake for 20 minutes in a conventional oven; 8 in a microwave.
sentences.chinese: 在传统的烤炉中烘烤20分钟，在微波炉里则烤8分钟。

detailed_translations.english: a conventional method, product, practice etc has been used for a long time and is considered the usual type

name: privy
trans: 私人的； 不公开的， 秘密参与的

sentences.english: Colby was privy to the committee’s decisions.
sentences.chinese: 科尔比知晓委员会的秘密决定。

detailed_translations.chinese: 私人的；不公开的；秘密参与的
detailed_translations.english: secret and private
a toilet, especially one outside a house in a small separate building

sentences.english: The building does not conform with safety regulations.
sentences.chinese: 例句：这座建筑物不符合安全条例。

sentences.english: It did not conform to the usual stereotype of an industrial city.
sentences.chinese: 这和一座常规的工业城市那种千篇一律的格局不一样。

detailed_translations.english: to obey a law, rule etc

name: circulation
trans: 循环， 流通； 发行额

sentences.english: Exercise improves the circulation.
sentences.chinese: 运动能促进血液循环。

sentences.english: The Treasury Department plans to remove older coins from circulation and replace them with new ones.
sentences.chinese: 财政部打算收回市面上流通的旧版硬币，以新版取代。

detailed_translations.chinese: 血液循环；（资料、货币等）流通
detailed_translations.english: the movement of blood around your body

name: authentic
trans: 真正的； 法律证实的

sentences.english: an authentic account
sentences.chinese: 真实可信的说法

detailed_translations.chinese: 真的， 真正的； 可靠的， 可信的
detailed_translations.english: based on facts

sentences.english: Bob ate his lunch with evident enjoyment.
sentences.chinese: 显然鲍勃吃午饭吃得津津有味。

detailed_translations.english: easy to see, notice, or understand

sentences.english: a building used to lodge prisoners of war
sentences.chinese: 一座关押战俘的建筑物

sentences.english: The bullet lodged in the sergeant's leg, shattering his thigh bone.
sentences.chinese: 子弹射入这个军士的腿部，击碎了他的大腿骨。

detailed_translations.english: to pay to live in a room in someone’s house
If an object lodges somewhere, it becomes stuck there

detailed_translations.chinese: 乡间小屋， 旅舍； 寄宿者， 投宿者
detailed_translations.english: a small house on the land of a large country house, usually at the main entrance gate

sentences.english: These antibodies work against the measles virus.
sentences.chinese: 这些抗体有对抗麻疹病毒作用。

sentences.english: This is why many viruses, such as measles, make us ill only once.
sentences.chinese: 这就是为什么许多病毒，如麻疹，只会使我们生病一次。

sentences.english: Imagine if we have an outbreak of measles and the information is relayed to us three months after the outbreak.
sentences.chinese: 想像一下如果我们已经爆发了麻疹，而消息是在爆发后的三个月后才传到我们这里。

detailed_translations.english: an infectious illness in which you have a fever and small red spots on your face and body. People often have measles when they are children.

sentences.english: We humans appear to be meaning-seeking creatures that have the misfortune to be thrown into a world devoid of intrinsic meaning.
sentences.chinese: 我们人类似乎是寻求意义的生物，而很不幸，我们却进入了一个本质上缺乏意义的世界。

sentences.english: Rice cakes may seem like a good option – after all they're fat-free and low in calories – but they're also devoid of fibre and protein and can make you crave something more satisfying.
sentences.chinese: 大米蛋糕似乎是好的选择-毕竟它们无脂肪，低卡路里-但是它们也缺乏纤维和蛋白质，会使你渴望更令人满意的东西。

name: psychological
trans: 心理学的； 心理的， 精神的

sentences.english: Sleep disorders are a serious psychological problem .
sentences.chinese: 睡眠障碍是严重的心理疾病。

sentences.english: Freud’s psychological theories
sentences.chinese: 弗洛伊德的心理学理论

sentences.english: What was the patient’s psychological state ?
sentences.chinese: 病人的心理状态如何？

detailed_translations.english: relating to the way that your mind works and the way that this affects your behaviour

name: commit
trans: 做； 犯； 交付； 受约束， 致力于

sentences.english: Women commit fewer crimes than men.
sentences.chinese: 女性犯罪比男性少。

detailed_translations.chinese: 犯， 干； 使承诺； 把…托付给； 调拨…供使用， 拨出
detailed_translations.english: to do something wrong or illegal

sentences.english: a patriarchal society
sentences.chinese: 父权制社会

detailed_translations.chinese: 家长的；族长的；由族长统治的
detailed_translations.english: ruled or controlled only by men

sentences.english: Her earlier work shows a lot of originality.
sentences.chinese: 她的早期作品显示出丰富的独创性。

sentences.english: A lot of his designs lack originality.
sentences.chinese: 他的很多设计都缺乏创意。

sentences.english: a young writer of great originality
sentences.chinese: 一位极富创意的年轻作家

detailed_translations.chinese: 创意；独创性，创造力；原始；新奇
detailed_translations.english: when something is completely new and different from anything that anyone has thought of before

name: empirical
trans: 经验主义的， 经验的

sentences.english: empirical evidence
sentences.chinese: 实验证据

detailed_translations.english: based on scientific testing or practical experience, not on ideas

sentences.english: Any particulate filter eventually clogs, so you have to replace it as breathing becomes difficult.
sentences.chinese: 任何微粒过滤器最终会阻塞，所以当感到呼吸困难时，你必须更换它。

sentences.english: We tell you not only are they teeming with life, but the planets and stars and the space particulate between are themselves all conscious beings.
sentences.chinese: 我们告诉你，不只那些（有形体）上满布着生命体，而且行星、星体和空间微粒之间也满布着有意识的存有。

sentences.english: ...the particulate pollution in our atmosphere.
sentences.chinese: ...我们大气中的颗粒污染。

detailed_translations.english: Particulates are very small particles of a substance, especially those that are produced when fuel is burned

sentences.english: measures to curb the spread of the virus
sentences.chinese: 控制病毒扩散的措施

detailed_translations.english: to control or limit something in order to prevent it from having a harmful effect

detailed_translations.chinese: 控制， 约束； 路缘
detailed_translations.english: an influence which helps to control or limit something

sentences.english: an outpatient clinic
sentences.chinese: 门诊诊所

sentences.english: a routine examination in outpatients
sentences.chinese: 在医院门诊部的例行检查

detailed_translations.english: someone who goes to a hospital for treatment but does not stay for the night

sentences.english: the enveloping darkness
sentences.chinese: 笼罩四周的黑暗

detailed_translations.english: to cover or wrap something or someone up completely

sentences.english: Look out for icy patches on the road.
sentences.chinese: 小心路上结冰的地方。

sentences.english: a cat with a white patch on its chest
sentences.chinese: 胸部有一块白斑的猫

sentences.english: He combs his hair over his bald patch .
sentences.chinese: 他把头发梳过来盖住秃掉的地方。

detailed_translations.chinese: 眼罩；斑点；碎片；小块土地
detailed_translations.english: a small area of something that is different from the area around it
to repair a hole in something by putting a piece of something else over it

name: predicate
trans: 使基于； 断言， 肯定； 暗示

sentences.english: The company’s expansion was predicated on the assumption that sales would rise.
sentences.chinese: 公司的扩张是基于销售额会增长的假设。

detailed_translations.english: the part of a sentence that makes a statement about the subject, such as ‘swim’ in ‘Fish swim’ and ‘is an artist’ in ‘She is an artist’

detailed_translations.chinese: [化学] 沉淀，[化学] 沉淀物；降水；冰雹；坠落；鲁莽
detailed_translations.english: rain, snow etc that falls on the ground, or the amount of rain, snow etc that falls

name: character
trans: 性格； 特征； 字符

sentences.english: He has a cheerful but quiet character.
sentences.chinese: 他的性格乐观文静。

sentences.english: Everyone recognizes Disney’s cartoon characters.
sentences.chinese: 迪士尼的卡通人物尽人皆知。

sentences.english: The whole character of the school has changed.
sentences.chinese: 这所学校的特色已经完全变了。

detailed_translations.english: the particular combination of qualities that makes someone a particular type of person

name: ongoing
trans: 进行中的， 不间断的

sentences.english: their ongoing search for a new director
sentences.chinese: 他们仍在寻找一个新主任

sentences.english: ongoing negotiations
sentences.chinese: 还在进行的谈判

sentences.english: The discussions are still ongoing.
sentences.chinese: 讨论仍在继续。

detailed_translations.english: continuing, or continuing to develop

sentences.english: She bought a new outfit for the party.
sentences.chinese: 她为了这次派对买了套新衣服。

sentences.english: a cowboy outfit
sentences.chinese: 一套牛仔服装

detailed_translations.english: a set of clothes worn together, especially for a special occasion
to provide someone or something with a set of clothes or equipment, especially ones that are needed for a particular purpose

sentences.english: At least one supernova occurs per decade in our galaxy.
sentences.chinese: 每十年至少有一颗超新星在我们的银河系中出现。

detailed_translations.english: a very large exploding star

sentences.english: a star in the constellation of Orion
sentences.chinese: 猎户座的一颗恒星

detailed_translations.chinese: [天] 星座；星群；荟萃；兴奋丛
detailed_translations.english: a group of stars that forms a particular pattern and has a name

sentences.english: Officials refuse to divulge details of the negotiations.
sentences.chinese: 官员们拒绝透露谈判的细节。

detailed_translations.english: to give someone information that should be secret

sentences.english: So why would you want to lower your cholesterol?
sentences.chinese: 那么为什么你想降低你的胆固醇呢？

sentences.english: If it does, you should discuss with your physician other approaches to cholesterol control.
sentences.chinese: 若确实如此，您应该与您的医生讨论其他控制胆固醇方法。

sentences.english: "In order to prevent this oxidation of cholesterol, we need to consume antioxidants, preferably natural antioxidants that you get from fruits and vegetables, " he said in an interview.
sentences.chinese: “为了防止这种胆固醇氧化，我们需要消耗抗氧化剂，最好是从水果和蔬菜得到的天然抗氧化剂， ”他在接受采访时说道。

detailed_translations.english: a chemical substance found in your blood. Too much cholesterol in your body may cause heart disease.

sentences.english: a crass remark
sentences.chinese: 粗鲁的言语

sentences.english: an act of crass stupidity
sentences.chinese: 愚蠢的行为

detailed_translations.english: behaving in a stupid and offensive way which shows that you do not understand or care about other people’s feelings

name: runner
trans: 蔓藤； 推销员； 长跑者

sentences.english: a long-distance runner
sentences.chinese: 长跑运动员

sentences.english: a marathon runner
sentences.chinese: 马拉松运动员

detailed_translations.chinese: 跑步者；走私者；推销员；送信人
detailed_translations.english: someone who runs for sport or pleasure

sentences.english: respiratory disease
sentences.chinese: 呼吸道疾病

detailed_translations.english: relating to breathing or your lungs

name: negligible
trans: 可忽略不计的； 微不足道的

sentences.english: The damage done to his property was negligible.
sentences.chinese: 对他财产造成的损失微不足道。

detailed_translations.english: too slight or unimportant to have any effect

sentences.english: Even moderate amounts of alcohol can be dangerous.
sentences.chinese: 喝酒即使不多也会有危险。

sentences.english: a moderate degree of success
sentences.chinese: 一定程度上的成功

sentences.english: a student of moderate ability
sentences.chinese: 能力一般的学生

sentences.english: Moderate exercise, such as walking, is recommended.
sentences.chinese: 建议适度锻炼，比如散步。

sentences.english: Bake the pie for 30 minutes in a moderate oven.
sentences.chinese: 馅饼用中火烘烤30分钟。

sentences.english: moderate to strong winds
sentences.chinese: 中到大风

detailed_translations.english: not very large or very small, very hot or very cold, very fast or very slow etc
someone whose opinions or beliefs, especially about politics, are not extreme and are considered reasonable by most people
to make something less extreme or violent, or to become less extreme or violent

sentences.english: The house comprises two bedrooms, a kitchen, and a living room.
sentences.chinese: 这座房子有两间卧室、一间厨房和一间起居室。

sentences.english: Women comprise a high proportion of part-time workers.
sentences.chinese: 兼职人员中妇女占了很大一部分。

detailed_translations.english: to consist of particular parts, groups etc

sentences.english: So we get at the number of neutrons indirectly because we know the proton number here.
sentences.chinese: 所以，我们可以间接得到中子数,因为我们知道质子数了。

sentences.english: When a neutron inside an atom decays, it produces a proton, an electron, and a neutrino.
sentences.chinese: 原子内的一个中子衰变后会产生一个质子、一个电子和一个中微子。

sentences.english: Hydrogen, the most common molecule in the universe, is just two atoms—each with one proton and one electron.
sentences.chinese: 是宇宙中最普通的分子，仅有两个原子构成，每个原子仅包含一个质子和一个电子。

detailed_translations.english: a very small piece of matter with a positive electrical  charge  that is in the central part of an atom

sentences.english: political upheaval
sentences.chinese: 政治剧变

something that gives someone more confidence, or that helps something increase, improve, or become successful

sentences.chinese: 他们的政治教条使他们对国家的真正需求视而不见。

sentences.chinese: …一把牙钻。

sentences.chinese: 那名遇害女孩的家人吁请公众协助捉拿凶手。

sentences.chinese: 农场主请求政府帮助。

sentences.chinese: 设备及办公用品被装箱运走了。

sentences.chinese: 心血管疾病

sentences.chinese: 该医生的预后是劳伦斯可能在12个月之内能走动。

sentences.chinese: 要成为一位发明家或企业家，你必须得是个乐天派。

sentences.chinese: 如果你们当中任何一个人成了企业家，这也是我希望你们做到的，你自己会有什么样的储备，那样的一段旅程又将是什么样的？

name: democracy

sentences.chinese: 16年军人统治后民主制度的恢复

sentences.chinese: 这座城市需要改善公共交通。

detailed_translations.english: a system or method for carrying passengers or goods from one place to another

sentences.chinese: 朝鲜半岛

detailed_translations.english: a piece of land almost completely surrounded by water but joined to a large area of land

sentences.chinese: 学校逐步形成了自己的教学风格。

sentences.chinese: 妇女们将羊毛预备、纺线并染色。

trans: 大量的； 多方面的， 广泛的

name: mineralize
trans: 使矿物化  into an ore)

sentences.english: Using water softeners to de-mineralize drinking water may reduce some of the potentially helpful effects.

sentences.chinese: 牙结石 — 如果菌斑呆的时间足够长，它就开始矿化变硬形成牙石或牙垢，因为菌斑从唾液中吸收了钙，磷和其他 矿物质。

sentences.chinese: 地质学家把板块运动及这种运动所造成的后果看作是板块构造运动。

sentences.chinese: 我下令撤离所有的美国人，并派部队去保证他们的安全。

sentences.chinese: “它有很好的服务范围并因其多功能性而受到航空公司的青睐，”他说。

sentences.chinese: 他录制了每一首主要的小提琴曲，爵士乐，拉格泰姆以及犹太人民间音乐。

sentences.english: I aim to instill in them the pleasure of giving.

sentences.english: nuclear installations
sentences.chinese: 核设施

detailed_translations.english: when someone fits a piece of equipment somewhere

sentences.english: The sound of gunfire made the crowd scatter in all directions.
sentences.chinese: 枪声使人群四散奔逃。

detailed_translations.english: if a group of people or animals scatter, or if something scatters them, they move quickly in different directions

detailed_translations.chinese: 分布不均；分配不当，分配不公
detailed_translations.english: faulty, unequal, or unfair distribution (as of wealth, business, etc)

name: federal
trans: 联邦的， 联邦政府的

sentences.english: Switzerland is a federal republic.
sentences.chinese: 瑞士是一个联邦共和国。

detailed_translations.english: a federal country or system of government consists of a group of states which control their own affairs, but which are also controlled by a single national government which makes decisions on foreign affairs, defence etc

sentences.english: 34 protesters were arrested for violating criminal law.
sentences.chinese: 34名抗议者因违反刑法而被逮捕。

sentences.english: regimes that violate human rights
sentences.chinese: 侵犯人权的政权

detailed_translations.english: to disobey or do something against an official agreement, law, principle etc

sentences.english: The congregation knelt to pray.
sentences.chinese: 会众跪下祈祷。

detailed_translations.english: a group of people gathered together in a church

sentences.english: I verified the source from which I had that information.
sentences.chinese: 我核实了我获知那条信息的来源。

sentences.english: His statement was verified by several witnesses.
sentences.chinese: 他的说法得到了几位证人的证实。

detailed_translations.english: to discover whether something is correct or true

sentences.english: He was steering with only one hand.
sentences.chinese: 他只用一只手在驾驶。

detailed_translations.english: to control the direction a vehicle is going, for example by turning a wheel

sentences.english: a collective decision made by all board members
sentences.chinese: 董事会所有成员作出的集体决定

sentences.english: our collective responsibility for the environment
sentences.chinese: 我们对环境的共同责任

detailed_translations.english: shared or made by every member of a group or society

sentences.english: They've gone on an excursion to York.
sentences.chinese: 他们到约克旅游去了。

detailed_translations.english: a short journey made for pleasure, especially one that has been organized for a group of people

name: undergo
trans: 经历， 经受； 忍受

sentences.english: The country has undergone massive changes recently.
sentences.chinese: 这个国家最近经历了巨大的变化。

sentences.english: He has been released from prison to undergo medical treatment in the United States.
sentences.chinese: 他获释出狱去美国接受治疗。

sentences.english: She has been undergoing tests since Monday.
sentences.chinese: 她从星期一开始一直在接受各种检查。

sentences.english: Teachers should be expected to undergo mid-career training and development.
sentences.chinese: 教师应该参加中期职业培训和发展活动。

detailed_translations.english: if you undergo a change, an unpleasant experience etc, it happens to you or is done to you

sentences.english: Mr Bailey was looking very spruce in a white linen suit.
sentences.chinese: 贝利先生穿着白色亚麻套装，看上去很整洁。

detailed_translations.english: neat and clean
a tree that grows in nor-thern countries and has short leaves shaped like needles

name: outlying
trans: 远离城市的， 边远的

sentences.english: one of the outlying suburbs
sentences.chinese: 边远郊区之一

detailed_translations.english: far from the centre of a city, town etc or from a main building

detailed_translations.chinese: 放在…外面；在撒谎上胜过（outlie的ing形式）

sentences.english: Biography must to some extent delineate characters.
sentences.chinese: 在某种程度上，传记一定要描述人物。

detailed_translations.english: If you delineate something such as an idea or situation, you describe it or define it, often in a lot of detail

sentences.english: The buildings reflect the elegance of a bygone era.
sentences.chinese: 这些建筑物反映了过去年代的典雅。

detailed_translations.english: a period of time in the past

name: erase
trans: 擦掉， 抹去； 消除

sentences.english: The computer crashed, and all our records were erased.
sentences.chinese: 计算机瘫痪了，我们所有的记录都被删除了。

detailed_translations.english: to remove information from a computer memory or recorded sounds from a tape

sentences.english: The coupon entitles you to ten cents off your next purchase.
sentences.chinese: 这张优惠券可以让你在下次购物时节省10分钱。

detailed_translations.chinese: 息票；赠券；联票；[经] 配给券
detailed_translations.english: a small piece of printed paper that gives you the right to pay less for something or get something free

sentences.english: The supplies were sent on the railroad.
sentences.chinese: 补给经由铁路运送。

sentences.english: a railroad station
sentences.chinese: 火车站

detailed_translations.english: a railway or the railway

sentences.english: I had never seen such a multitude of stars before.
sentences.chinese: 我以前从未见过这么多的星星。

sentences.english: a multitude of possible interpretations
sentences.chinese: 种种可能的解释

detailed_translations.english: a very large number of people or things

name: hominid
trans: 原始人类； 灵长目动物

sentences.english: A hominid is really any extinct ape more closely related to us than the chimpanzee.
sentences.chinese: 原始人类中任何一个灭绝的猿物种和我们的关系都比黑猩猩更密切。

sentences.english: From one perspective, the development of a very small penis could be considered the next step in male hominid evolution.
sentences.chinese: 从这一角度看，在原始男性进化中，非常小阴茎的男人在下一步可能优先考虑发展。

sentences.english: H. erectus is generally believed to be the direct ancestor of modern humans and also the first hominid to live in caves and tame fire.
sentences.chinese: 人们通常认为直立人是现代人的直接祖先，也是第一个生活在洞穴中和学会用火的原始人类。

detailed_translations.english: any primate of the family Hominidae, which includes modern man (Homo sapiens) and the extinct precursors of man

sentences.english: The woods are inhabited by many wild animals.
sentences.chinese: 很多野生动物栖居在这片森林里。

sentences.english: inhabited islands
sentences.chinese: 有人居住的岛屿

detailed_translations.english: if animals or people inhabit an area or place, they live there

sentences.english: new countermeasures against terrorism
sentences.chinese: 对抗恐怖主义的新措施

detailed_translations.english: an action taken to prevent another action from having a harmful effect

sentences.english: Children have an innate ability to learn language.
sentences.chinese: 儿童学习语言的能力是与生俱来的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 先天的；固有的；与生俱来的
detailed_translations.english: an innate quality or ability is something you are born with

name: downstream
trans: 顺流而下， 朝下游方向

sentences.english: a boat drifting downstream
sentences.chinese: 顺流漂下的小船

sentences.english: Breaking the dam could submerge downstream cities such as Wuhan.
sentences.chinese: 毁坏大坝可能会淹没武汉这样的下游城市。

detailed_translations.english: in the direction that the water in a river or stream is flowing
Downstream is also an adjective

sentences.english: The siege lasted almost four months.
sentences.chinese: 这次封锁历时近四个月。

sentences.english: a three-day police siege at a remote country cottage
sentences.chinese: 警方对一座偏僻村舍历时三天的包围

detailed_translations.chinese: 围攻；包围；围城；不断袭击；长期努力
detailed_translations.english: a situation in which an army or the police surround a place and try to gain control of it or force someone to come out of it

sentences.english: Neutrons and protons are bound together in the nucleus of an atom.
sentences.chinese: 在一个原子的核内，中子和质子聚合在一起。

sentences.english: the nucleus of an effective team
sentences.chinese: 高效团队的核心

detailed_translations.english: the central part of an atom, made up of neutrons, protons, and other elementary particles

sentences.english: She felt the sting of tears in her eyes.
sentences.chinese: 她感觉泪水刺痛了眼睛。

sentences.english: He was stung by a bee.
sentences.chinese: 他被蜜蜂蜇了。

detailed_translations.english: a sharp pain in your eyes or skin, caused by being hit, by smoke etc
(of an insect or plant) to touch your skin or make a very small hole in it so that you feel a sharp pain

sentences.english: By the age of seven, children are capable of thinking in abstract terms .
sentences.chinese: 儿童到了七岁就具有抽象思维的能力。

sentences.english: Human beings are the only creatures capable of abstract thought (=  thinking about ideas  ) .
sentences.chinese: 人类是唯一具有抽象思维能力的动物。

detailed_translations.english: based on general ideas or principles rather than specific examples or real events

detailed_translations.chinese: 摘要，梗概；抽象派艺术作品
detailed_translations.english: a painting, design etc which contains shapes or images that do not look like real things or people

sentences.english: You're a skeptic.
sentences.chinese: 你是个怀疑论者。

sentences.english: And, most importantly to the skeptic, Jesus did all this in history.
sentences.chinese: 而，最能取信于怀疑者的一点是，耶稣确实在历史上做过这些事情。

sentences.english: alluvial flood plains
sentences.chinese: 冲积泛滥平原

detailed_translations.english: made of soil left by rivers, lakes, floods etc

sentences.english: This quasar was the only one without a known host galaxy.
sentences.chinese: 这个类星体似乎无依无傍，不在任何一个星系当中。

sentences.english: Within a few million years, both quasar and galaxy will have merged.
sentences.chinese: 在几百万年的时间里，类星体和伴星系将会合并在一起。

sentences.english: But scientists have now found a quasar that's apparently churning out new stars in the absence of a host galaxy.
sentences.chinese: 但是现在科学家们发现，一颗没有挂靠主星系的类星体显然在大量地制造出新恒星。

detailed_translations.english: an object in space that is similar to a star and that shines very brightly

name: paternity
trans: 父权； 父系， 父系后裔

sentences.english: The paternity of the child is in dispute.
sentences.chinese: 这个孩子的生父是谁尚有疑问。

sentences.english: the anonymous author of a collection of poems
sentences.chinese: 一本诗集的佚名作者

sentences.english: According to one employee, who wishes to remain anonymous , the company engaged in illegal activities.
sentences.chinese: 根据一位不愿透露姓名的员工所述，这家公司曾从事非法活动。

detailed_translations.english: unknown by name

sentences.english: I worked with him over a span of six years.
sentences.chinese: 我和他共事达六年之久。

sentences.english: The bridge crosses the river in a single span.
sentences.chinese: 河上的桥为单跨桥。

detailed_translations.english: the length of time that sth lasts or is able to continue

sentences.english: a hormonal imbalance
sentences.chinese: 内分泌失调

detailed_translations.english: a lack of a fair or correct balance between two things, which results in problems or unfairness

sentences.english: a bizarre coincidence
sentences.chinese: 奇怪的巧合

sentences.english: dancers in rather bizarre costumes
sentences.chinese: 身着奇装异服的舞者

detailed_translations.english: very unusual or strange

sentences.english: Houses in the subdivision are going for astronomical prices.
sentences.chinese: 该小区里的房子在以天价出售。

detailed_translations.english: astronomical prices, costs etc are extremely high
the ability of the land or soil to produce good crops

sentences.english: The report ascribes the rise in childhood asthma to the increase in pollution.
sentences.chinese: 这份报告认为儿童哮喘发病率上升是因为污染加剧。

sentences.english: He ascribed his failure to bad luck.
sentences.chinese: 他认为自己的失败是运气不好。

detailed_translations.english: to claim that something is caused by a particular person, situation etc

name: threshold
trans: 门槛； 开端， 起点

sentences.english: She opened the door and stepped across the threshold.
sentences.chinese: 她打开门，跨过门槛。

sentences.english: The creature is on the threshold of extinction.
sentences.chinese: 这种生物已濒临灭绝。

detailed_translations.english: the entrance to a room or building, or the area of floor or ground at the entrance

sentences.english: A German man and woman, their faces in close-up, talked about the good and essential symbiotic nature of termite mounds, with subtitles.
sentences.chinese: 一个德国男人和女人的脸部特写镜头，他们在谈论白蚁堆美好而必要的共栖性特质，带字幕。

sentences.english: Office blocks modeled on termite nests and buildings that can resist climate change have been the focus at a conference by some of Australia's most influential designers in Melbourne.
sentences.chinese: 澳大利亚一些最有影响的设计师在墨尔本的一个会议上着重讨论了以白蚁巢穴为模型的办公楼群，以及能够抵御气候变化的建筑物。

sentences.english: The hills recede into the distance and now we are in vast grasslands dotted with termite mounds, skyscraper sandcastles of the insect world.
sentences.chinese: 山丘已经远去，我们现在行进在宽广的草原上，草地上有白蚁堆，那是昆虫世界的摩天大楼。

detailed_translations.english: an insect that eats and destroys wood from trees and buildings

sentences.english: A recent poll found that 80% of Californians support the governor.
sentences.chinese: 最近的一项民意调查发现80%的加利福尼亚人支持州长。

sentences.english: Polls indicate that education is the top issue with voters.
sentences.chinese: 民意调查显示，教育是选民心中的头等大事。

sentences.english: Labour is ahead in the polls.
sentences.chinese: 工党在民意调查中处于领先地位。

sentences.english: The latest public opinion poll showed that 25% of us consider ourselves superstitious.
sentences.chinese: 最新的民意调查显示我们中有25%的人认为自己迷信。

detailed_translations.chinese: 民意测验；政治选举，大选
detailed_translations.english: the process of finding out what people think about something by asking many people the same question, or the record of the result

detailed_translations.chinese: 对…进行民意测验； 获得
detailed_translations.english: to ask a lot of people the same questions in order to find out what they think about a subject

sentences.english: Gaelic is still spoken in Ireland by a tiny minority.
sentences.chinese: 爱尔兰仍有极少数人在说盖尔语。

detailed_translations.english: a small group of people or things within a much larger group

sentences.english: stringent anti-noise regulations
sentences.chinese: 严格的防噪音条例

detailed_translations.chinese: 严格的；严厉的；紧缩的；短缺的
detailed_translations.english: a stringent law, rule, standard etc is very strict and must be obeyed

sentences.english: Scientists set up an avian casino in which pigeons could place their bets on one of two symbols.
sentences.chinese: 科学家们设置了一个鸟类的“卡西诺赌场”，在那里放上两个标志以供鸽子下赌注。

sentences.english: From 1917 to 1957, New Jersey's Fort Monmouth served as the breeding and training ground for these avian soldiers.
sentences.chinese: 从1917年到1957年，新泽西的福特蒙茅斯被用作饲养和训练这些鸟类战士的基地。

detailed_translations.english: of, relating to, or resembling a bird

sentences.english: a combustion chamber
sentences.chinese: 燃烧室

sentences.english: The heart has four chambers.
sentences.chinese: 心脏有四个腔。

detailed_translations.chinese: （身体或器官内的）室，膛；房间；会所
detailed_translations.english: an enclosed space, especially in your body or inside a machine

detailed_translations.chinese: 把…关在室内；装填（弹药等）

sentences.english: She says Russians have a lot of experience with dairy cows in barns, but not with beef cattle on open rangeland.
sentences.chinese: 她表示，俄罗斯人在圈养奶牛方面经验丰富，但没有在开放牧场养殖菜牛的经验。

sentences.english: She says Russians have a lot of experience with dairy cows in barns, but not with beef cattle on open rangeland.
sentences.chinese: 她说俄罗斯对牲口棚中养殖奶牛很有经验，但对户外牧场养殖肉牛没有太多经验。

sentences.english: However, some of the positive trends represent woodland and bush encroachment into rangeland and farmland - which is not generally regarded as land improvement.
sentences.chinese: 尽管如此，部分积极的发展趋势表现为林地和灌木丛对牧场和农田的侵占，这通常不被认为是土地改善。

detailed_translations.english: land that naturally produces forage plants suitable for grazing but where rainfall is too low or erratic for growing crops

sentences.english: an investment portfolio
sentences.chinese: 投资组合

detailed_translations.chinese: 公文包；文件夹；证券投资组合；部长职务
detailed_translations.english: a large flat case used especially for carrying pictures, documents etc

sentences.english: We find the defendant not guilty.
sentences.chinese: 我们裁定被告无罪。

detailed_translations.english: the person in a court of law who has been  accused  of doing something illegal

sentences.english: You can’t go on evading your responsibilities in this way.
sentences.chinese: 你不能这样继续逃避责任。

sentences.english: You’re simply trying to evade the problem.
sentences.chinese: 你根本是在设法逃避问题。

detailed_translations.english: to not do or deal with something that you should do

sentences.english: The Supreme Court unanimously ruled that racial segregation in schools was unconstitutional.
sentences.chinese: 最高法院一致裁定学校实施的种族隔离措施违反宪法。

detailed_translations.english: when people of different races, sexes, or religions are kept apart so that they live, work, or study separately

name: depart
trans: 背离， 违反； 出发

sentences.english: Flights by Air Europe depart Gatwick on Tuesdays.
sentences.chinese: 欧洲航空公司的航班每逢周二从盖特威克机场起飞。

detailed_translations.chinese: 离开；出发，起程；违反；去世
detailed_translations.english: to leave, especially when you are starting a journey

sentences.english: I couldn’t sleep for three days – I’m not exaggerating.
sentences.chinese: 我三天没睡觉了——一点不夸张。

detailed_translations.english: to make something seem better, larger, worse etc than it really is

sentences.english: ...the cerebral cortex.
sentences.chinese: ...大脑皮层。

detailed_translations.english: the outer layer of an organ in your body, especially your brain

sentences.english: oil exploration facilities in the North Sea
sentences.chinese: 北海的石油勘探设施

sentences.english: You can then use this hut as a base for explorations into the mountains around.
sentences.chinese: 你到时可以把这间小屋当大本营，去周围的山里探险。

detailed_translations.english: the act of travelling through a place in order to find out about it or find something such as oil or gold in it

sentences.english: an implied threat
sentences.chinese: 隐含的威胁

sentences.english: The high level of radiation in the rocks implies that they are volcanic in origin.
sentences.chinese: 这些岩石内的高辐射水平显示它们是由火山作用形成的。

detailed_translations.english: to suggest that something is true, without saying this directly

sentences.english: He was able to offset his travel expenses against tax.
sentences.chinese: 他可以用旅费抵税。

sentences.english: What expenses can you offset against tax ?
sentences.chinese: 什么开支可以获得税项减免？

detailed_translations.english: to use one cost, payment or situation in order to cancel or reduce the effect of another

name: parlor
trans: 会客室； 店堂； 餐车

sentences.english: The parlor overlooks the street.
sentences.chinese: 这客厅可俯瞰街道。

sentences.english: One day, she said, as she was leaving the priest’s parlor, he pulled her aside for a passionate kiss.
sentences.chinese: 她说，一天，在她离开那位牧师的客厅时，他把她拉到一边，激情地吻了她。

sentences.english: I thought maybe Grandpa came over and sat around the den or parlor or whatever for years before he proposed.
sentences.chinese: 我以前以为奶奶来到爷爷家，坐在私室或客厅或什么地方几年，然后爷爷才求婚的。

sentences.english: Her thick black hair cascaded down below her waist.
sentences.chinese: 她那浓密的黑发瀑布般垂过腰际。

sentences.english: Gallons of water cascaded over the side of the bath.
sentences.chinese: 大量的水从浴缸边溢出来。

detailed_translations.english: a small steep  waterfall  that is one of several together

detailed_translations.chinese: 像瀑布般大量倾泻下来
detailed_translations.english: to flow, fall, or hang down in large quantities

sentences.english: Are you ready to make a long-term commitment ?
sentences.chinese: 你是否准备好作出长久的承诺？

detailed_translations.english: a promise to do something or to behave in a particular way

name: capture
trans: 捕捉； 占领； 吸引， 赢得

sentences.english: Government troops have succeeded in capturing the rebel leader.
sentences.chinese: 政府军已经成功抓获叛乱分子的头目。

sentences.english: 40 captured French soldiers
sentences.chinese: 40名被俘虏的法国士兵

detailed_translations.english: to catch a person and keep them as a prisoner

sentences.english: The king of Israel has come out to look for a flea--as one hunts a partridge in the mountains.
sentences.chinese: 以色列王出来是寻找一个虼蚤，如同人在山上猎取一个鹧鸪一般。

sentences.english: As a boy, I hunted there for partridge, walking among a line of beaters, the tall grasses so dense that I was invisible to the next man only 10 feet away.
sentences.chinese: 作为一个小男孩，我捕猎松鸡，在一列狙击手里穿梭。 那儿的高颈草如此浓密以至我看不见10英里外的人。

sentences.english: He was too busy with cricket, partridge shooting and setting up Pakistan's only specialist cancer hospital.
sentences.chinese: 彼时他正忙于打板球、射鹧鸪和筹建巴基斯坦唯一的癌症专科医院，无暇顾及其他。

detailed_translations.english: a fat brown bird with a short tail which is shot for sport and food

sentences.english: fossils of early reptiles
sentences.chinese: 早期爬行动物的化石

sentences.english: Marine sponges have a long fossil record (= their development has been recorded over a long period ).
sentences.chinese: 海绵动物留下了漫长的化石记录。

detailed_translations.english: an animal or plant that lived many thousands of years ago and that has been preserved, or the shape of one of these animals or plants that has been preserved in rock

sentences.english: Since masturbation can help you have babies, Saletan argues, it must also serve the "procreative and unitive purposes" described in the Catechism.

sentences.english: Standing on the floor, a young boarder named Carl was admiring the view.

sentences.chinese: 她用自己的外孙女为例。 起先她只是白天来上课，但是很快，她就想成为寄宿生。

sentences.chinese: 没有逃离这个人间炼狱的村民们，诸如来自RCM寄膳宿者机构的学校教师和学生，都遭政府军逮捕，以充作人肉炸弹盾牌。

detailed_translations.english: a student who stays at a school during the night, as well as during the day

sentences.english: Church bells tolled and black flags fluttered.
sentences.chinese: 教堂丧钟敲响了，黑旗飘动着。

detailed_translations.english: the number of people killed or injured in a particular accident, by a particular illness etc

sentences.english: Around one third of our meals should be based on carbohydrate, with roughly one half of these grains being whole.
sentences.chinese: 我们每餐食物应当差不多有三分之一是碳水化合物，大概有一半谷物食品为全麦的。

sentences.english: There have been no studies of the effects of a low carbohydrate diet on pregnancy, so its effect on the fetus, if any, are unknown.
sentences.chinese: 目前为止还没有关于怀孕时低碳水化合物饮食影响的研究，因此如果对胎儿有什么影响也是不知道的。

sentences.english: The reason for this is that carbohydrate consumption stimulates insulin production, which aids the production of muscle glycogen.
sentences.chinese: 这是因为是碳水化合物的消耗刺激了胰岛素的分泌，后者对于肌肉糖原产生有帮助。

detailed_translations.english: a substance that is in foods such as sugar, bread, and potatoes, which provides your body with heat and energy and which consists of oxygen,  hydrogen  , and  carbon

sentences.english: Most of his poems are variations on the theme of love.
sentences.chinese: 他的大部分诗作都是有关爱情主题的形式不同的作品。

detailed_translations.chinese: 变化；[生物] 变异，变种

sentences.english: the apex of a pyramid

detailed_translations.english: the top or highest part of something pointed or curved

sentences.english: It is easy to have an opinion on a moral issue like the death penalty for murder.

sentences.english: If we accept that certain babies should be allowed to die, we place doctors in a moral dilemma .
sentences.chinese: 如果我们同意应该允许某些婴儿死去，那就是让医生在道德上处于两难境地了。

sentences.english: Man is gifted with a moral sense by which he distinguishes good from evil.
sentences.chinese: 人类天生有道德意识，能区分善与恶。

sentences.chinese: ...尽管资产价值略有减少。

sentences.english: The demonstrators were ejected from the hall.
sentences.chinese: 示威者被赶出大厅。

sentences.english: Two engines cut out and the plane started to eject fuel as it lost height.
sentences.chinese: 两个发动机突然熄火，飞机在下降的同时开始喷出燃料。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone leave a place or building by using force

sentences.english: I hope this will reinforce Indonesian determination to deal with this kind of threat.
sentences.chinese: 我希望这会加强印度尼西亚对付这类威胁的决心。

sentences.english: Both sides have been reinforcing their positions after yesterday's fierce fighting.
sentences.chinese: 在昨天的激战后，双方一直在增援各自的阵地。

sentences.chinese: 炸弹投向了陆军巡逻队，但没有爆炸。

sentences.english: Far sooner than anyone thought possible, the Russians exploded an atomic bomb.
sentences.chinese: 苏联引爆了一颗原子弹，大大早于任何人的预期。

detailed_translations.english: to burst, or to make something burst, into small pieces, usually with a loud noise and in a way that causes damage
to burst, or to make something burst, into small pieces, usually with a loud noise and in a way that causes damage

sentences.chinese: 她沿玻璃杯口看着他。

trans: 财产， 资产； 性质

sentences.english: The hotel is not responsible for any loss or damage to guests’ personal property .
sentences.chinese: 宾馆对住客个人财物的丢失和损坏概不负责。

sentences.chinese: 她被爆炸产生的飞散碎片击中。

sentences.chinese: 他大部分的演讲都用来反驳他在外交政策上受到的各种批评。

sentences.chinese: 这件衣服上的斑点设计，让人联想到蝴蝶或者可能是罗夏墨迹，当然是有艺术性的，但我正等待更多科学证明，之后才能作出评价。

sentences.chinese: 目的探讨儿童慢性胃炎、消化性溃疡的致病因素及流行病学特点。

sentences.chinese: 如果你在服用茶碱类药物，你的医生也可能会建议你远离咖啡因。

sentences.english: Taking it along with caffeinated foods and beverages may increase the concentration of theophylline in your blood. This can cause ill effects, such as nausea, vomiting and heart palpitations.
sentences.chinese: 与含有咖啡因的食品或饮品共同服用可能会增加血液中的茶碱浓度，这将导致一些不良反应，如恶心、呕吐和心悸等。

sentences.chinese: 而这些，主要是由于不断增加的都市化造成的。

sentences.english: These diseases are now everywhere, driven as they are by universal forces, like urbanization and the globalization of unhealthy lifestyles.

sentences.chinese: 刺猬只在夜间出来，到处匆匆地转，找寻食物。

sentences.chinese: 海滩上一个安静的好地方

sentences.chinese: 你说过一些有关将抵抗运动整合进入银河联盟。

sentences.chinese: 所有的三项发现都指出，在宇宙最大的稳定结构，即星系和巨大银河星团中有动态的运动。

sentences.chinese: “那是不允许的，”研究合著者纽约州立大学石溪分校生物物理学家严贯桥说道。

sentences.chinese: 有理由保持谨慎乐观。

sentences.chinese: 政府开支的急剧削减

sentences.chinese: 1月份零售额下降了1.3%。

sentences.english: The wine retails at £6.95 a bottle.
sentences.chinese: 这种葡萄酒每瓶的零售价为6.95英镑。

detailed_translations.english: the sale of goods in shops to customers, for their own use and not for selling to anyone else
to be sold for a particular price in a shop

name: crude
trans: 天然的； 粗糙的， 拙劣的

sentences.english: a crude wooden bridge
sentences.chinese: 粗糙的木桥

sentences.english: crude oil/metal
sentences.chinese: 原油；未经提炼的金属

detailed_translations.english: not developed to a high standard, or made with little skill

name: withstand
trans: 经受住； 抵挡， 反抗

sentences.english: The Chancellor has withstood the criticism and held firm.
sentences.chinese: 总理顶住批评，坚持立场。

detailed_translations.english: to defend yourself successfully against people who attack, criticize, or oppose you

sentences.english: Inertia carried the plane onto the ground.
sentences.chinese: 飞机靠惯性着陆。

sentences.english: I can't seem to throw off this feeling of inertia.
sentences.chinese: 我好像无法摆脱这种无力的感觉。

detailed_translations.english: the force that keeps an object in the same position or keeps it moving until it is moved or stopped by another force

sentences.english: I vacuumed the carpets today.
sentences.chinese: 我今天用吸尘器清洁地毯了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 收集； 用真空吸尘器打扫
detailed_translations.english: to clean using a vacuum cleaner
a space that is completely empty of all gas, especially one from which all the air has been taken away

name: era
trans: 纪元， 年代； 时代

sentences.english: His death marked the end of an era.
sentences.chinese: 他的去世标志着一个时代的终结。

sentences.english: the Victorian era
sentences.chinese: 维多利亚时代

detailed_translations.english: a period of time in history that is known for a particular event, or for particular qualities

sentences.english: He bought a huge house to accommodate his library.
sentences.chinese: 他买了一座大房子来放他的藏书。

sentences.english: The ballroom can accommodate 400 people.
sentences.chinese: 那个舞厅可容纳400人。

detailed_translations.english: if a room, building etc can accommodate a particular number of people or things, it has enough space for them

sentences.english: Our research has only recently begun to yield important results.
sentences.chinese: 直到最近我们的研究才开始取得重要成果。

detailed_translations.english: to produce a result, answer, or piece of information

name: administer
trans: 管理， 执行； 用药)

sentences.english: The money will be administered by local charities.
sentences.chinese: 这笔资金将由当地慈善机构管理。

sentences.english: Our office administers the affairs of the Society.
sentences.chinese: 我们办公室管理协会的事务。

detailed_translations.english: to manage the work or money of a company or organization

sentences.english: In The Possessed the earth quakes: it is not the catastrophe that befalls the imaginative individual, but a cataclysm in which a large portion of humanity is buried, wiped out forever.
sentences.chinese: 在《魔鬼》中发生了地震，这不仅是降临在富于想象力的人头上的大灾难，而是一大半人类被埋葬于其中、永远被消灭的大地震。

detailed_translations.chinese: 灾难； 大洪水；  大变动
detailed_translations.english: a violent or sudden event or change, such as a serious flood or  earthquake

sentences.english: African farmers could effectively control fruit fly damage to citrus fruit, cashew and cocoa crops by using the weaver ant as a method of biological control, according to researchers.
sentences.chinese: 科学家说，非洲农民可以使用织叶蚁作为一种生物防治手段，有效控制柑橘类、腰果和可可的果蝇虫害。

detailed_translations.english: a small curved nut

name: transplant
trans: 移栽 in another soil or situation)； 移植(器官)(to transfer (an organ or tissue) from one part or individual to another)

sentences.english: The operation to transplant a kidney is now fairly routine.
sentences.chinese: 移植肾脏的手术如今相当常见。

detailed_translations.english: to move an organ, piece of skin etc from one person’s body and put it into another as a form of medical treatment

detailed_translations.chinese: 移植；移植器官；被移植物；移居者
detailed_translations.english: the operation of transplanting an organ, piece of skin etc

name: assertion
trans: 宣布； 断言， 主张

sentences.english: She makes very general assertions about marriage in the poem.
sentences.chinese: 她在诗中的婚姻主张非常笼统。

detailed_translations.chinese: 断言，声明；主张，要求；坚持；认定
detailed_translations.english: something that you say or write that you strongly believe

sentences.english: a city ordinance that says parks must be closed at 11 p.m.
sentences.chinese: 规定公园须于夜间11点钟关闭的城市条例

detailed_translations.english: a law, usually of a city or town, that forbids or restricts an activity

sentences.english: the country’s widening budget deficit
sentences.chinese: 这个国家日益严重的预算赤字

sentences.english: the US’s foreign trade deficit
sentences.chinese: 美国的对外贸易逆差

detailed_translations.english: the difference between the amount of something that you have and the higher amount that you need

sentences.english: People who had heard the evidence at the trial were surprised at the outcome.
sentences.chinese: 在审判过程中听过证词的人都对此结果感到吃惊。

detailed_translations.english: the final result of a meeting, discussion, war etc – used especially when no one knows what it will be until it actually happens

sentences.english: a sacred vow
sentences.chinese: 神圣的誓言

sentences.english: the miraculous powers of sacred relics
sentences.chinese: 圣物的神奇力量

sentences.english: Certain animals were considered sacred.
sentences.chinese: 有些动物被认为是神圣的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 神的；神圣的；宗教的；庄严的
detailed_translations.english: relating to a god or religion

sentences.english: This Gothic cathedral has attracted visitors from all around the world .
sentences.chinese: 这座哥特式的大教堂吸引了世界各地的游客。

sentences.english: Rosie gray is the one and only person , if it had not been for her , this crystal cathedral would not be here.
sentences.chinese: 她就是那一位，唯一的一人若没有她，水晶宫大教堂不会存在，这事工永远不会展开。

detailed_translations.english: the main church of a particular area under the control of a  bishop

sentences.english: a synthesis of Eastern and Western philosophical ideas
sentences.chinese: 东西方哲学思想的结合

sentences.english: the synthesis of proteins
sentences.chinese: 蛋白质的合成

sentences.english: speech synthesis software
sentences.chinese: 语音合成软件

detailed_translations.chinese: 综合，综合物；（化学或生物学物质的）合成；（用电子方式对声音、语音或音乐的）合成
detailed_translations.english: something that has been made by combining different things, or the process of combining things

sentences.english: Well, what is the equation of this circle in polar coordinates?
sentences.chinese: 那么，这个圆方程在极坐标系下相当于什么呢？

sentences.english: This image shows part of a polar crater that still holds on to some summer ice, as well as beautiful sand dunes sculpted by the wind.
sentences.chinese: 这张照片展示了某个极地陨坑，陨坑中还保存着一些夏季冰的痕迹，在风的作用下形成了一些美丽的沙丘。

sentences.english: Yet, while not wanting to begrudge the polar bear his ice, we should be at least somewhat concerned at this recent shift in thinking.
sentences.chinese: 然而，虽然我们并不想希望北极熊失去它的冰，我们至少应该对近期的这些意识上的转变有一点担心。

sentences.english: And there wasn't just one millipede found - there was a plague of them!
sentences.chinese: 然而发现的并不只是一条千足虫，其数量之多，简直泛滥成灾！

sentences.english: It is noteworthy that despite their name, no millipede has more than 750 feet.
sentences.chinese: 值得注意的是，尽管他们的名字，没有千足虫已超过750英尺。

sentences.english: Any of several arthropods such as the centipede or millipede having segmented bodies one pair of antennae and at least nine pairs of legs.
sentences.chinese: 多足纲的节肢动物几种节肢动物的任一种，如蜈蚣或千足虫，长有分节的身体、一对触角和至少九对足。

detailed_translations.english: a long thin creature with a very large number of legs

name: unobtrusive
trans: 不显著的， 不引人注目的

sentences.english: The staff are trained to be unobtrusive.
sentences.chinese: 员工们受过训练要保持低调。

detailed_translations.chinese: 不唐突的；谦虚的；不引人注目的
detailed_translations.english: not easily noticed

name: cryptic
trans: 神秘的； 含义模糊的

sentences.english: This thrilling story will keep you on the edge of your seat as you explore the house, collect items and unravel cryptic secrets.
sentences.chinese: 这惊心动魄的故事，将让你在你的座位边，为您探索的房子，收集物品和解开神秘的秘密。

sentences.english: It was the cryptic first sign of a cyberespionage and information-warfare campaign devised to disrupt the 2016 presidential election, the first such attempt by a foreign power in American history.
sentences.chinese: 这是一场网络间谍—信息战行动的第一个神秘迹象，该行动旨在干扰2016年的总统大选，在美国的历史上，这还是第一次有外国势力有这样的举动。

detailed_translations.chinese: 神秘的； 含义模糊的
detailed_translations.english: having a meaning that is mysterious or not easily understood

sentences.english: The banks should have been more circumspect in their dealings.
sentences.chinese: 银行在交易时应更加谨慎。

detailed_translations.english: If you are circumspect, you are cautious in what you do and say and do not take risks

sentences.english: We want to dispel the myth that you cannot eat well in Britain.
sentences.chinese: 我们要消除在英国吃不好的误解。

sentences.english: Light poured into the hall, dispelling the shadows.
sentences.chinese: 阳光洒进大厅，驱散了阴影。

detailed_translations.english: to make something go away, especially a belief, idea, or feeling

sentences.english: These may either be the drug in question or some analogue of it that.
sentences.chinese: 这些小分子可以是目标药物或其它一些类似物。

sentences.english: The kanic acid (KA) is a structural analogue of the aminoglutaminic acid, excitatory amino acid in the brain.
sentences.chinese: 海人酸（KA）是脑内兴奋性氨基酸递质—谷氨酸的结构类似物。

sentences.english: DCA, or dichloroacetic acid, is an analogue of acetic acid in which chlorine atoms replace two of the three hydrogen atoms on the methyl group.
sentences.chinese: DCA也叫二氯乙酸或二氯醋酸，是一种类似乙酸的化合物，但乙基团上有两个氢原子被氯原子所取代。

detailed_translations.english: a physical object or quantity, such as a pointer on a dial or a voltage, used to measure or represent another quantity

sentences.english: Languages are an essential part of the school curriculum.
sentences.chinese: 语言是学校课程中必不可少的部分。

sentences.english: curriculum planning
sentences.chinese: 课程安排

detailed_translations.english: the subjects that are taught by a school, college etc, or the things that are studied in a particular subject

sentences.english: How do you test the prototype of the vending machine?
sentences.chinese: 你如何测试一个自动售货机的原型?。

sentences.english: What is the difference between these prototype declaration?
sentences.chinese: 这些原型声明的区别是什么？

sentences.english: But how do you come up with the architecture for this evolutionary prototype?
sentences.chinese: 但是你将如何为这个进化的原型提出系统的架构呢？

detailed_translations.english: the first form that a new design of a car, machine etc has, or a model of it used to test the design before it is produced

name: repousse
trans: 凸纹饰的； 金属细工的

detailed_translations.chinese: （冲压细工制成）凸纹面；凸纹制作术

sentences.english: In the same demographic breakdown of people may have different characteristics of the consumer mentality.
sentences.chinese: 处于同一人口统计细分的人们，可能具有不同的消费心态特征。

sentences.english: It is generally studied and mapped by an organization through lists and reportscontaining demographic information that may have an effect on the marketing of keyproducts or services.
sentences.chinese: 组织通常通过包含了可能对主要产品或服务的市场营销产生影响的人口统计信息的列表或包括来研究或划分它的。

sentences.english: The paper says the move represents a complete reversal of previous U.S. policy.
sentences.chinese: 报上说这一举动反映了之前美国政策的彻底逆转。

detailed_translations.chinese: 逆转；[摄] 反转；[法] 撤销
detailed_translations.english: A reversal of a process, policy, or trend is a complete change in it

sentences.english: Seven species of birds of prey have been observed.
sentences.chinese: 已有七种猛禽被观察到。

sentences.english: pandas and other endangered species
sentences.chinese: 熊猫以及其他濒危物种

detailed_translations.english: a group of animals or plants whose members are similar and can breed together to produce young animals or plants

sentences.english: Ben slipped quietly out of the room.
sentences.chinese: 本悄悄地溜出了房间。

sentences.english: One man managed to slip from the club as police arrived.
sentences.chinese: 警察到来时，一个男子设法溜出了俱乐部。

sentences.english: We must be well prepared, there must be no slips.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须好好准备，一定不要有差错。

detailed_translations.chinese: 滑跤，滑落，溜；下降，跌落；悄悄放进
detailed_translations.english: to go somewhere, without attracting other people’s attention
A slip is a small or unimportant mistake

sentences.english: As we saw in the preceding chapter, groups can be powerful agents of socialization.
sentences.chinese: 如我们在前一章所见，团组可以是社会化的有力动因。

detailed_translations.english: happening or coming before the time, place, or part mentioned

sentences.english: The substance is dehydrated and stored as powder.
sentences.chinese: 该物质经脱水处理后以粉末形式储存。

detailed_translations.chinese: 使…脱水；使极其口渴；使丧失力量和兴趣等
detailed_translations.english: to remove the liquid from a substance such as food or a chemical

name: shed
trans: 脱落； 流出， 散发

sentences.english: The company is planning to shed about a quarter of its workforce.
sentences.chinese: 这家公司正计划裁减约四分之一的人员。

sentences.english: The magazine is desperately trying to shed its old-fashioned image.
sentences.chinese: 这份杂志急于摆脱其过时的形象。

sentences.english: a diet to help you shed pounds
sentences.chinese: 帮助你减肥的食谱

detailed_translations.chinese: 脱落，脱去；流出，流下；发出，散发
detailed_translations.english: to get rid of something that you no longer need or want
a small building, often made of wood, used especially for storing things

sentences.english: The spinach is shrivelled up.
sentences.chinese: 菠菜蔫了。

sentences.english: Some of the best brain foods: walnuts, blueberries and spinach.
sentences.chinese: 一些最好的“大脑食物”：胡桃、蓝莓和菠菜。

detailed_translations.english: a vegetable with large dark green leaves

sentences.english: Most couples, however fossilized their relationship, have some interests in common.
sentences.chinese: 大多数夫妻，不管关系多么僵化，都有一些共同的兴趣。

detailed_translations.english: if people, ideas, systems etc fossilize or are fossilized, they never change or develop, even when there are good reasons why they should change

sentences.english: a fledgling republic
sentences.chinese: 一个新兴的共和国

detailed_translations.english: a fledgling state or organization has only recently been formed and is still developing
a young bird that is learning to fly

sentences.english: My choreographer keeps chiseling away at me, hoping to shape me into perfection.
sentences.chinese: 我的舞蹈编导总是不断雕琢我，一心将我塑造成完美的舞蹈家。

sentences.english: "A choreographer told me that what professionals are looking for in a good dancer is core body strength, " said Dr Neave.
sentences.chinese: “一个舞蹈编导告诉我专家们寻找优秀舞蹈演员的核心指标就是身体力量，”内尔博士透露。

sentences.english: The old master even invited him over to his house, where Jackson taught the moonwalk to him and his choreographer Hermes Pan.
sentences.chinese: 这位老前辈甚至邀请他到家里来，在这儿杰克逊为阿斯泰尔和他的舞蹈教练展示了太空步。

detailed_translations.english: A choreographer is someone who invents the movements for a ballet or other dance and tells the dancers how to perform them

sentences.english: They sit cross-legged in a semicircle and share stories.
sentences.chinese: 他们盘着腿围成半圆坐在一起讲故事。

detailed_translations.english: half a circle

sentences.english: By the end of the year the Prime Minister’s approval rating (= how many people agreed with his policies ) had fallen as low as 12 percent.
sentences.chinese: 到年底时，首相的支持率跌到了12%的低点。

detailed_translations.chinese: 等级；等级评定；额定功率
detailed_translations.english: a level on a scale that shows how good, important, popular etc someone or something is

sentences.english: the municipality of Berkeley
sentences.chinese: 伯克利市政当局

sentences.english: an elected municipality
sentences.chinese: 选举产生的市政府

detailed_translations.chinese: 市民；市政当局；自治市或区
detailed_translations.english: a town, city, or other small area, which has its own government to make decisions about local affairs, or the officials in that government

sentences.english: a computer with an 18-inch colour screen
sentences.chinese: 带18英寸彩色屏幕的电脑

sentences.english: He went on staring at the TV screen .
sentences.chinese: 他继续盯着电视屏幕看。

detailed_translations.english: the part of a television or computer where the picture or information appears

detailed_translations.chinese: 掩蔽， 遮蔽； 放映， 播放； 审查， 甄别
detailed_translations.english: if something screens something else, it is in front of it and hides it

name: condominium
trans: 共管； 公寓公私共有方式

detailed_translations.chinese: 共同统治；财产共有权；独立产权的公寓
detailed_translations.english: one apartment in a building with several apartments, each of which is owned by the people living in it

name: degradation
trans: 退化； 降级； 堕落

sentences.english: ...air pollution, traffic congestion, and the steady degradation of our quality of life.
sentences.chinese: …空气污染、交通阻塞以及我们生活质量的持续恶化。

detailed_translations.english: the process by which something changes to a worse condition

name: correspond
trans: 相一致； 通信；  相应

sentences.english: The two halves of the document did not correspond.
sentences.chinese: 这份文件的前后两部分不相符。

sentences.english: The French ‘baccalauréate’ exam roughly corresponds to English A levels.
sentences.chinese: 法国的毕业会考大致相当于英国的高级程度考试。

detailed_translations.english: if two things or ideas correspond, the parts or information in one relate to the parts or information in the other

name: spiced
trans: 加香料的， 加调料的

sentences.english: Every dish was served heavily spiced.
sentences.chinese: 每道菜端上来都是加过很多香料的。

detailed_translations.english: Food that is spiced has had spices or other strong-tasting foods added to it

sentences.english: And when they do, what do you think their perception will be?
sentences.chinese: 当他们这样做时，你觉得他们的知觉是怎样的？

detailed_translations.english: Perception is the recognition of things using your senses, especially the sense of sight

sentences.english: The crowd’s reaction only acted as a spur.
sentences.chinese: 人群的反应不过起了刺激作用。

sentences.english: The band were spurred on by the success of their last two singles.
sentences.chinese: 乐队因最近两张单曲唱片的成功而深受鼓舞。

sentences.english: It was an article in the local newspaper which finally spurred him into action .
sentences.chinese: 是当地报纸上的一篇文章最终促使他行动起来。

detailed_translations.english: a fact or event that makes you try harder to do something
to encourage someone or make them want to do something

sentences.english: It’s a good place to rear young children.
sentences.chinese: 这地方非常适合抚养小孩子成长。

sentences.english: The birds have been successfully reared in captivity.
sentences.chinese: 这些鸟笼养成功。

detailed_translations.english: to look after a person or animal until they are fully grown

sentences.english: University professors both teach and undertake research.
sentences.chinese: 大学教授既要教学又要从事研究工作。

sentences.english: He undertook to pay the money back in six months.
sentences.chinese: 他保证在六个月之内还钱。

detailed_translations.english: to make yourself responsible for sth and start doing it

sentences.english: the symmetry of the design
sentences.chinese: 图案的对称性

detailed_translations.english: the quality of being symmetrical

sentences.english: the many indigenous cultures which existed in Siberia
sentences.chinese: 存在于西伯利亚的许多当地文化

detailed_translations.chinese: 本土的；土著的；国产的；固有的
detailed_translations.english: indigenous people or things have always been in the place where they are, rather than being brought there from somewhere else

sentences.english: Sleep deprivation can result in mental disorders.
sentences.chinese: 缺乏睡眠会引起精神紊乱。

detailed_translations.chinese: 剥夺；损失；免职；匮乏；贫困
detailed_translations.english: the lack of something that you need in order to be healthy, comfortable, or happy

sentences.english: The population has been decimated by disease.
sentences.chinese: 疾病导致大量人口死亡。

detailed_translations.chinese: 毁掉大部分； 大量杀死
detailed_translations.english: to destroy a large part of something

sentences.english: They're resentful that outsiders presume to meddle in their affairs.
sentences.chinese: 他们对外人擅自干预他们的事务怨恨不已。

sentences.english: I presume you're here on business.
sentences.chinese: 我想你是来这儿出差的吧。

sentences.english: "Had he been home all week?"—"I presume so."
sentences.chinese: “他整个星期都在家吗？”—“我想是。”

detailed_translations.english: If you say that someone presumes to do something, you mean that they do it even though they have no right to do it

sentences.chinese: 被指控受贿和贪污的官员

sentences.chinese: 这项调查揭发出了警察机关内部普遍的腐败。

detailed_translations.english: dishonest, illegal, or immoral behaviour, especially from someone with power

sentences.english: an ancient burial mound
sentences.chinese: 古代墓冢

detailed_translations.english: a pile of earth or stones that looks like a small hill

sentences.english: Prices are subject to fluctuation.
sentences.chinese: 价格可能会有波动。

detailed_translations.english: a change in a price, amount, level etc

sentences.english: Would you go to church or the synagogue or the mosque?
sentences.chinese: 你会去教堂，犹太教会，或者清真寺吗？

sentences.english: If there is to be a new city church, they argue, then why not a mosque?
sentences.chinese: 他们置疑说，如果要修建一个新的城市教堂为什么不能是座清真寺呢？

sentences.english: Tell the congregation of a church or mosque that existence is too vulgar an attribute to fasten onto their God, and they will brand you an atheist.
sentences.chinese: 告诉教堂或清真寺的会众们，存在，是强加在他们的上帝身上的一种过于庸俗的属性，他们将会指责你为无神论者。

detailed_translations.english: a building in which Muslims worship

sentences.english: They grabbed each other’s hands in simultaneous panic.
sentences.chinese: 他们俩同时惊慌起来，相互抓住对方的手。

sentences.english: Up to twenty users can have simultaneous access to the system.
sentences.chinese: 最多可有20名用户同时登该系统。

sentences.english: The speeches will be broadcast live, with simultaneous translation (= immediate translation, as the person is speaking ) into English.
sentences.chinese: 这些演讲将作现场直播，并配有英语同声传译。

detailed_translations.english: things that are simultaneous happen at exactly the same time

sentences.english: The bank will only lend me money if my parents guarantee the loan.
sentences.chinese: 只有我父母作担保，银行才会给我贷款。

sentences.english: I’m afraid there’s no guarantee of success.
sentences.chinese: 恐怕不能保证一定会成功。

detailed_translations.english: to promise that you will pay back money that someone else has borrowed, if they do not pay it back themselves
a formal promise that something will be done

sentences.english: We think of these strategies as having been in response to competition and in response to predation.
sentences.chinese: 我们认为，它们的这种生存策略是为了应对生存竞争和其他生物的捕食。

sentences.english: The fastest land animal in the world, cheetahs once thrived in Africa and Asia, but lion predation haunts their young, and farms and ranching have reduced their habitat.
sentences.chinese: 猎豹是陆地上速度最快的动物，曾在亚非大地上大量生长，但它们的幼兽常为狮子等捕食，栖息场所也因不断增加的农庄和牧场而缩减。

detailed_translations.english: when an animal kills and eats another animal

sentences.english: I recommend the butter chicken - it’s delicious.
sentences.chinese: 我推荐黄油焗鸡，非常好吃。

sentences.english: Can you recommend a good lawyer?
sentences.chinese: 你能介绍一位好律师吗？

detailed_translations.english: to say that something or someone is good, or suggest them for a particular purpose or job

name: aristocracy
trans: 贵族政府， 贵族统治

sentences.english: dukes, earls, and other members of the aristocracy
sentences.chinese: 公爵、伯爵及其他贵族成员

sentences.english: the landed aristocracy
sentences.chinese: 拥有大量土地的贵族

detailed_translations.chinese: 贵族；贵族统治；上层社会；贵族政治
detailed_translations.english: the people in the highest social class, who traditionally have a lot of land, money, and power

sentences.english: Kennedy’s predecessor as President was the war hero Dwight Eisenhower.
sentences.chinese: 肯尼迪总统的前任是战争英雄德怀特·艾森豪威尔。

detailed_translations.english: someone who had your job before you started doing it

sentences.english: I smelled the odor of money.
sentences.chinese: 我闻到了一股铜臭气。

sentences.english: The researchers demonstrate that it is possible to generate odor in a compact device that can fit on the back of a TV with potentially thousands of odors.
sentences.chinese: 研究员表示，将一个可以散发上千种气味的小型设备安装在电视背后，从而实现电视(根据情景)生成气味是可能的。

sentences.english: Pewter has an odor.
sentences.chinese: 锡器有一股臭气。

sentences.english: Spreading wastewater over fields, and allowing it to leach back through the soil into local waterways, turns out to be a reasonable way to purify it.
sentences.chinese: 将废水浇灌到田里，这些水经过土壤的过滤后又重新流回当地的水系，这已经被证明是非常合理的污水净化方法。

detailed_translations.english: the act or process of leaching
if a substance leaches or is leached from a larger mass such as the soil, it is removed from it by water passing through the larger mass

sentences.english: Manning hoped to acquire valuable works of art as cheaply as possible.
sentences.chinese: 曼宁希望以尽可能低的价格买到有价值的艺术品。

sentences.english: She has acquired an email address and a site on the World Wide Web.
sentences.chinese: 她获得了一个电子邮件地址和万维网网址。

detailed_translations.chinese: 取得， 获得； 学到
detailed_translations.english: to obtain something by buying it or being given it

sentences.english: As the nebula collapsed because of its gravity, it spun faster and flattened into a disk.
sentences.chinese: 随着由于重力引起的星云坍缩，它旋转得越来越快，并变成了盘状。

sentences.english: There is one other possible explanation for what scientists have seen: They could be watching the birth instead of a pulsar wind nebula.
sentences.chinese: 对于科学家的最新观察结果，还有其他解释：他们所看到的或许只是一个“脉冲星风星云”的诞生。

sentences.english: As for the spiral itself, current supposition is that this is the result of a star in a binary star system entering the planetary nebula phase, when its outer atmosphere is ejected.
sentences.chinese: 至于螺旋本身，最近的推测是这是双子星系统中的一个恒星进入行星星云阶段的结果，此时它的外层大气会被喷出。

detailed_translations.english: a mass of gas and dust among the stars, which often appears as a bright cloud in the sky at night

sentences.english: One helped her daughter fulfill a wish to die by providing her morphine. The other injected heroin into her son herself.
sentences.chinese: 一位给她的女儿注射了吗啡以满足她寻死的愿望，另一位则亲自给儿子注射了海洛因。

sentences.english: Related to morphine and heroin, the Gaza health ministry recognizes Tramadol as a painkiller and allows its sale only by prescription.
sentences.chinese: 由于这种药和吗啡、海洛因有关，加沙健康部门只允许曲马多在医药处方中作为止痛药使用。

sentences.english: Then the researchers repeated the experiment, but this time they injected rats with a dose of cocaine or morphine on one side and with a neutral saline solution on the other.
sentences.chinese: 然后，研究人员重复这项实验，但是这次他们给一边的小白鼠注射小剂量的可卡因或吗啡，而另一边注射中性盐水。

detailed_translations.english: a powerful and  addictive  drug used for stopping pain and making people calmer

sentences.english: You have probably heard of this tactic before.
sentences.chinese: 你以前也可能听说过这个策略。

sentences.english: Over the next few months, however, that tactic will be difficult to sustain.
sentences.chinese: 然而在接下去的几个月这个策略将很难维持下去。

sentences.english: the automobile industry
sentences.chinese: 汽车工业

detailed_translations.english: a car

sentences.english: Displaced farmers are offered alternative plots in lieu of the land acquired by the government.
sentences.chinese: 政府征收土地后会给农民提供一小块替代的土地。

sentences.english: An insurance policy is acceptable in lieu of an insurance certificate or a declaration under an open cover .
sentences.chinese: 可以接受保险单代替预约保险项下的保险证明书或声明书。

sentences.english: For me, it represents a potent adjunct to antidepressant medications and, for some patients, it's something you can take in lieu of pills.
sentences.chinese: 对于我，它是一个抗抑郁剂曾用药物的强有力的助手，对一些病人来说，它是能够代替药丸的东西。

sentences.english: Mortgage defaults have risen in the last year.
sentences.chinese: 按揭借款违约在近一年里呈上升趋势。

sentences.english: He’s so materialistic.
sentences.chinese: 他太实利主义了。

sentences.chinese: 美国社会的实利主义价值观

detailed_translations.english: concerned only with money and possessions rather than things of the mind such as art, religion, or moral beliefs – used in order to show disapproval

sentences.english: You can helicopter to the island.
sentences.chinese: 你可以乘坐直升机去那个岛。

sentences.english: The helicopter is staying over our heads.
sentences.chinese: 那架直升机就在我们头顶的上方。

sentences.english: They were succoured from the fire by the rescue helicopter.
sentences.chinese: 他们被援救的直升机从大火中解救了出来。

detailed_translations.english: a type of aircraft with large metal blades on top which turn around very quickly to make it fly

sentences.english: Beer is a beverage of the remotest time.
sentences.chinese: 啤酒是一种最古老的饮料。

sentences.english: And not only food: frequently there must be a beverage.
sentences.chinese: 而且不仅仅为了食物，还常常必须有饮料。

sentences.english: In this case, you want to provide the user with a way to say the desired beverage.
sentences.chinese: 在这种情况下，您想为用户提供一种方法，让他们说出自己想要的饮料。

trans: 红利； 效益； 被除数

sentences.chinese: 第一季度的股息增加了近4％。

detailed_translations.english: a part of a company’s profit that is divided among the people with  share s  in the company

sentences.chinese: 被俘的士兵

sentences.english: captive animals
sentences.chinese: 被关住的动物

sentences.english: His son had been taken captive (= became a prisoner ) during the raid.
sentences.chinese: 他的儿子在这次突袭中被劫持了。

sentences.english: Women tend to attribute their success to external causes such as luck.
sentences.chinese: 女性往往把她们的成功归因于外因，如运气。

sentences.chinese: 钟表机件

detailed_translations.english: part of a machine or a set of parts that does a particular job

sentences.english: Thirdly, the paper illustrates the life cycle of agriculture VR&DO and discusses the operating mode of it on the basis of dynamic network indenture.
sentences.chinese: 再次，论文阐述了农业虚拟研发组织的生命周期，并论述了基于动态网契约的农业虚拟研发组织的运行模式。

detailed_translations.english: a formal contract, especially in the past, between an apprentice and his master(= employer ), or the act of arranging this

sentences.chinese: 寒冷的天气使许多植物生长滞缓。

detailed_translations.english: to delay the development of something, or to make something happen more slowly than expected

sentences.chinese: 他头上不得不缝了十针。

detailed_translations.english: a short piece of thread that has been sewn into a piece of cloth, or the action of the thread going into and out of the cloth

sentences.chinese: 遗传性缺陷

sentences.english: each person’s genetic make-up
sentences.chinese: 每个人的遗传特征

sentences.english: genetic research
sentences.chinese: 基因研究

detailed_translations.english: relating to genes or genetics

name: triumph
trans: 胜利， 成功； 欢欣

sentences.english: All her life, Kelly had stuck with difficult tasks and challenges, and triumphed.
sentences.chinese: 凯利在一生中遭遇了种种艰巨任务与挑战，但成功了。

detailed_translations.english: If someone or something triumphs, they gain complete success, control, or victory, often after a long or difficult struggle

sentences.english: ...the early detection of breast cancer.
sentences.chinese: …乳腺癌的早期发现。

detailed_translations.english: when something is found that is not easy to see, hear etc, or the process of looking for it

sentences.english: Peden was greatly esteemed by the people of Ayrshire.
sentences.chinese: 佩登深受艾尔郡人的尊敬。

sentences.english: He was esteemed as a literary wit.
sentences.chinese: 他被尊为文学才子。

detailed_translations.english: to respect and admire someone or something

sentences.english: Perhaps there’ll be 16GB telephoto or 32GB zoom lenses available in the future.
sentences.chinese: 或许今后还会有16GB的“摄远镜头”或32GB的“全景镜头”可供选择。

sentences.english: One limiting factor is the viewing angle, which is comparable to using a camera lens: a telephoto lens has a narrower view than a wide-angle lens.
sentences.chinese: 限制因素之一就是观察角度，这与使用照相机的情况类似：长焦镜头的视野比广角镜头的观察角度要窄得多。

detailed_translations.chinese: 传真照片；传真电报；摄远镜头
用远距镜头照相的；摄远的

sentences.english: We welcome this development and we look forward to early ratification of the treaty by China.
sentences.chinese: 我们欢迎这一进展并期望中国早日批准本条约。

detailed_translations.english: The ratification of a treaty or written agreement is the process of ratifying it
one of the small holes in the skin that hairs grow from

sentences.english: Even more strangely, the researchers think the salamanders might inherit the alga from their parents.
sentences.chinese: 更奇怪的是，研究人员认为这些海藻是火蜥蜴从它们父母那里继承来的。

sentences.english: The town is the centre of a black-market trade in facai, a species of alga whose name is spelt and pronounced similarly to 'get rich'.
sentences.chinese: 这座城镇是一个发菜黑市交易的中心。 发菜是一种藻类，在汉语里它的写法和发音类似于“发财”。

sentences.english: Astronomers track large meteors using radar.
sentences.chinese: 天文学家使用雷达跟踪大型流星。

sentences.english: a meteor shower
sentences.chinese: 流星雨

detailed_translations.chinese: 流星；[气象] 大气现象
detailed_translations.english: a piece of rock or metal that travels through space, and makes a bright line in the night sky when it falls down towards the Earth

sentences.english: optimum conditions for growth
sentences.chinese: 最适宜生长的条件

sentences.english: This design makes the optimum use of the available space.
sentences.chinese: 这一设计最大限度地利用了现有的空间。

detailed_translations.english: the best or most suitable for a particular purpose or in a particular situation

name: suppress
trans: 镇压； 抑制， 阻止

sentences.english: The uprising was ruthlessly suppressed.
sentences.chinese: 起义受到了残酷的镇压。

detailed_translations.english: to stop people from opposing the government, especially by using force

trans: 重力的， 万有引力的

sentences.chinese: 月球的引力场

sentences.english: the gravitational pull of the Moon
sentences.chinese: 月球的引力

detailed_translations.chinese: [力] 重力的，[力] 引力的
detailed_translations.english: related to or resulting from the force of gravity
