sentences.chinese: 房地产经纪人

detailed_translations.english: someone who buys and sells things such as  share s  in companies or foreign money for other people

detailed_translations.chinese: 作为权力经纪人进行谈判

sentences.english: a rose-scented bower
sentences.chinese: 玫瑰飘香的树荫

detailed_translations.english: a pleasant place in the shade under a tree

sentences.english: He was fairly easily persuaded .
sentences.chinese: 他很轻易就被说服了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 说服，劝说；使某人相信；劝某人做（不做）某事
detailed_translations.english: to make someone decide to do something, especially by giving them reasons why they should do it, or asking them many times to do it

sentences.english: Just who made the tools is unclear from the archaeological evidence alone, though our relative Homo erectus is identified as the likely creator of at least the Acheulian tools.
sentences.chinese: 尽管已经确定我们的近亲直立人至少是阿舍利工具可能的创造者，但仅凭考古学证据还无法确定是谁制造了这些工具。

sentences.english: So there are two other models, then, models different from the immigration model, two other models for understanding the formation of Israel, that build on this archaeological evidence.
sentences.chinese: 那么还有两个其他的模型，与移民模型不同的两个模型，这两个模型也是为了说明以色列的形成，它们是依据考古学证据。

sentences.english: The work fills (in) a gap which has hitherto existed in our archaeological literature.
sentences.chinese: 这部著作填补了我国考古学文献中的一个空白。

sentences.english: The EU Council of Finance Ministers failed to reach a consensus on the pace of integration.
sentences.chinese: 欧盟财政部长会议未能就一体化的进度达成共识。

sentences.english: the current consensus of opinion
sentences.chinese: 目前观点上的一致

sentences.english: The general consensus was that technology was a good thing.
sentences.chinese: 大家都认为科技是好东西。

sentences.english: the consensus politics of the fifties
sentences.chinese: 50年代的共识政治

detailed_translations.english: an opinion that everyone in a group agrees with or accepts

sentences.english: The boat was embellished with carvings in red and blue.
sentences.chinese: 这艘船饰有红、蓝雕刻。

detailed_translations.english: to make something more beautiful by adding decorations to it

sentences.english: a metric tonne
sentences.chinese: 一公吨

sentences.english: The parts all come in metric sizes now.
sentences.chinese: 现在配件都采用公制规格。

detailed_translations.english: using or connected with the  metric system  of weights and measures

sentences.english: ...a calf injury.
sentences.chinese: …一处小腿的伤。

detailed_translations.chinese: [解剖] 腓肠，小腿；小牛；小牛皮；(鲸等大哺乳动物的)幼崽
detailed_translations.english: the part of the back of your leg between your knee and your  ankle

sentences.english: a New York property speculator
sentences.chinese: 纽约的一名房地产投机者

detailed_translations.english: someone who buys goods, property,  shares  in a company etc, hoping that they will make a large profit when they sell them

sentences.chinese: 道德上进退两难的窘境

sentences.english: This placed Robert Kennedy in a dilemma.
sentences.chinese: 这让罗伯特·肯尼迪陷入了两难的境地。

sentences.english: Many women are faced with the dilemma of choosing between work and family commitments.
sentences.chinese: 许多女性面临着出去工作还是照顾家庭的两难境地。

detailed_translations.english: a situation in which it is very difficult to decide what to do, because all the choices seem equally good or equally bad

sentences.english: A Persian rug covered the hardwood floors.
sentences.chinese: 一张波斯小地毯铺在了那硬木地板上。

sentences.english: The old lady was seated in her chair at the window, a rug over her knees.
sentences.chinese: 这位老妇人坐在靠窗的椅子上，膝上盖着一块小毛毯。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of thick cloth or wool that covers part of a floor, used for warmth or as a decoration

sentences.english: a drama enacted on a darkened stage
sentences.chinese: 在灯光暗淡的舞台上演的戏剧

detailed_translations.chinese: 颁布；制定法律；扮演；发生
detailed_translations.english: to act in a play, story etc

sentences.english: It allows you to harness existing technologies and incorporate them into one application.
sentences.chinese: 它允许您利用现有的技术并将它们合并到同一个应用程序中。

sentences.english: The next step is to generate the report and then incorporate it as an affiliated document of the master document.
sentences.chinese: 紧接着的步骤就是产生这个报告，然后将它作为主文档的附属文档与主文档合并。

sentences.english: The graphite is mixed with clay from Mississippi in which ammonium hydroxide is used in the refining process.
sentences.chinese: 石墨要与产自密西西比河床的粘土混合，在精炼过程中，还要用到氢氧化铵。

sentences.english: So inside the graphite, the pebbles are literally dropped in place and discharged through the bottom and then recycled.
sentences.chinese: 所以，在石墨里面，卵石是,掉进去了，还通过这个底部排出去了,然后被回收了。

sentences.english: From the standpoint of know-how the only difference between the miner of graphite in Ceylon and the logger in Oregon is in the type of know-how.
sentences.chinese: 从知道者的立场来看所谓的知道之间的不同不过是锡兰的矿工之于石墨和俄勒冈的伐木工人之间在某一类别的知道而已。

detailed_translations.english: a soft black substance that is a kind of  carbon  , used in pencils, paints, and electrical equipment

sentences.english: He scrutinized the document.
sentences.chinese: 他细阅了这份文件。

sentences.english: She scrutinized his face.
sentences.chinese: 她细细端详他的脸。

detailed_translations.english: to examine someone or something very carefully

sentences.chinese: 他在我最脆弱的时候利用了我。

sentences.chinese: 富裕的家庭

sentences.chinese: 富人的饮食数十年来没怎么变。

sentences.chinese: 经济繁荣创造了就业的机会。

sentences.chinese: …一些狂野、面相凶恶的家伙，留着满脸的络腮胡子，蓬头垢面。

name: renounce

sentences.chinese: 爱德华宣布放弃对法国王位的继承权。

sentences.chinese: 政府已经拒绝补足3万美元的资金短缺。

name: negative
trans: 否定的； 消极的； 负的

sentences.chinese: 对上学抱消极态度的学生

sentences.chinese: 父母应该提防把自己的兴趣强加给孩子。

sentences.chinese: 在一层烟尘的笼罩下，这些公园和广场显得阴沉沉的。

sentences.english: The rise in crime is mainly due to social and economic factors.
sentences.chinese: 犯罪率上升主要由社会和经济因素造成。

sentences.english: A princely welcome awaited them.
sentences.chinese: 隆重的欢迎场面等待着他们。

detailed_translations.chinese: 王子的，高贵的；慷慨的；豪华的
detailed_translations.english: impressive or generous

sentences.english: The leaves were covered with a strange sticky substance.
sentences.chinese: 树叶上覆着一层黏糊糊的怪东西。

sentences.english: The substance of his argument was that people on welfare should work.
sentences.chinese: 他论点的主旨是享受社会福利的人应该去工作。

detailed_translations.english: a particular type of solid, liquid, or gas

sentences.english: Nahanni National Park Reserve in the Northwest Territories has more than 11, 500 square miles of wilderness that includes ice fields, mountains, alpine tundra, and boreal forest.
sentences.chinese: 西北地区的纳翰尼国家公园保护区有超过11 500平方英里的荒原，包括冰原，高山，高山苔原，北方森林。

sentences.english: For the rest of the century, rising temperatures are expected to threaten Canada’s boreal forest and its diverse wildlife.
sentences.chinese: 未来的全球温度上升将会威胁到加拿大的北方森林和它多样化的野生物种。

sentences.english: Beside the many lakes the landscape is dominated by extensive boreal forests (about 68 percent of land area) and little arable land.
sentences.chinese: 包括许多湖泊在内的风景主要是北方森林（大约占陆地总面积的68%）和极少量的耕地。

detailed_translations.english: of or relating to the north or the north wind

sentences.english: I anticipate nothing but grateful approbation .
sentences.chinese: 我预料大家只有感激赞许。

sentences.english: Julian Lloyd Webber thinks his brother would like the approbation of serious critics.
sentences.chinese: 朱利安·劳埃德·韦伯认为他弟弟希望获得严肃批评家的认可。

detailed_translations.english: official praise or approval

sentences.english: a sculpture of an elephant
sentences.chinese: 一尊大象雕塑

sentences.english: the techniques of sculpture in stone
sentences.chinese: 石雕技艺

detailed_translations.english: an object made out of stone, wood, clay etc by an artist

detailed_translations.chinese: 饱和的；渗透的；深颜色的
detailed_translations.english: extremely wet

detailed_translations.chinese: 使渗透，使饱和（saturate的过去式）

sentences.english: a tribal dance
sentences.chinese: 部落舞蹈

sentences.english: tribal cultures
sentences.chinese: 部落文化

detailed_translations.english: relating to a tribe or tribes

sentences.english: The infringement exists even if the infringer did not know about the patent.
sentences.chinese: 即使侵权人不了解专利侵权依然存在。

sentences.english: When the administrative authority for patent affairs handling the matter considers that the infringement is established, it may order the infringer to stop the infringing act immediately.
sentences.chinese: 管理专利工作的部门处理时，认定侵权行为成立的，可以责令侵权人立即停止侵权行为。

sentences.english: Fair use is a very narrow exemption under copyright law where an infringer is not liable for using someone else’s copyrighted work without permission.
sentences.chinese: 版权法所豁免的合理使用范围很窄，在此范围内，侵权者未经许可使用他人作品是不负有赔偿责任的。

sentences.english: My father put all his money into stock market bonds.
sentences.chinese: 我父亲把他所有的钱都投在上市债券上。

sentences.english: furious trading on the bond market
sentences.chinese: 债券市场疯狂的交易

sentences.english: the emotional bond between mother and child
sentences.chinese: 母亲和孩子之间的感情纽带

detailed_translations.english: an official document promising that a government or company will pay back money that it has borrowed, often with interest

name: contamination
trans: 污染， 玷污； 污染物

sentences.english: However, contamination can occur at any point along the food chain, from field to table.
sentences.chinese: 然而，污染沿着食物链可能在任何的点上发生，从田地到餐桌。

sentences.english: There is no evidence of contamination in our lab, and we have controlled for that all along.
sentences.chinese: 我们的实验室不存在污染，在整个实验过程中我们都控制的很好。

sentences.english: Others have said that all of Mars should be protected as a wildlife preserve where we do everything possible to avoid contamination; on the assumption Martian microbes could exist.
sentences.chinese: 假设火星上可能存在微生物，其他人就认为火星应该是我们做任何事来避免污染的野生动物保护区那样来被保护着。

sentences.english: arable farming
sentences.chinese: 耕作农业

sentences.english: arable land (=  land that is suitable for growing crops  )
sentences.chinese: 可耕地

detailed_translations.english: relating to growing crops

name: antitrust
trans: 反托拉斯的， 反垄断的

sentences.english: new tougher antitrust laws
sentences.chinese: 更严厉的新反垄断法

sentences.english: an antitrust investigation
sentences.chinese: 反垄断调查

detailed_translations.chinese: [经] 反垄断的；[经] 反托拉斯的
detailed_translations.english: intended to prevent companies from unfairly controlling prices

name: sensation
trans: 感觉； 引起轰动的人或事

sentences.english: One sign of a heart attack is a tingling sensation in the left arm.
sentences.chinese: 心脏病发作的一个征兆是左臂有刺痛感。

sentences.english: The sex scenes in the film caused a sensation.
sentences.chinese: 这部影片中的性爱镜头引起了轰动。

detailed_translations.english: a feeling that you get from one of your five senses, especially the sense of touch

sentences.english: Most young smokers are influenced by their friends’ and older siblings’ smoking habits.
sentences.chinese: 大多数年轻的吸烟者都是因为他们的朋友或者哥哥姐姐有吸烟习惯而受影响的。

detailed_translations.english: a brother or sister

name: oust
trans: 驱逐， 剥夺； 取代

sentences.english: The leaders have been ousted from power by nationalists.
sentences.chinese: 那些领导人已被民族主义者赶下了台。

sentences.english: The Republicans may oust him in November.
sentences.chinese: 共和党人可能在11月罢免他。

detailed_translations.english: If someone is ousted from a position of power, job, or place, they are forced to leave it

name: grind
trans: 磨； 伴随摩擦而移动

sentences.english: a stone for grinding knives and scissors
sentences.chinese: 磨刀剪的石头

sentences.english: The lenses are ground to a high standard of precision.
sentences.chinese: 镜片被磨到很高的精确度。

detailed_translations.english: to make something smooth or sharp by rubbing it on a hard surface or by using a machine

a movement in  skateboarding  or  rollerblading  , which involves moving sideways along the edge of something, so that the bar connecting the wheels of the  skateboard  or  rollerblade  presses hard against the edge

sentences.english: Lincoln did much work on desegregation in USA.
sentences.chinese: 林肯在消除种族歧视上做了很多工作。

sentences.english: Soon afterward, the president appointed a federal task force to enforce desegregation along Route 40.
sentences.chinese: 不久以后，肯尼迪成立了一个联邦专责小组来解决40号公路上的种族隔离问题。

sentences.english: At Southern Dynasties , calligrapher Wang Seng - qian also was a calligraphic theorist .
sentences.chinese: 王僧虔， 南朝齐书法家，也是书法理论家。

sentences.english: This enameled and gilded mosque lamp, produced in Egypt or Syria in the early 14th century, is decorated with elegant calligraphic inscriptions.
sentences.chinese: 图中这个于14世纪初在埃及或叙利亚出产的富丽堂皇的彩釉镀金清真寺灯具上刻有精美的书法铭文。

sentences.english: In the contemporary world, networks are everywhere and become the tools of work in our information age, and the dissemination of calligraphic art treats the network as its new form.
sentences.chinese: 而在当代社会，我们处于信息化时代，网络无处不在，成为人们工作的工具，而书法艺术的传播也借助于网络开始进行新的传播方式。

sentences.english: an aquatic plant
sentences.chinese: 水生植物

detailed_translations.chinese: 水生的；水栖的；在水中或水面进行的
detailed_translations.english: living or growing in water

detailed_translations.chinese: 水上运动；水生植物或动物

sentences.english: a rather flippant remark
sentences.chinese: 相当轻浮的话

detailed_translations.chinese: 轻率的；嘴碎的；没礼貌的
detailed_translations.english: not being serious about something that other people think you should be serious about

sentences.english: The security forces counterattacked the following day and quelled the unrest.
sentences.chinese: 安全部队第二天进行了反击，平息了骚乱。

detailed_translations.english: If you counterattack, you attack someone who has attacked you
an attack you make against someone who has attacked you, in a war, sport, or argument

sentences.english: Read the manufacturer's guidelines before discarding the box.
sentences.chinese: 先阅读制造商的说明书再把盒子丢掉。

detailed_translations.chinese: 丢弃， 抛弃， 遗弃
detailed_translations.english: If you discard something, you get rid of it because you no longer want it or need it

name: delicate
trans: 微妙的； 精致的；  脆弱的

sentences.english: his delicate hands
sentences.chinese: 他纤细的手

sentences.english: delicate hand-cut glass
sentences.chinese: 易碎的手工刻花玻璃

sentences.english: The sun can easily damage a child’s delicate skin .
sentences.chinese: 阳光很容易晒伤小孩娇嫩的皮肤。

detailed_translations.english: small and having a beautiful shape or appearance

sentences.english: Stop bouncing up and down on the sofa.
sentences.chinese: 别在沙发上蹦来蹦去了。

detailed_translations.english: if a ball or other object bounces, or you bounce it, it immediately moves up or away from a surface after hitting it
the action of moving up and down on a surface

sentences.english: European farmers are planning a massive demonstration against farm subsidy cuts.
sentences.chinese: 欧洲的农场主们正在策划一场反对削减农场补贴的大游行。

detailed_translations.english: money that is paid by a government or organization to make prices lower, reduce the cost of producing goods etc

sentences.english: The most important criterion for entry is that applicants must design and make their own work.
sentences.chinese: 参加的最重要标准就是申请人必须设计并制作自己的作品。

detailed_translations.english: A criterion is a factor on which you judge or decide something

sentences.english: The government has agreed to underwrite the project with a grant of £5 million.
sentences.chinese: 政府同意拨款 500 万英镑资助该项目。

detailed_translations.chinese: 给保险；同意赔款(海上保险)
detailed_translations.english: if an insurance company underwrites an insurance contract, it agrees to pay for any damage or loss that happens

sentences.english: Young people might be provoked into imitative crime by the exploits they see on TV.
sentences.chinese: 年轻人可能会从电视上看到的“英勇行为”中受到启发而仿效电视主人公实施犯罪。

detailed_translations.english: copying someone or something, especially in a way that shows you do not have any ideas of your own

sentences.english: As geologic forces pulled the crustal plate apart, new volcanoes formed in parts of the rift.
sentences.chinese: 当地质作用力（试图）把地壳版块分开，版块开裂的一些地方就会形成新的火山。

sentences.english: The study authors propose another, more radical, explanation: The crustal rock they analyzed, called ferroan anorthosite, is not linked to magma dynamics at all.
sentences.chinese: 这项研究的作者提出了一个更大胆的解释：他们分析了这种被称为铁斜长岩的月球地壳岩石，发现其并不与岩浆的运动相联系。

sentences.english: Iceland is geology in action. A one-hour flight from Reykjavik skims over steaming geothermal areas, the great crustal rift and some of the country's most famous volcanoes.
sentences.chinese: 冰岛的国土一直处于地质活跃中。从雷克雅未克乘飞机飞行一个小时，途中尽是冒着蒸汽的地热区、巨大的地壳裂缝以及岛国最著名的几座火山。

detailed_translations.english: of or relating to the earth's crust

sentences.english: ...a small package wrapped in tissue paper.
sentences.chinese: …一个小包裹，用薄棉纸包着。

sentences.english: As we age we lose muscle tissue.
sentences.chinese: 随着年纪的增大，我们会失去一些肌肉组织。

detailed_translations.english: light thin paper used for wrapping, packing etc

sentences.english: You’ll need a spanner to loosen that bolt.
sentences.chinese: 你需要扳手来拧开那个螺栓。

sentences.english: The screws have loosened.
sentences.chinese: 螺丝松了。

sentences.english: Harry loosened his tie.
sentences.chinese: 哈里松开了领带。

detailed_translations.english: to make something less tight or less firmly fastened, or to become less tight or less firmly fastened

name: refiner
trans: 精炼机 ； 精制者， 精炼者

sentences.english: The refiner defined a definite confine with her fine finger.
sentences.chinese: 提炼者用她精细的手指定义了一个明确的界限。

detailed_translations.english: Refiners are people or organizations that refine substances such as oil or sugar in order to sell them

sentences.english: He is a carpenter by profession.
sentences.chinese: 他以木工为业。

sentences.english: At an early age, I was apprenticed to a carpenter.
sentences.chinese: 我小时候曾给木匠当过学徒。

sentences.english: That carpenter wanted to become a lawyer， but he was advised to stick to his last.
sentences.chinese: 那个木匠想当律师， 但别人劝他安分守己地干他自己的老本行。

detailed_translations.english: someone whose job is making and repairing wooden objects

sentences.english: Shadowing the Silk Road, it had crossed the vast Eurasian steppe, traversed the Anatolian peninsula, and arrived in Crimea on the Black Sea.
sentences.chinese: 它沿着丝绸之路，跨过广阔的欧洲大草原，横穿安那托利亚半岛，最后来到位于黑海之滨的克里米亚。

detailed_translations.english: a large area of land without trees, especially in Russia, Asia, and eastern Europe

sentences.english: They couldn't afford to pay the bills.
sentences.chinese: 他们付不起账。

sentences.english: He paid his bill for the newspapers promptly.
sentences.chinese: 他立刻付了报纸的帐单。

sentences.english: Are you going to bill me for this?
sentences.chinese: 你会为这开帐单给我吗？

detailed_translations.chinese: 广告；记帐；开发票；演员表；总账款
detailed_translations.english: A bill is a written statement of money that you owe for goods or services
If you bill someone for goods or services you have provided them with, you give or send them a bill stating how much money they owe you for these goods or services

name: modest
trans: 适度的； 朴实的； 谦逊的

sentences.english: You’re too modest! You’ve been a huge help to us.
sentences.chinese: 你太谦虚了！你帮了我们大忙呢。

sentences.english: a modest increase in costs
sentences.chinese: 成本的小幅上涨

detailed_translations.chinese: 谦虚的；不太大的；不很贵的
detailed_translations.english: someone who is modest does not want to talk about their abilities or achievements

sentences.english: ...the 1906 temblor that struck San Francisco.
sentences.chinese: ...1906年旧金山发生的大地震。

detailed_translations.english: an  earthquake

sentences.english: His leg was crushed in the accident.
sentences.chinese: 他的腿在事故中被压断。

sentences.english: Two people were crushed to death in the rush to escape.
sentences.chinese: 两个人在逃生过程中被踩死。

detailed_translations.english: to press something so hard that it breaks or is damaged

name: slice
trans: 薄片， 切片； 部分

sentences.english: pizza slices
sentences.chinese: 比萨块

sentences.english: Cut the tomatoes into slices .
sentences.chinese: 把番茄切成片。

detailed_translations.english: a thin flat piece of food cut from a larger piece
to hit a ball, for example in tennis or golf, so that it spins sideways instead of moving straight forward

sentences.english: special dietary requirements
sentences.chinese: 特殊的饮食要求

detailed_translations.chinese: 规定的食物；饮食的规定；食谱
饮食的，饭食的，规定食物的
detailed_translations.english: related to the food someone eats

sentences.english: The eggs quickly hatch into larvae.
sentences.chinese: 这些卵很快孵化成幼虫。

detailed_translations.english: a young insect with a soft tube-shaped body, which will later become an insect with wings

name: electron
trans: 电子 of an atom and that by its movement causes an electric current in metal)

sentences.english: Most things are balanced - with equal numbers of electrons and protons.
sentences.chinese: 大部分物体都是电荷平衡的——含等量的电子和质子。

detailed_translations.english: a very small piece of matter with a negative electrical charge that moves around the nucleus of an atom

sentences.english: Normally timid, they rarely stray far from their burrows.
sentences.chinese: 它们通常很胆小，极少远离自己的洞穴。

sentences.english: The larvae burrow into cracks in the floor.
sentences.chinese: 幼虫钻进地板的裂缝中。

detailed_translations.english: a passage in the ground made by an animal such as a rabbit or  fox  as a place to live
If an animal burrows into the ground or into a surface, it moves through it by making a tunnel or hole

sentences.english: a steep incline
sentences.chinese: 陡坡

detailed_translations.english: a slope
if a situation, fact etc inclines you to do or think something, it influences you towards a particular action or opinion

sentences.english: the olfactory cells in the nose
sentences.chinese: 鼻腔内的嗅觉细胞

detailed_translations.english: connected with the sense of smell

sentences.english: Feelings of guilt are deeply embedded in her personality.
sentences.chinese: 负罪感在她的性格里根深蒂固。

detailed_translations.chinese: 把…嵌入， 扎牢； 使深留脑中
detailed_translations.english: to put something firmly and deeply into something else, or to be put into something in this way

sentences.english: Language has elevated humans above the other animals.
sentences.chinese: 语言使人类高于其他动物。

sentences.english: Gradually elevate the patient into an upright position.
sentences.chinese: 把病人慢慢托到直立的位置。

detailed_translations.english: to move someone or something to a more important level or rank, or make them better than before

sentences.english: The largest group of religious monuments and megalithic sculptures in South America stands in a wild, spectacular landscape.
sentences.chinese: 在南美洲一片原始壮观的风景区内竖立着一些巨大的宗教性的纪念像和雕塑。

sentences.english: The most ancient form of megalithic construction may be the dolmen, a type of burial chamber consisting of several upright supports and a flat roofing slab.
sentences.chinese: 最古老形式的史前巨石建筑可能是石室冢墓，这是一种由数个直立的支撑物和一个平坦的屋顶构成的石室墓葬。

sentences.english: It was characterized by the continuous development of farming and husbandry, the birth of bronze industry, the change of funeral rites, and the emergence of megalithic buildings.
sentences.chinese: 青铜时代早期的不列颠农耕畜牧经济持续不断的发展、青铜工业诞生、葬俗发生变化和巨石建筑的构筑，展示了史前不列颠社会不断进步的历史内涵和向前发展的历史进程。

name: designate
trans: 指派； 指明， 指定

sentences.english: This floor has been designated a no-smoking area.
sentences.chinese: 这楼层已定为无烟区。

sentences.english: Buildings are designated by red squares on the map.
sentences.chinese: 在地图上建筑物用红色方块标明。

detailed_translations.english: to say officially that sth has a particular character or name; to describe sth in a particular way

name: promising
trans: 有希望的， 有前途的

sentences.english: a promising career in law
sentences.chinese: 很有前途的法律职业

sentences.english: a promising young actor
sentences.chinese: 大有前途的年轻演员

sentences.english: a promising start
sentences.chinese: 良好的开端

detailed_translations.chinese: 有希望的， 有前途的
detailed_translations.english: showing signs of being successful or good in the future

name: nonessential
trans: 不重要的； 非必需的

sentences.english: The crisis has led to the closure of a number of nonessential government services.
sentences.chinese: 这场危机已导致了一些可有可无政府服务设施的关闭。

sentences.english: ...non-essential goods.
sentences.chinese: ...非必需品。

detailed_translations.english: Nonessential means not absolutely necessary

sentences.english: a slick Hollywood production
sentences.chinese: 一部场面恢宏但内容肤浅的好莱坞电影

sentences.english: slick advertising
sentences.chinese: 虚华的广告

sentences.english: The presentation was very slick.
sentences.chinese: 这个展示会非常华而不实。

detailed_translations.chinese: 光滑的；华而不实的；聪明的；熟练的；老套的
detailed_translations.english: if something is slick, it is done in a skilful and attractive way and seems expensive, but it often contains no important or interesting ideas

detailed_translations.chinese: [机] 平滑器；[机] 修光工具；通俗杂志

sentences.english: As a group, they are ambivalent about whether the quality of online content would suffer if companies could not charge for it—34% think so while 30% do not; and the remaining 36% have no firm opinion.
sentences.chinese: 对于如果网站对内容不收费这些内容的质量是否会变差的调查有矛盾：34%的人认为会变差，同时30%的认为不会，而36%的人没有固定的意见。

sentences.english: Looking back on it, I can see how the statement looked ambivalent and a touch arrogant, but it was an honest expression of how I felt, as I began the first campaign since 1982 that I could have lost.
sentences.chinese: 现在回头想想，我能够看出，在这个声明中，我所流露出的矛盾心理和些许的傲慢，但它确实是我内心感受的真实表达，因为这是自1982年以来，我第一次开始进行可能会失利的竞选活动。

detailed_translations.english: not sure whether you want or like something or not

sentences.english: They ran mills, plantations, tanyards, shipyards, and every kind of shop, tavern, and boardinghouse.
sentences.chinese: 她们经营手工作坊、种植园、制革场、造船厂和各类商店、小旅馆和供膳寄宿处。

sentences.english: Three weeks ago, it was discovered the cancer had spread to his liver.
sentences.chinese: 三周前，发现癌已扩散到了他的肝脏。

detailed_translations.english: a large organ in your body that produces bile and cleans your blood

sentences.english: a book on biochemistry and physiology
sentences.chinese: 一本关于生物化学和生理学的书

sentences.english: an epic tale of mutiny on the high seas

sentences.english: epic poetry

detailed_translations.english: a book, poem, or film that tells a long story about brave actions and exciting events

name: trunk
trans: 树干； 躯干； 主干

sentences.english: He left his bicycle leaning against a tree trunk .
sentences.chinese: 他把他的自行车斜靠在树干上。

detailed_translations.chinese: 树干；躯干；象鼻；汽车车尾的行李箱

sentences.chinese: …欧洲统一进程。

detailed_translations.english: the act of combining two or more groups, countries etc to make a single group or country

sentences.chinese: 每逢新年来临，巴拉圭人都会专门制作雕像，然后把雕像打扮成稻草人的样子。

sentences.chinese: 抗议者点燃了政府大楼和卡扎菲的肖像。

detailed_translations.english: a statueof a famous person

sentences.chinese: 这个对比再清楚不过了。

sentences.english: explicit knowledge of grammar

sentences.english: The kidnappers gave us explicit instructions not to involve the police.
sentences.chinese: 绑匪明确告诉我们不许报警。

sentences.english: Be explicit when you talk about money with your family.
sentences.chinese: 与家人谈钱的问题要直截了当。

detailed_translations.english: expressed in a way that is very clear and direct

detailed_translations.chinese: 装上软垫的；经过布置的

name: miraculous
trans: 不可思议的， 奇迹的

sentences.english: She made a miraculous recovery from her injuries.
sentences.chinese: 她受伤后奇迹般地康复了。

sentences.english: They had a miraculous escape when their car plunged into a river.
sentences.chinese: 他们的车冲入河里，而他们却奇迹般地逃生了。

detailed_translations.english: very good, completely unexpected, and often very lucky

sentences.english: The car won’t start. Do you think it’s an omen?
sentences.chinese: 汽车发动不起来。你觉得这是某种预兆吗？

detailed_translations.english: a sign of what will happen in the future

sentences.english: We must consider how best to utilize what resources we have.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须考虑怎样充分利用现有的资源。

detailed_translations.english: to use something for a particular purpose

sentences.chinese: 英格兰和威尔士普遍的经济状况

sentences.english: Justice will prevail.
sentences.chinese: 正义终将获胜。

detailed_translations.english: if a belief, custom, situation etc prevails, it exists among a group of people at a certain time

sentences.english: The most frequently used method is radiocarbon dating.
sentences.chinese: 最常用的方法是放射性碳定年法。

detailed_translations.english: Radiocarbon is a type of carbon that is radioactive, and which therefore breaks up slowly at a regular rate. Its presence in an object can be measured in order to find out how old the object is.

name: excessive
trans: 过分的， 极度的， 过多的

sentences.english: his excessive drinking
sentences.chinese: 他的酗酒

sentences.english: $15 for two beers seems a little excessive.
sentences.chinese: 两杯啤酒要15美元，似乎有点过分。

detailed_translations.english: much more than is reasonable or necessary

sentences.english: Grill the bacon until crisp.
sentences.chinese: 将培根烤至酥脆。

sentences.english: swordfish grilled over charcoal

a part of a  cooker  in which strong heat from above cooks food on a metal shelf below

sentences.english: Thank you for your participation.
sentences.chinese: 谢谢你的参与。

sentences.english: entertainment with plenty of audience participation
sentences.chinese: 有许多观众参与的娱乐活动

detailed_translations.english: the act of taking part in an activity or event

sentences.english: ...an implicit warning to the Moroccans not to continue or repeat the military actions they began a week ago.
sentences.chinese: …叫摩洛哥人不要继续或重复一周前开始的军事行动的含蓄警告。

detailed_translations.chinese: 不言明的， 含蓄的； 内含的， 固有的； 无疑问的
detailed_translations.english: suggested or understood without being stated directly

sentences.chinese: 6月份内战更加激烈了。

sentences.english: His mother’s death intensified his loneliness.
sentences.chinese: 母亲的过世使他感到更加孤单。

detailed_translations.english: to increase in degree or strength, or to make something do this

sentences.english: My efforts to go back to sleep proved futile.
sentences.chinese: 我努力想再次入睡，但怎么也睡不着。

detailed_translations.chinese: 无用的；无效的；没有出息的；琐细的；不重要的
detailed_translations.english: actions that are futile are useless because they have no chance of being successful

name: harsh
trans: 严酷的； 严厉的； 粗糙的； 刺耳的

sentences.english: The hostages are being held in harsh conditions.
sentences.chinese: 人质被拘押在恶劣环境中。

detailed_translations.english: harsh conditions are difficult to live in and very uncomfortable

sentences.chinese: 生产率的年平均增长量是4.5%。

detailed_translations.english: the amount by which a number, value, or amount increases

sentences.chinese: 单方面宣布独立

detailed_translations.chinese: 单边的；[植] 单侧的；单方面的；单边音；（父母）单系的
detailed_translations.english: a unilateral action or decision is done by only one of the groups involved in a situation

sentences.english: ...tritium, a radioactive isotope of hydrogen.
sentences.chinese: ...氚，氢的一种放射性同位素。

detailed_translations.english: one of the possible different forms of an atom of a particular  element

trans: 外行的， 缺乏丰富知识的

sentences.chinese: 可以告诉没有海洋科学钻探知识的人，先前的纪录是四公里过一点儿。

detailed_translations.english: Uninitiated is also an adjective

sentences.english: The kitchen was small and cramped.
sentences.chinese: 这间厨房又小又窄。

sentences.english: a cramped apartment
sentences.chinese: 狭小的公寓套房

sentences.english: The troops slept in cramped conditions with up to 20 in a single room.
sentences.chinese: 士兵们睡在拥挤的环境里，一个房间多达20人。

detailed_translations.english: a cramped room, building etc does not have enough space for the people in it

sentences.english: preferential credit terms for reliable borrowers
sentences.chinese: 向可靠借款人提供的优惠信贷条件

detailed_translations.english: preferential treatment, rates etc are deliberately different in order to give an advantage to particular people

sentences.english: Scrape the carrots and slice them thinly.
sentences.chinese: 把这些胡萝卜去皮切成薄片。

sentences.english: The two of them scraped their dishes clean.
sentences.chinese: 他们两个把盘子擦得干干净净。

sentences.chinese: 我听到汽车的侧面蹭着墙了。

sentences.english: the scrape of iron on stone

sentences.chinese: 她从翻了的车里钻出来，只擦破一点皮，碰了几块淤青。

detailed_translations.english: to remove something from a surface using the edge of a knife, a stick etc
the action of one thing rubbing roughly against another

sentences.english: ...adverse meteorological conditions.
sentences.chinese: …不利的气象条件。

detailed_translations.english: Meteorological means relating to meteorology

sentences.english: ...bilateral talks between Britain and America.
sentences.chinese: …英美之间的双边会谈。

detailed_translations.english: involving two groups or nations

sentences.chinese: 一个宽阔的山谷展开，通向一片平坦的高原耕地。

sentences.chinese: 我选择从事律师职业，有意避开了政治。

sentences.chinese: 25年间，达尔文收集了大量证据来支持自己的理论。

sentences.chinese: 一些最好的交易是他们卖的精装本书籍。

sentences.chinese: 一些出版商试图通过延迟电子图书的出版时间来控制定价，通常在精装版图书上市后数月才发布相应的电子版本。

detailed_translations.english: a book that has a strong stiff cover

sentences.chinese: 耶，你要是和他们结婚，就可以过上真正的好生活，比如早餐吃蟑螂、午餐吃蝎子、晚餐吃蛇。

sentences.english: But such activity produces a healthy appetite and who could forgo the epicurean delight of fried scorpion, cockroach, grasshopper or locust stir-fry.
sentences.chinese: 但是这样的活动让胃口变得好起来。谁又能放弃油煎蝎子、蟑螂、蚱蜢和爆炒知了带来的口福之乐呢？

sentences.chinese: 管理层需要探讨如何加强办事处的安全措施。

trans: 电力； 电学； 强烈的紧张情绪

sentences.chinese: 那个农场非常偏远，但有电力供应。

name: tentative
trans: 试验的， 试探的； 犹豫的

sentences.chinese: 我把我的初步结论递交给了警方。

sentences.chinese: 政府正在采取临时性措施来解决国家的经济问题。

detailed_translations.chinese: 试验性的，暂定的；踌躇的
detailed_translations.english: not definite or certain, and may be changed later

sentences.chinese: 费用竟高达 1,000 万美元。

sentences.english: The financial impact on the town was staggering.
sentences.chinese: 对这个镇所造成的财政影响令人惊诧。

detailed_translations.english: extremely great or surprising

sentences.chinese: 然而，这是一种愚蠢和错误的看待时间的方法。

sentences.english: It could also be an invalidation notice specifying that part of data should not be considered in the integration process because it is inaccurate.
sentences.chinese: 它经常是一个无效的通告，部分的数据集成过程中应该不会被考虑，因为他们是错误的。

sentences.chinese: 切去边皮的三明治

detailed_translations.english: the hard brown outer surface of bread

sentences.chinese: 行政人员们说他们对拟建的系统持怀疑态度。

sentences.chinese: 他们不太放心把资金投向一间由一人独自操控的公司。

sentences.english: Their money problems were further aggravated by a rise in interest rates.
sentences.chinese: 由于利率上调，他们的财务问题更加严重。

sentences.english: Building the new road will only aggravate the situation .
sentences.chinese: 建造那条新路只会使情况恶化。

detailed_translations.english: to make a bad situation, an illness, or an injury worse

name: wanton
trans: 无节制的， 放纵的； 顽皮的

sentences.english: wanton growth
sentences.chinese: 繁芜的生长

detailed_translations.english: uncontrolled

sentences.english: Tobacco is highly addictive .
sentences.chinese: 烟草很容易使人上瘾。

detailed_translations.english: if a substance, especially a drug, is addictive, your body starts to need it regularly and you are unable to stop taking it

sentences.english: ...a scientist calculating the Earth's circumference.
sentences.chinese: …一位正在计算地球周长的科学家。

detailed_translations.english: the distance or measurement around the outside of a circle or any round shape

name: organization
trans: 组织； 机构， 团体

sentences.english: The public expect high standards from any large organization.
sentences.chinese: 公众对任何大型机构都期望很高。

sentences.english: the World Trade Organization
sentences.chinese: 世界贸易组织

sentences.english: a voluntary organization which helps disabled people with their transport needs
sentences.chinese: 帮助残疾人士满足其交通需求的一个志愿组织

sentences.english: an illegal terrorist organization
sentences.chinese: 非法的恐怖组织

sentences.english: international organizations such as the UN
sentences.chinese: 诸如联合国之类的国际组织

detailed_translations.english: a group such as a club or business that has formed for a particular purpose

sentences.chinese: 该火山上次爆发持续了一年，所以现在也不能排除这个可能性。

sentences.chinese: 我们的工作如同地质学家，我们收集一场即将到来的地震或火山爆发的迹象。

sentences.chinese: 假设一次火山爆发消灭了所有的普通老鼠，那么这个小岛将是斑纹鼠的天下。

sentences.english: I shall be pleased to preside at your meetings.
sentences.chinese: 我很高兴主持你们的会议。

sentences.english: Mr Justice Waller, presiding judge for the northeast
sentences.chinese: 沃勒法官，东北地区的首席法官

detailed_translations.english: to be in charge of a formal event, organization, ceremony etc

sentences.english: cyclical changes in the economy
sentences.chinese: 经济的周期性变化

detailed_translations.english: happening in cycles

sentences.english: a colossal statue of the King
sentences.chinese: 国王的巨大雕像

sentences.english: This whole holiday was a colossal waste of money.
sentences.chinese: 这次度假浪费了大量的钱财。

detailed_translations.english: used to emphasize that something is extremely large

sentences.chinese: 临时泊位

detailed_translations.english: the ropes, chains,  anchor s  etc used to fasten a ship or boat to the land or the bottom of the sea

sentences.english: All the main economic indicators suggest that trade is improving.
sentences.chinese: 所有主要的经济指标都表明贸易情况正在改善。

detailed_translations.chinese: 指示器；[试剂] 指示剂；[计] 指示符；压力计
detailed_translations.english: something that can be regarded as a sign of something else

sentences.english: a young mother trying to control her offspring
sentences.chinese: 一个想管住自己孩子的年轻妈妈

detailed_translations.english: someone’s child or children – often used humorously

sentences.english: the pharmaceutical industry
sentences.chinese: 制药业

sentences.english: pharmaceutical products
sentences.chinese: 药物

sentences.english: Antibiotics were of no use, neither were other pharmaceuticals.
sentences.chinese: 抗生素没有用，其他药物也没有用。

detailed_translations.english: relating to the production of drugs and medicines
Pharmaceuticals are medicines

sentences.english: On arrival, she buys a glass factory on a whim, and challenges him to transport a church built entirely of glass by boat from Sydney 250 miles up the coast.
sentences.chinese: 到达目的地后，她突发奇想买了一个玻璃厂，并向他挑战，让他用船沿着 250 英里长的海岸线从悉尼运来建造一整座玻璃教堂。

sentences.english: An idle whim, I fear, sir,' was my answer; `or else an idle whim is going to spirit me away.
sentences.chinese: “恐怕是一种无聊的奇想，先生，”这是我的回答，“不然就是一种无聊的奇想又要诱使我走开。

detailed_translations.english: a sudden feeling that you would like to do or have something, especially when there is no important or good reason

sentences.english: Loud noise can damage the delicate membrane in the ear.
sentences.chinese: 很响的噪声会损伤脆弱的耳膜。

detailed_translations.english: a very thin piece of skin that covers or connects parts of your body

sentences.english: Gather the right crew: You’ll need the right partners in crime to pull the heist.
sentences.chinese: 召集合适的搭档： 你将需要一些合适的正在犯罪的搭档去抢劫。

sentences.english: It had not been much of a heist; he said his accomplice “got some change” but he got nothing.
sentences.chinese: 那都说不上是一次抢劫，他说他的同谋“搞了点零钱”而他一无所获。

sentences.english: Angelina plays Gloria, a young girl whose brother was killed in the heist-gone-wrong.
sentences.chinese: 安吉丽娜饰演格罗瑞亚，她的哥哥在那次抢劫中被误杀。

detailed_translations.english: A heist is a robbery, especially one in which money, jewellery, or art is stolen

name: arrest
trans: 依法逮捕， 拘留； 阻止， 抑制

sentences.english: He was arrested and charged with murder.
sentences.chinese: 他遭到逮捕并被指控谋杀。

sentences.english: I got arrested for careless driving.
sentences.chinese: 我因鲁莽驾驶被捕。

sentences.english: drugs used to arrest the spread of the disease
sentences.chinese: 用于控制疾病蔓延的药物

detailed_translations.english: if the police arrest someone, the person is taken to a  police station  because the police think they have done something illegal

sentences.english: the British Navy
sentences.chinese: 英国海军

sentences.english: He joined the navy during the war.
sentences.chinese: 他在战争期间参加了海军。

detailed_translations.english: the part of a country’s military forces that fights at sea

sentences.english: Laura is very mature for her age.
sentences.chinese: 相对她的年龄来说劳拉是很成熟的。

sentences.english: We’re mature enough to disagree on this issue but still respect each other.

sentences.english: Facilities for people with disabilities are still insufficient.

sentences.chinese: 谣言使整个城市惊慌不安。

sentences.chinese: 下水道被淹，水溢到了大街上。

detailed_translations.english: the art of speaking or writing to persuade or influence people

sentences.english: Since web users want instant gratification, the inverted pyramid style, as supported by Nielsen, is important for web writing and for better user experience.

if something intrigues you, it interests you a lot because it seems strange or mysterious

sentences.english: Not speaking the language is a real handicap.

trans: 粉碎， 砸碎； 破坏

sentences.chinese: 这样才不至于出现意想不到的不愉快，你要准备好从而避免在财务上、精神上和法律上承担云计算的不利后果。

sentences.chinese: 无耻的雇主

sentences.chinese: 我给她换了尿布。

sentences.chinese: 他不想提问让她尴尬。

sentences.chinese: 轰炸

sentences.chinese: 在南部山脉，黏土层覆在白垩层之上。

sentences.chinese: 在你定义项目的时候，你要确保和项目发起人在项目应该完成的所有工作内容上达成一致意见。

sentences.chinese: 发起人必须真正认可项目的价值，这一点很重要，只有这样才能确保在推广没有立即见效时资金和支持不会随之消失。

sentences.english: Young children have a particularly acute sense of smell.
sentences.chinese: 幼儿的嗅觉特别灵敏。

sentences.chinese: 保护热带雨林至关重要。

trans: 贡献； 投稿； 捐献

sentences.english: The U.S. is contributing $4 billion in loans, credits, and grants.
sentences.chinese: 美国以信贷和赠与的方式捐助了40亿美元。

sentences.english: Local businesses have agreed to contribute.

detailed_translations.english: To contribute money or resources to something means to give money or resources to help pay for something or to help achieve a particular purpose

sentences.english: People have lost faith in the government.
sentences.chinese: 人们已失去了对政府的信心。

sentences.english: He took a small key from his pocket and slowly inserted it into the lock.
sentences.chinese: 他从衣袋里掏出一把小钥匙，然后缓缓地将其插入锁孔里。

sentences.chinese: 白宫官员试图为总统在这一事件中的责任开脱。

sentences.english: This is a sublanguage allowing navigation to nodes, retrieval of sets of nodes, and so forth.
sentences.chinese: 这是一种用于遍历节点、检索节点组等的子语言。

sentences.chinese: 进行适当更改之后，资源旁边的括号将显示“未知语言”，并显示语言和子语言标识符。

sentences.chinese: 几十年来，莫尔文丘陵为很多艺术家和音乐家提供了灵感。

sentences.chinese: 他抬头看看祭坛，似乎在寻求灵感。

sentences.chinese: 他突然灵感闪现。

sentences.chinese: 我们知道怎样去阻止疟疾。

sentences.english: The campaign to eradicate malaria did not.
sentences.chinese: 而根除疟疾运动则未做到这一点。

sentences.english: To reach our goal of near zero deaths from malaria by 2015, we need an extraordinary intensification of our actions in two key areas.
sentences.chinese: 我们要想在2015年以前达到疟疾死亡人数近于零的目标，必须格外加强我们在两个关键领域的行动。

sentences.english: an integrated public transport system
sentences.chinese: 综合公共交通体系

sentences.english: a racially integrated community
sentences.chinese: 一个各种族和谐相处的社会

name: enzyme
trans: 酵素， 酶 without being changed itself)

sentences.english: So how do we strengthen our skeptical skills?

sentences.english: L.M.:Well, I was skeptical myself in the beginning. But these are facts. The findings are very reproducible and we are waiting for confirmation by other labs.
sentences.chinese: 大爷：我老人家一开始也是很怀疑的。但是这个是事实。这个发现可以被反复验证，我们正在等待别的实验是的验证。

sentences.english: Treason in this country is still punishable by death.
sentences.chinese: 在该国，叛国仍是死罪。

name: contemplate
trans: 沉思； 打算， 预期

sentences.chinese: 他甚至想过自杀。

sentences.chinese: 杰克去度假，仔细思考一下他的未来。

detailed_translations.chinese: 考虑；深思；细想；注视，凝视

sentences.chinese: 这真的是怪兽，有点像啮齿动物，但长着恐龙一样的嘴巴。

sentences.chinese: 但是，这项新的研究发现，70%的啮齿动物和灵长目动物的物种具有阑尾。

sentences.english: Like Plasmodium, which cycles between mosquitoes and man, Toxoplasma cycles between its rodent and feline hosts, living out different phases of its existence in each.
sentences.chinese: 像疟原虫在蚊子和人之间循环一样，弓形虫的循环界于其啮齿类和猫科宿主之间，在不同宿主体内活出不同的生存阶段。

detailed_translations.chinese: 啮齿类的；咬的，嚼的；侵蚀性的

detailed_translations.english: any small animal of the type that has long sharp front teeth, such as a rat or a rabbit

sentences.english: He sent his work to his publishers by modem.
sentences.chinese: 他通过调制解调器把作品发给他的出版商。

sentences.english: She received an eight-year prison sentence.
sentences.chinese: 她被判八年徒刑。

sentences.english: He has just begun a life sentence for murder.
sentences.chinese: 他犯了谋杀罪，刚开始服无期徒刑。

sentences.chinese: 桑切斯被判了三年监禁。

if a judge sentences someone who is guilty of a crime, they give them a punishment

sentences.chinese: 贝丝表现出一种远远超出她16岁年龄的成熟。

detailed_translations.english: the quality of behaving in a sensible way like an adult

sentences.english: The name of the cheese is Dolcelatte, literally meaning ‘sweet milk’.
sentences.chinese: 这种奶酪名叫Dolcelatte，字面意思是 “甜牛奶” 。

sentences.english: I said I felt like quitting, but I didn’t mean it literally (= I did not mean exactly what I said )!
sentences.chinese: 我是说我不想干了，但并不是真的不干了！

detailed_translations.english: according to the most basic or original meaning of a word or expression

sentences.english: Many of the families are forced to live at the subsistence level.
sentences.chinese: 很多家庭被迫生活在基本生活水准线上。

sentences.chinese: 股东们被告知明年的业绩还会更差。

sentences.english: ...the consumer price index.
sentences.chinese: …消费价格指数。

detailed_translations.english: a standard by which the level of something can be judged or measured

trans: 沼泽的， 生于沼泽的

sentences.chinese: 这片低洼的沼泽地沿海湾方向延伸数英里。

detailed_translations.english: Marshy land is always wet and muddy

trans: 可出售的， 卖得出的

sentences.chinese: 这个效应是由于电子从热灯丝逸出而引起的。

sentences.chinese: 将诸如氩那样的惰性气体充入灯泡中，以减少灯丝的蒸发。

sentences.english: In the paper, the enhancing process of diamond nucleation by negative substrate bias in hot filament CVD system was analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 对利用热灯丝CVD沉积金刚石膜时负衬底偏压增强金刚石的核化过程进行了分析。

detailed_translations.english: A filament is a very thin piece or thread of something, for example, the piece of wire inside a light bulb

sentences.english: It was an odd thing to say.
sentences.chinese: 这话说得很奇怪。

sentences.english: an odd way to behave
sentences.chinese: 古怪的行为

sentences.chinese: 他们是古怪的一对。

sentences.chinese: 他这人有些奇怪。

sentences.chinese: 她的所作所为是不可原谅的，但奇怪的是他好像并不在意。

trans: 宣布， 发表； 通报…的到来

sentences.chinese: 那幢公寓楼的访客都必须通报。

sentences.chinese: 在接待处通报姓名后，詹姆斯被领上楼去。

sentences.chinese: 介绍了独特的逻辑概念的互补成添加剂的特性，我们发现一个有趣的结果。

sentences.chinese: 正如以上所提到的，将不同的元素通过加法和减法的方式，慢慢地组合到一起是一个需要不断反复的过程。

sentences.english: congested airspace
sentences.chinese: 拥挤的空域

sentences.english: London’s roads are heavily congested (= very congested ) .
sentences.chinese: 伦敦的马路非常拥挤。

sentences.chinese: …马的饲料。

detailed_translations.english: food for farm animals

sentences.chinese: 一股不祥的气息从这个圣杯中散发出来，抓住那些窥视它的人们的心，仿佛下定决心要将他们拽入死者的世界一般。

sentences.english: The blade and chalice guarding o'er her gates.
sentences.chinese: 剑刃和圣餐杯守护在她的门外。

sentences.chinese: 展性钢

sentences.chinese: 阻截毒品走私入境的努力

something that is very different from something else
if two things contrast, the difference between them is very easy to see and is sometimes surprising

sentences.chinese: …一个由男性独占的领域。

sentences.english: It was so large and complex, they initially assumed it was a bacterium.
sentences.chinese: 由于它们是如此庞大和复杂，最初被认为是一种细菌。

sentences.chinese: 他们还通过“基因移植”，把一个物种的细菌转变为另一种。

sentences.chinese: 前总统同意就和谈进行斡旋。

sentences.chinese: 你的便携式摄像机应该具备以下基本功能：自动聚焦、回放功能、变焦镜头。

sentences.chinese: 你随时可以取消订阅。

sentences.chinese: 我决定不再续订了。

sentences.chinese: 1999年他被披露几近破产。

sentences.chinese: 通货膨胀率现已超过16%。

sentences.chinese: 但是这场争论的意义远远不止于乙醇问题。

sentences.chinese: 如今巴西不再使用单纯靠汽油驱动的汽车，政府要求所有机动车均采用含四分之一乙醇的混合燃料。

sentences.chinese: 这包括在巴西的帮助下建设15个乙醇生产厂。

detailed_translations.english: the type of alcohol in alcoholic drinks, which can also be used as a fuel for cars

sentences.chinese: 他把她诱骗到家里，然后用父亲的枪把她打死。

sentences.chinese: 她有一种权威气质。

sentences.chinese: 纽约出版界纷繁的社交活动

sentences.chinese: 因为地球旋转，所以它不是个完完全全的球体。

sentences.chinese: 这种药会引发肝脏炎症。

detailed_translations.english: swelling and pain in part of your body, which is often red and feels hot
the line marked with numbers that goes from top to bottom on a graph

sentences.english: warnings of dire consequences that often don’t come true
sentences.chinese: 对严重后果的警告，尽管这些后果常常不会出现

sentences.chinese: 这个国家急需食品援助。

sentences.chinese: 去年销售额骤减 20%。

sentences.english: The council's land is now worth much less than originally hoped because of a slump in property prices.
sentences.chinese: 由于地产价格的暴跌，委员会的土地目前大不如原来所希望的那么值钱了。

detailed_translations.english: to fall or lean against something because you are not strong enough to stand
Slump is also a noun

sentences.english: Women still face prejudice in the workplace.
sentences.chinese: 女性在职场中仍然面临歧视。

sentences.english: It takes a long time to overcome these kinds of prejudices.
sentences.chinese: 战胜这些偏见需要假以时日。

name: digest
trans: 消化 into absorbable form)； 吸收(to absorb; to take into the mind or memory)

sentences.english: Most babies can digest a wide range of food easily.
sentences.chinese: 大多数婴儿能轻易地消化很多种食物。

sentences.english: I struggled to digest the news.
sentences.chinese: 我费力地琢磨着那条新闻。

sentences.chinese: 每月新闻摘要

sentences.chinese: 因此，他的讲道面向的不只是世俗之人，也面向神职人员。

sentences.english: At most colleges, you can get counseling from members of the clergy. Some campuses have representatives from many different religions.
sentences.chinese: 在大多数的高校，你能够得到神职人员的劝导。有些学校有很多来自不同宗教的代表。

detailed_translations.english: the official leaders of religious activities in organized religions, such as priests,  rabbi s  , and  mullah s

sentences.english: ...the city's traditional dependence on tourism.
sentences.chinese: …这个城市对旅游业的传统依赖。

detailed_translations.english: when you depend on the help and support of someone or something else in order to exist or be successful

name: unanticipated

detailed_translations.english: an unanticipated event or result is one that you did not expect

sentences.english: a proficient typist
sentences.chinese: 熟练的打字员

name: affordable
trans: 负担得起的， 便宜的

sentences.chinese: …多数人支付得起的房产的供应。

detailed_translations.english: If something is affordable, most people have enough money to buy it

sentences.chinese: 他要求欧洲国家实施共同的移民政策。

detailed_translations.english: the process of entering another country in order to live there permanently

sentences.english: It is believed that it inhibits an enzyme that promotes cell proliferation in tumours.
sentences.chinese: 据信它能抑制一种能在肿瘤中促进细胞增殖的酶的生成。

sentences.chinese: 他表示：“品牌扩散并不新鲜，如果执行得好，它是会带来盈利的。”

name: ideology
trans: 思想体系， 意识形态

sentences.english: the ideologies of fascism and terrorism
sentences.chinese: 法西斯主义和恐怖主义的意识形态

sentences.english: a new ideology based on individualism
sentences.chinese: 基于个人主义的新思想体系

detailed_translations.english: a set of beliefs on which a political or economic system is based, or which strongly influence the way people behave

sentences.english: In practice, however, such an attitude is counterproductive.
sentences.chinese: 然而在实际中，这种态度会适得其反。

detailed_translations.chinese: 反生产的；使达不到预期目标的
detailed_translations.english: Something that is counterproductive achieves the opposite result from the one that you want to achieve

sentences.english: a recipe book
sentences.chinese: 一本烹饪书

detailed_translations.english: a set of instructions for cooking a particular type of food

sentences.english: The peacocks roost in nearby shrubs.
sentences.chinese: 那只孔雀在附近的灌木丛里栖息。

detailed_translations.english: if a bird roosts, it rests or sleeps somewhere
a place where birds rest and sleep

sentences.english: It’s not easy to apportion blame (=  say who deserves to be blamed  ) when a marriage breaks up.
sentences.chinese: 婚姻破裂很难说是谁的错。

detailed_translations.english: to decide how something should be shared among various people

sentences.english: The state police are investigating the incident.
sentences.chinese: 州警察正调查此事。

sentences.english: The study investigates the impact of violent TV programming on children.
sentences.chinese: 该研究调查暴力电视节目对儿童的影响。

sentences.english: I heard a noise and went downstairs to investigate.
sentences.chinese: 我听见响声，就下楼去看个究竟。

detailed_translations.english: to try to find out the truth about something such as a crime, accident, or scientific problem

name: hostility
trans: 敌对， 不友好； 憎恨

sentences.english: The last decade has witnessed a serious rise in the levels of racism and hostility to black and ethnic groups.
sentences.chinese: 过去的10年里，种族主义及对黑人和少数民族的敌意变得更加严重了。

detailed_translations.english: when someone is unfriendly and full of anger towards another person

sentences.english: He published his autobiography last autumn.
sentences.chinese: 他去年秋天出版了他的自传。

detailed_translations.english: a book in which someone writes about their own life, or books of this type

sentences.english: The power behind much of this automation is the regular expression, a veritable set of hieroglyphics to find, match, and decompose strings.
sentences.chinese: 实现这种自动化主要依靠正则表达式，它是用来查找、匹配和分解字符串的一组真正的象形文字。

sentences.english: Following drawn-out patent wars, Baekeland negotiated a merger with his rivals that put him at the helm of a veritable Bakelite empire.
sentences.chinese: 经过持久的专利战，贝克兰和他的对手签约合作，使他获得了一个真正的酚醛塑料大企业的领导权。

sentences.english: Both plays were published under the pseudonym of Philip Dayre.
sentences.chinese: 两个剧本都是以菲利普·戴尔的笔名发表的。

detailed_translations.english: an invented name that a writer, artist etc uses instead of their real name

name: hemoglobin
trans: 【生化】 血红蛋白， 血色素

sentences.english: Please wait for the result of your hemoglobin test.
sentences.chinese: 请等一下你的血红蛋白化验结果。

sentences.english: Some, like hemoglobin, deliver oxygen from the lungs to the far reaches of the body.
sentences.chinese: 有些蛋白质像血红蛋白一样，可以把氧从肺部输送到身体各处。

sentences.english: Usually, if you or I or any nonadapted person went to high altitude, we would increase our hemoglobin levels to compensate for the low amount of oxygen.
sentences.chinese: 通常，如果你、我或其他任何不适应的人去了高海拔地区，就会使体内血红蛋白的水平增高，以弥补那里低的氧气量。

detailed_translations.chinese: [生化] 血红蛋白（等于haemoglobin）；血红素
detailed_translations.english: Haemoglobin is the red substance in blood, which combines with oxygen and carries it around the body

sentences.english: methods of food preservation
sentences.chinese: 保存食物的各种方法

sentences.english: the preservation of peace in the region
sentences.chinese: 维护该地区的和平

detailed_translations.english: when something is kept in its original state or in good condition

name: considerable
trans: 相当多的； 值得考虑的

sentences.english: Michael has already spent considerable time in Barcelona.
sentences.chinese: 迈克尔在巴塞罗那已经待了相当长的时间了。

sentences.english: issues of considerable importance
sentences.chinese: 相当重要的问题

sentences.english: The series has aroused considerable interest.
sentences.chinese: 这套系列节目引起了观众相当浓厚的兴趣。

detailed_translations.english: fairly large, especially large enough to have an effect or be important

sentences.english: Tests showed increased levels of toxin in shellfish.
sentences.chinese: 测试表明贝类中的毒素级别上升了。

detailed_translations.english: a poisonous substance, especially one that is produced by  bacteria  and causes a particular disease

name: audiophile
trans: 唱片爱好者； 爱玩高级音响的人

sentences.english: The phil- in philately is the same as in Philadelphia, the city of brotherly love, or in audiophile a lover of high end stereo equipment.
sentences.chinese: Philately单词中的phil-，同于“博爱城”费城Philadelphia中的Phi-，或者高端音响设备爱好者audiophile中的Phi-。

detailed_translations.chinese: 唱片爱好者；爱玩高级音响的人
detailed_translations.english: a person who has a great interest in high-fidelity sound reproduction

sentences.english: Do you have to reserve tickets in advance?
sentences.chinese: 你必须预先订票吗？

detailed_translations.english: to arrange for a place in a hotel, restaurant, plane etc to be kept for you to use at a particular time in the future

detailed_translations.chinese: 储备； 保留； 拘谨， 矜持； 替补队员， 后备部队； 自然保护区
detailed_translations.english: a supply of something kept to be used if it is needed

sentences.english: Concept artist Terryl Whitlatch wanted the colo claw fish to have an invertebrate look, so her early designs were based on an earwig.
sentences.chinese: 概念画家特丽尔·惠特拉奇希望科洛爪鱼拥有无脊椎动物的外表，所以她的早期设计是以蠼螋为基础的。

sentences.english: There was a hierarchical system in neurobiology, and working in invertebrate animals was not looked upon favorably, except in a very special case: the squid giant axon.
sentences.chinese: 神经生物学中有一个等级系统，无脊椎动物的研究不被看好，除了非常特殊的例子：枪乌贼巨大的轴突。

sentences.english: Smithers, don't you think it's ironic that your irregular night-time activities are in inverse proportion to your reputation as an expert in the area of invertebrate research?
sentences.chinese: 斯密德斯，难道你不认为自己无规律的夜生活与你作为无脊椎动物研究领域的专家的声望成反比是具有讽刺意味的吗？

detailed_translations.english: a living creature that does not have a  backbone

name: viable
trans: 可行的； 能活下去的

sentences.english: viable seeds
sentences.chinese: 可存活的种子

detailed_translations.chinese: 可行的；能养活的；能生育的
detailed_translations.english: a viable idea, plan, or method can work successfully

sentences.english: She has gone from being a healthy, fit, and sporty young woman to being a cripple.
sentences.chinese: 她从一个健康、强壮、爱好体育运动的年轻姑娘变成了一个残疾人。

detailed_translations.english: someone who is unable to walk properly because their legs are damaged or injured - now considered offensive
to hurt someone badly so that they cannot walk properly

sentences.english: Victor’s facial expression didn’t change.
sentences.chinese: 维克托脸上的表情没有变化。

sentences.english: facial hair
sentences.chinese: 脸部的汗毛

detailed_translations.chinese: 面部的，表面的；脸的，面部用的
detailed_translations.english: on your face or relating to your face
if you have a facial, you have a beauty treatment in which your face is cleaned and creams are rubbed into it

sentences.english: After a few days of fever, she began to recover.
sentences.chinese: 发烧几天之后，她开始恢复。

sentences.english: Two bodies were recovered from the wreckage.
sentences.chinese: 残骸中找到了两具尸体

detailed_translations.english: to get better after an illness, accident, shock etc

sentences.english: ...problems caused by the influx of refugees.
sentences.chinese: …难民大量涌入所造成的问题。

detailed_translations.english: the arrival of large numbers of people or large amounts of money, goods etc, especially suddenly

name: miscarriage
trans: 流产； 失败； 误送

sentences.english: She had two miscarriages before she had her first child.
sentences.chinese: 她生第一个孩子之前流产了两次。

sentences.english: One in five pregnancies ends in miscarriage .
sentences.chinese: 有五分之一的妊娠以流产告终。

detailed_translations.english: if a woman who is going to have a baby has a miscarriage, she gives birth before the baby is properly formed and it dies

sentences.english: Screw the lid on clockwise.
sentences.chinese: 按顺时针方向拧紧盖子。

sentences.english: Gently swing your right arm in a clockwise direction.
sentences.chinese: 按顺时针方向轻轻摆动你的右臂。

detailed_translations.english: in the same direction as the  hands  of a clock move
Clockwise is also an adjective

sentences.english: Paraffin is a known carcinogen, and hydrogen peroxide can harm the digestive system. Chopsticks irresponsibly disposed of can contaminate water and soil quality.
sentences.chinese: 石蜡是一种已知的致癌物，而过氧化氢则对消化系统有害。随意丢弃木筷则可能污染水和土壤质量。

sentences.english: Management tactics range from using bone charcoal to soak up the carcinogen and then dispose of it as toxic waste to chemically transforming hexavalent chromium to a more benign form.
sentences.chinese: 管理方法多样，简单的从使用骨炭吸收致癌物，然后把骨碳当作有毒废物扔掉，到高级的使用化学方法把六价铬转化成更良性的结构。

sentences.english: Also included in the green group of vegetables are broccoli, Brussels sprouts, and cabbage, which are, like cauliflower, cruciferous vegetables and contain powerful carcinogen blockers.
sentences.chinese: 椰菜、抱子甘蓝和卷心菜也属于绿色组蔬菜，像菜花那样，都是十字花科蔬菜并且含有强有效的致癌物质阻断剂。

detailed_translations.english: a substance that can cause  cancer

sentences.english: The city centre was devastated by the bomb.
sentences.chinese: 市中心被这枚炸弹摧毁了。

detailed_translations.english: to damage something very badly or completely

sentences.english: He's embarking on a new career as a writer.
sentences.chinese: 他正开始一个当作家的新生涯。

detailed_translations.chinese: 上船； 着手， 开始工作
detailed_translations.english: to go onto a ship or a plane, or to put or take something onto a ship or plane

sentences.english: This metamorphic rock has been compressed for millions of years.
sentences.chinese: 这种变质岩已经过数百万年的压缩。

detailed_translations.english: metamorphic rock is formed by the continuous effects of pressure, heat, or water

name: prodigy
trans: 奇迹； 奇才； 奇观

sentences.english: The Russian tennis prodigy is well on the way to becoming the youngest world champion of all time.
sentences.chinese: 这位俄罗斯网球奇才已很有望成为历史上最年轻的世界冠军。

detailed_translations.chinese: 奇迹，奇事；奇才；奇观；预兆
detailed_translations.english: A prodigy is someone young who has a great natural ability for something such as music, mathematics, or sports

sentences.english: One proviso  is attached to this legacy.
sentences.chinese: 这个遗赠附带一项限制性条款。

detailed_translations.chinese: 附带条件；附文；限制性条款
detailed_translations.english: a condition that you ask for before you will agree to something

name: exonerate
trans: 证明…无罪；  免受指控

sentences.english: The official report basically exonerated everyone.
sentences.chinese: 该官方报告基本洗脱了所有人的干系。

detailed_translations.chinese: 证明…无罪；  免受指控
detailed_translations.english: to state officially that someone who has been blamed for something is not guilty

sentences.english: Police had to be called in to control the crowds.
sentences.chinese: 只好调来警察控制人群。

sentences.english: He controlled the urge to laugh.
sentences.chinese: 他克制住笑的冲动。

sentences.english: The disease robs you of muscle control.
sentences.chinese: 这种疾病会让你丧失肌肉控制力。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone or something do what you want, or make something happen in the way that you want
the ability or power to make someone or something do what you want or make something happen in the way you want

name: medication
trans: 药物疗法； 药物， 药剂

sentences.english: When somebody comes for treatment I always ask them if they are on any medication.
sentences.chinese: 有人来治疗时，我总是会问他们是否在服药。

detailed_translations.chinese: 药物；药物治疗；药物处理
detailed_translations.english: medicine or drugs given to people who are ill

sentences.english: This matter comes within the purview of the Department of Health.
sentences.chinese: 这件事属于卫生部的管辖范围。

detailed_translations.english: within or outside the limits of someone’s job, activity, or knowledge

sentences.english: Check your rope frequently, as friction against the rock can wear it away.
sentences.chinese: 要经常检查绳索，因为与岩石摩擦会使它磨损。

detailed_translations.english: when one surface rubs against another

sentences.english: He conferred with Hill and the others in his office.
sentences.chinese: 他和希尔以及他办公室里的其他人进行了商议。

detailed_translations.english: to discuss something with other people, so that everyone can express their opinions and decide on something
to officially give someone a title etc, especially as a reward for something they have achieved

sentences.english: a hotel lobby
sentences.chinese: 宾馆大堂

sentences.english: I’ll meet you in the entrance lobby.
sentences.chinese: 我们在入口大厅见。

sentences.english: The group is lobbying for a reduction in defence spending.
sentences.chinese: 该团体正在游说政府削减国防开支。

detailed_translations.english: a wide passage or large hall just inside the entrance to a public building
to try to persuade the government or someone with political power that a law or situation should be changed

sentences.english: The family acknowledge the need for change.
sentences.chinese: 全家人都承认需要改变一下。

sentences.english: I would be grateful if you would acknowledge receipt of this letter.
sentences.chinese: 收到此信后请告知，不胜感谢。

detailed_translations.english: to admit or accept that something is true or that a situation exists

sentences.english: a huge dormant volcano
sentences.chinese: 一座巨大的休眠火山

detailed_translations.chinese: 休眠的；静止的；睡眠状态的；隐匿的
detailed_translations.english: not active or not growing at the present time but able to be active later

sentences.english: ...the information receptors in our brain.
sentences.chinese: …我们大脑中的信息感受器。

detailed_translations.chinese: [生化] 受体；接受器；感觉器官
detailed_translations.english: a nerve ending which receives information about changes in light, heat etc and causes the body to react in particular ways

sentences.english: They try to equip their vehicles with gadgets to deal with every possible contingency.
sentences.chinese: 他们尽量给他们的车辆配备各种小装置以应付任何可能的突发状况。

detailed_translations.english: to provide a person or place with the things that are needed for a particular kind of activity or work

sentences.english: Unfortunately, parts of the original manuscript have been lost.
sentences.chinese: 遗憾的是，部分原始手稿丢失了。

detailed_translations.english: a book or piece of writing before it is printed

sentences.english: They like five-star hotels and deferential treatment.
sentences.chinese: 他们喜欢五星级酒店和谦恭的礼遇。

detailed_translations.english: Someone who is deferential is polite and respectful toward someone else

sentences.english: Hovering between abstraction, constructivism and surrealism, yet avoiding any specific avantgarde movement, Kertész, a Hungarian-born émigré, was guided by a personal yet rigorous aesthetic.
sentences.chinese: 这位出生于匈牙利的流亡者徘徊在在抽象主义，构成主义和超现实主义之间，但是回避任何特别的前卫运动，他由个人的，严密的审美观所引导。

detailed_translations.english: a movement in abstract art evolved in Russia after World War I, primarily by Naum Gabo, which explored the use of movement and machine-age materials in sculpture and had considerable influence on modern art and architecture

sentences.english: a hereditary peer
sentences.chinese: 世袭贵族

detailed_translations.chinese: 遗传的；世袭的；世代相传的
detailed_translations.english: a quality or illness that is hereditary is passed from a parent to a child before the child is born

sentences.english: ...the damage being inflicted on industries by the recession.
sentences.chinese: …经济衰退给工业造成的损失。

detailed_translations.chinese: 造成；使遭受（损伤、痛苦等）；给予（打击等）
detailed_translations.english: To inflict harm or damage on someone or something means to make them suffer it

sentences.english: Next, move to the diagonal section at the back-right side of the diamond.
sentences.chinese: 下一个,在钻石的背面-正确的边移到对角线的区段。

sentences.english: And then there is this group of about half a dozen right down the diagonal middle.
sentences.chinese: 然后有一个包含六个元素的元素组,在周期表的对角线的中部。

sentences.english: The average reader reads about 240 words per minute, where as a diagonal reader ‘reads’ (actually scans) closer to 15 words per second or about 900 words per minute.
sentences.chinese: 一般读者每分钟阅读240字，而作为一个对角线读者的“阅读速度”（到不如说是浏览）接近每秒15字或大约每分钟900字。

sentences.english: The next day, we drove inland.
sentences.chinese: 第二天，我们乘车开往内陆。

sentences.english: We beached the boat and headed inland.
sentences.chinese: 我们想使船靠岸，朝内陆方向驶去。

sentences.english: In 1985 a glacier buried this shore; since then the ice has retreated a half mile inland.
sentences.chinese: 1985年，一座冰川在海滨融化，自那时起冰川已经向内陆退缩了半英里。

detailed_translations.english: an inland area, city etc is not near the coast

detailed_translations.chinese: 在内地；向内地；向内陆；在内陆
detailed_translations.english: in a direction away from the coast and towards the centre of a country

sentences.english: a fighting stance
sentences.chinese: 搏击姿势

detailed_translations.chinese: 立场；姿态；位置；准备击球姿势
detailed_translations.english: an opinion that is stated publicly

sentences.english: ...infringement of privacy.
sentences.chinese: …对隐私的侵犯。

detailed_translations.english: An infringement is an action or situation that interferes with your rights and the freedom you are entitled to

sentences.english: In her hurry, she stumbled and spilled the milk all over the floor.
sentences.chinese: 匆忙中她绊了一下，把牛奶洒得满地都是。

sentences.english: I make it into the darkness with only one stumble.
sentences.chinese: 我只踉跄了一下就把它弄进了黑暗中。

detailed_translations.chinese: 跌， 绊；结结巴巴地说话
detailed_translations.english: to hit your foot against something or put your foot down awkwardly while you are walking or running, so that you almost fall
Stumble is also a noun

sentences.english: You can see the iridescence on their faces.
sentences.chinese: 你可以看到他们脸上的彩虹色。

sentences.english: When sunlight or moonlight passes through a layer of thin clouds, the result can be iridescence.
sentences.chinese: 阳光或月光穿过薄薄的云层就会形成虹彩。

sentences.english: For day by day he felt more and more like a bubble filled with darkness, round which whirled the iridescence of his consciousness .
sentences.chinese: 他日益感到自己象一个充满黑色的泡沫，四周缠绕着自身意识的彩虹。

name: strategic
trans: 战略上的； 关键的， 重要的

sentences.english: UN forces made a strategic withdrawal.
sentences.chinese: 联合国部队作了战略性撤退。

sentences.english: strategic planning meetings
sentences.chinese: 战略计划会议

sentences.english: a strategic decision to move production to Hungary
sentences.chinese: 把生产转至匈牙利的战略决定

detailed_translations.english: done as part of a plan, especially in a military, business, or political situation

sentences.english: Boats are readily available to visitors.
sentences.chinese: 游客可以很方便地租到船只。

sentences.english: The information is readily accessible on the Internet.
sentences.chinese: 这些信息在因特网上一查就能找到。

detailed_translations.chinese: 乐意地， 欣然地； 容易地； 很快地， 立即
detailed_translations.english: quickly and easily

name: coherent
trans: 连贯的； 清楚的； 附着的， 黏在一起的

sentences.english: The three years of the course are planned as a coherent whole.
sentences.chinese: 这三年的课程是作为连贯的整体来安排的。

sentences.english: a coherent account of the incident
sentences.chinese: 对该事件条理分明的陈述

sentences.english: He's so calm when he answers questions in interviews. I wish I could be that coherent.
sentences.chinese: 他如此镇定地回答了访谈中的问题。我希望我也能那样有条不紊。

detailed_translations.chinese: 一致的，协调的；(话语等)条理清楚的
detailed_translations.english: if a piece of writing, set of ideas etc is coherent, it is easy to understand because it is clear and reasonable

name: clandestine
trans: 秘密的， 暗中从事的

sentences.english: a clandestine affair
sentences.chinese: 秘密关系

sentences.english: clandestine meetings
sentences.chinese: 秘密会议

detailed_translations.chinese: 秘密的，私下的；偷偷摸摸的
detailed_translations.english: done or kept secret

sentences.english: the Nile delta
sentences.chinese: 尼罗河三角洲

detailed_translations.chinese: （河流的）三角洲；德耳塔（希腊字母的第四个字）
detailed_translations.english: the fourth letter of the Greek alphabet

sentences.english: Some 3,500 new dwellings are planned for the area.
sentences.chinese: 大约三千五百套新住宅计划在这个地区新建。

detailed_translations.english: a house, apartment etc where people live

sentences.chinese: 他发现的电磁特性最终导致电视、广播、微波炉的发明，并且也对无线电和红外望远镜的发明起到了重要作用。

sentences.english: Martial arts teach respect, discipline, and cooperation.

sentences.chinese: 我们要在微积分学中考虑这些因素。

sentences.english: All this leads up to the most fundamental of theorems of calculus .

sentences.english: He vowed to achieve certain objectives before the end of his presidency.
sentences.chinese: 他立誓要在他的总统任期结束之前实现某些目标。

sentences.english: The main objective was to improve children’s knowledge of geography.

trans: 使受害， 迫害； 使牺牲

sentences.chinese: 那些人声称他们因为自己的政治活动而受到了迫害。

trans: 发挥、 运用 into action or to tiring effort)； 施加(to employ, to wield)

trans: 精确定位； 准确解释或确定

sentences.chinese: 新的卫星系统将让汽车精确他们的位置到每一英寸。

sentences.english: The feature could, for example, pinpoint areas being threatened by a quickly approaching tornado and alert residents of impending danger via their computers or cell phones.
sentences.chinese: 例如，精确地定位正遭受龙卷风攻击的区域并通过计算机和手机警告危险地区的人们。

sentences.chinese: 如果建筑商不履行合同，我们就要提出起诉。

sentences.chinese: 他的妻子对他提出起诉，要求离婚。

sentences.chinese: 珍妮为自己不了解真相而痛苦，她开始深入调查母亲的过去。

sentences.english: This led to the next epochal shift.
sentences.chinese: 这导致了下一个划时代的转变。

sentences.english: Any system able to do that would be a truly epochal achievement, but such a miracle is not on the agenda of even the most advanced machine translation developers.
sentences.chinese: 如果有翻译系统能翻译出这些因素，这将是划时代的成就；要知道，即使现在最先进的机器翻译研发机构也不敢将此作为研究目标。

sentences.chinese: 来看看为什么。 考虑到在政府日益增长的经济实力下的另一个划时代的转变。

sentences.english: The second longest fjord (an inset of the sea between steep slopes) in the world and the largest in Norway, the magnificence of this has to be experienced for the magnitude to be understood.
sentences.chinese: 这是世界第二长的峡湾（就是那种峭壁对峙的形式）当然在挪威是最大的，她有种难以言语的雄壮。
